GSP28mimsvtku:2252: anyathā ca jñāyata iti naikāntato vākyāj jñānānumānam iti || 160 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:2254_0: vivakṣāmātram api tato 'vagantuṃ na śakyata ity āha -- bhrāntasyeti. vivakṣā hi tāvadatyantaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:2254_1: vākyanirmāṇe sannihitā. tasyām apy anyathā satyāṃ kadācid bhrāntasyānyathā vākyaracanā
GSP28mimsvtku:2254_2: dṛśyate. ato yathāvivakṣam api vākyaṃ na pravartata eva. katham asatyāṃ vivakṣāyāṃ vākyaracaneti ced,
GSP28mimsvtku:2255: na. vivakṣāntarasa[479]mbhavāt. katham anyavivakṣā anyanirmāṇe hetur iti cet ko doṣaḥ. vivakṣā hi prayatnadvāreṇa vākyaniṣpattau hetuḥ,
GSP28mimsvtku:2256_0: nādṛṣṭena rūpeṇa. sa ca vivakṣāntaraprayuktenaiva kṛtaḥ kutaṃścid vaiguṇyān na samyak
GSP28mimsvtku:2256_1: pariniṣpannaḥ. tato 'śaktijanyam anyad eva jātam. yathā kaścit śuṣke patiṣyāmīti
GSP28mimsvtku:2256_2: kardame patati. sūkṣmavivakṣāstitvaṃ tu sūkṣmadṛśa eva pratipadyante. vivakṣā hi
GSP28mimsvtku:2257: tarhi sukhādivanmānasapratyakṣavedyaṃ katham ajñāyamānam astīti śakyate vaktum. athābhilāṣātmakajñānarūpā,
GSP28mimsvtku:2258: tathāpi kathaṃ vākyāntaraprakāśe 'nyavivakṣāstīti śakyate kalpayitum iti yat kiñcid etat || 161 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:2262: evam ākṣiptaṃ bhāṣyaṃ samādadhāti -- vaktṛdhīr iti. ayam abhiprāyaḥ -- dvividho hi vaktā āpto 'nāptaś ca. tatra ya evam avadhārito bhavati {1,
GSP28mimsvtku:2263: 146}nāyam anyathājñātam anyathā vadati āpta iti yāvat,
GSP28mimsvtku:2264_0: tadvākyād evaṃ vedeti vaktṛdhīr avagamyate. anyatra tv anāptavākye viplutir iti viplavata
GSP28mimsvtku:2264_1: ityādinoktam. tatredam uktaṃ[480]bhavati -- yadā tāvadāptavākyād anāśaṅkam eva jñānaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:2264_2: jātaṃ vyavahāraś ca pravṛttaḥ na ca visaṃvādo dṛṣṭaḥ,
GSP28mimsvtku:2265_0: tadā kalyāṇam eva. jātāśaṅkasyāpi vaktur āptatvam anusmṛtya[481]tajjñānapurassaram
GSP28mimsvtku:2265_1: evārthe niścayo jāyate. āptasya ca bhramo na tāvad āśaṅkyate. sa hi sunipuṇo na tāvat
GSP28mimsvtku:2265_2: prāyaśo bhrāmyati. na cāsamyagvidite tasyaitāvatī ceṣṭā bhavati yad asau parapratipattaye
GSP28mimsvtku:2265_3: vākyaṃ praṇayati. tathāpi vā saṃśayānasya tatparipraśnād eva tatpramāṇaniścayo bhavati.
GSP28mimsvtku:2265_4: sa eva nirbadhyapṛṣṭo yadi tricaturajñānam ātmana upadiśati,
GSP28mimsvtku:2266_1: vyākhyāta eveti. evaṃ tāvad jñānapratyayaviplavau viṣayavyavasthayā vyākhyātau. idānīṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:2266_2: bhāṣyatātparyaṃ darśayati -- teneti. yat tāvad vākyatvam atathābhūtatve hetutayoktaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:2266_3: tasyānenāprayojakatvam ucyate. āptavākyeṣu hi guṇanirākṛtadoṣeṣūtsargeṇa satyatvaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:2266_4: dṛṣṭam. ata eva hi tajjñānānusāryarthaniścayo bhavati. itarathā tasyāpi mithyātvaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:2266_5: bhavet. anāptavākyeṣu tu taddoṣād apavādād aprāmāṇyam. evaṃ ca svābhāvikasamyakparicchedaśaktir
GSP28mimsvtku:2266_6: atra vacasaś śabdasyocyate. mithyātvaṃ caupādhikaṃ na vākyatvena prayujyate paraprayuktavyāptyupajīvi hi tat,
GSP28mimsvtku:2273: tatra kāraṇam āha -- padārtheti. śrotur hi vaktrā padārtheṣu viraciteṣu
GSP28mimsvtku:2274_0: vākyārthapratyayo jāyate. vaktuś ca racanākṛtir vivakṣāpūrvikā. sā cāptasyāvijñāte[482]na
GSP28mimsvtku:2274_1: sambhavatīti pūrvajñānam apekṣate. ataḥ pratibandhabalenāptavākyāt pūrvavijñānam
GSP28mimsvtku:2279: 147}vivakṣāvaśatvam eva racanāyā darśayati -- vivakṣāntareti. pūrvavivakṣāyā yad vivakṣāntarāgamena racanāntaraṃ dṛśyate pūrvottarapadodvāpāvāpabhedena,
GSP28mimsvtku:2281: evañ ca yad vivakṣādhīnā racanā sā ca jñānapūrvikā,
GSP28mimsvtku:2282_0: tena kāraṇena vākyād[483]arthapratyayotpāde śrotur jāte[484]'pi nūnam anenāyam artho
GSP28mimsvtku:2282_1: vaktrā jñāta iti vaktṛjñāne matir bhavatīty āha -- teneti. vaktṛpramāṇapūrvatvād
GSP28mimsvtku:2282_2: racanāyā na svatantro 'rthajñānamātrān niścaya iti bhāvaḥ. tad iha tenotsargāpavādābhyām
GSP28mimsvtku:2282_3: ity atra svābhāvikī vacasaś śaktir iti bhāṣyatātparyam uktam. padārtharacanāyatta
GSP28mimsvtku:2282_4: ity ataḥ prabhṛti tenārthapratyaya ity evam antenāptavacasāṃ pratyayāntarāpekṣiteti
GSP28mimsvtku:2287: itaś cāptavākyaṃ tajjñānaparatantram avagamyata ity āha -- āptoktir iti. yadāptoktam artham eko 'nutiṣṭhati taṃ cāparo 'nuyuṅkte kim atra te pramāṇam iti,
GSP28mimsvtku:2288: tadā asāv āptoktikārī tam āptam eva tatra mūlatayā darśayati ya evaṃ[485]vādī sa evāpta etaj jānāti nāham iti. svātantrye hi tajjñānaprakāśanam anarthakaṃ bhaved iti || 166 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:2292: kim idānīm āptavākyam arthe na pramāṇam eva,
GSP28mimsvtku:2293: [486]naivam api tu āptavaktṛpramāṇānavadhāraṇāj jātāśaṅkasya vākyam udāste. yadā hi vaktṛdhiyo hetubhūtam aduṣṭam indriyādyavadhāritaṃ bhavati,
GSP28mimsvtku:2295: 148}sthāpyate. tad ihāvagatihetutayā śabdānāṃ prāmāṇyam upakrāntam aprāmāṇyaśaṅkayā śithilīkṛtaṃ vaktṛpramāṇāvadhāraṇanirākṛteṣu doṣeṣu dāḍhyarthaṃ labhate,
GSP28mimsvtku:2296_0: tad etad āha -- tajjñāneti. tajjñānāntaritatvāt vaktṛjñānāntaritatvāt. niścayajanane
GSP28mimsvtku:2296_1: śabdasyety arthaḥ. tāvacchabdenātyantāprāmāṇyaṃ nirākaroti. kiyatāpi vilambanena
GSP28mimsvtku:2296_2: prāmāṇyaṃ pratitiṣṭhatīti. nanv evaṃ vaktṛpramāṇānusāriṇi niścaye satyanuvāda eva
GSP28mimsvtku:2296_3: śabdaḥ prāganiścayād apramāṇam iti kadā pramāṇam. uktam idaṃ svakāla eva tat pramāṇaṃ,
GSP28mimsvtku:2297_0: doṣāśaṅkānirākaraṇamātre vaktṛjñānasya vyāpāra iti. śrotrā hi prathamam aviditapūrva
GSP28mimsvtku:2297_1: evārtho 'vagataḥ kvacid vyabhicāradarśanena jātāyām āśaṅkāyāṃ tannirākaraṇena tasyaiva
GSP28mimsvtku:2297_2: prāmāṇyaṃ pratiṣṭhāpyate. ata eva sthāpanam ity uktam iti || 167 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:2301_0: kathaṃ punaḥ prathamaṃ śabdā udāsate. sa hy arthaḥ śabdena[487]prāk pratyāyito na
GSP28mimsvtku:2301_1: vā. yadi nety āha katham evaṃ vedeti vaktṛjñānam unnīyate. prakārārtho hy evaṃśabdaḥ.
GSP28mimsvtku:2301_2: na ca nirākāraṃ vijñānam anāśritārthapariṣvaṅge svarūpeṇa prakāravad bhavet. na ca[488]śrotur
GSP28mimsvtku:2301_3: buddhāvanārūḍho 'rtho vaktṛjñanam evambhāvena viśinaṣṭi. yadi tu pūrvam apy arthapratyayo 'vagamyate,
GSP28mimsvtku:2302: tataḥ pāratantrye kāraṇaṃ vācyam. utpadyamānenaiva hi tena svaviṣayaparicchedaḥ kṛta iti kim anyad apekṣate. niścayārthaṃ vaktṛpramāṇāpekṣeti ced,
GSP28mimsvtku:2303: na. aniścayajñānāsambhavāt. niścaya eva hi jñānaṃ,
GSP28mimsvtku:2304_0: tac ced asti kathaṃ niścayo nāstīti śakyate vaktum. ato 'nupapannam idam arthajñānagamyaiva
GSP28mimsvtku:2304_1: vaktṛdhīs tatprāmāṇye kāraṇam iti. ata āha -- artha iti. yat tāvad uktam anavagate
GSP28mimsvtku:2305: tatrābhyupagamenaivottaram. satyaṃ pūrvaṃ pratīta evārtha iti. yat tu pratīte 'niścayo na ghaṭata iti. tan na,
GSP28mimsvtku:2306: jātāśaṅkasya tadupapatteḥ. yady api na śabdāt saṃśayaḥ,
GSP28mimsvtku:2307: tathāpi vyabhicāradarśanāt saṃśayo jāyata eva. yat tv aniścayātmakaṃ jñānam eva nāstīti jñānotpattau niścaya eva jāyata ity ucyate. tan na. saṃśayasyāpi jñānatvāt. ato{1,
GSP28mimsvtku:2308_1: saiva vaktṛdhīḥ pūrvajñānaprāmāṇye pūrvabhāg bhavatīti[490]tayā samutsāritāyāṃ doṣāśaṅkāyāṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:2315_0: evaṃ tāvat puruṣavākyeṣu jñānāntarāpekṣayā prāmāṇyaṃ kvacic caupādhikam aprāmāṇyam
GSP28mimsvtku:2315_1: ity uktam. vedavākye tu svābhāvikatvād eva vacasaḥ samyagarthaparicchedaśakter na
GSP28mimsvtku:2316: tad etad āha -- ata iti. astu nāma vaktṛdoṣāśaṅkayā puṃvacasām aprāmāṇyaṃ,
GSP28mimsvtku:2317: svabhāvanirdoṣaṃ tu vedavaco na tatsvabhāvam anubhavitum[491]arhatīti || 169 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:2321: vaktṛbuddhyantarayor vyavadhānam api vede nāstīti padārthair eva kevalair nityanirdoṣair vākyārthaḥ pratīyata ity āha -- tadbuddhīti. ataḥ siddhaṃ na vede pratyayāntarāpekṣā,
GSP28mimsvtku:2322: na cāyathārthatvam iti. prakaraṇārtham upasaṃharati -- ata iti || 170 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:2323: anyathā bhāṣyābhiprāyam āha -- apramāṇatveti. vedānām apramāṇatvasiddhaye yat kiñcana laukikaṃ[492]vacanaṃ dṛṣṭāntatayoktaṃ,
GSP28mimsvtku:2324: tasyānena granthena dṛṣṭāntasya sādhyānāsaṅgitā sādhyavikalatocyate iti || 171 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:2329: ata āha -- teṣām iti. ayam abhiprāyaḥ -- paramatenedaṃ bhāṣyakāreṇa parān pratyucyate. tathā hi -- yadā{1,
GSP28mimsvtku:2330: 150} tāvallokāyatikābhiprāyaḥ prayogaḥ -- codanā mṛṣā pratyakṣādyagatārthatvād īdṛgbuddhādivākyavad iti,
GSP28mimsvtku:2331: tadā bauddhābhiprāyeṇedam ucyate. sādhyānāsaṅgī dṛṣṭānta iti. tanmate hi śabdo nārthe pramāṇam. tathā hi padāni tāvadarthaṃ smārayanti,
GSP28mimsvtku:2332_0: na tu kvacit kiñcid upanayanty apanayanti vā. vākyam api vyabhicāradarśanān nārthe[493]pramāṇam.
GSP28mimsvtku:2332_1: ataḥ kathaṃ tat sādhanaṃ bhavet. vaktrabhiprāya eva tu pratibandhabalāt śabdair bodhyate.
GSP28mimsvtku:2332_2: tathāhuḥ -- na tv etebhyo 'rthasiddhis teṣāṃ tatra pratibandhāsiddheḥ vaktrabhiprāyaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:2332_3: tu sūcayeyur iti. ato yad buddhādivacasāṃ kāryaṃ pratipādyam uktaṃ,
GSP28mimsvtku:2333: tatra teṣāṃ samyaktvam evāvyabhicārāt. arthe tu teṣāṃ vyāpāro neṣyata eva. ato na kiñcid vedavākyānāṃ mithyātve kāraṇam[494]astīti pūrvatra pratipāditam iti || 172 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:2338_0: padārtharacanāyatta ityādinā yat pratibandhabalena vākyād vaktṛjñānānumānam uktaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:2338_1: tad darśayatīti yadi ca yatra puṃvākyaṃ vyāpriyate vaktṛjñāne tadatirikte 'rtha eva dṛṣṭāntatayocyate,
GSP28mimsvtku:2339: tataḥ siddhasādhanam ity āha -- svavyāpāreti. svaviṣayātirekeṇa vedānām api mithyātvam iṣyate. pūrvapakṣārthe mṛṣātvābhyupagamād iti || 173 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:2340: atrāparaṃ bhāṣyaṃ - nanu sāmānyato dṛṣṭam anumānaṃ bhaviṣyati,
GSP28mimsvtku:2341_0: puruṣavacanaṃ vitatham upalabhya vacanasāmānyād vedavacanaṃ mithyety anumīyate iti.
GSP28mimsvtku:2341_1: tasyābhiprāyam āha -- ajñātveti dṛṣṭamantena. vākyatvaṃ mithyātve na prayojakam iti
GSP28mimsvtku:2342_1: kṛtam iti jñānāt paraḥ pūrvapakṣavādī nanu sāmānyato dṛṣṭam ityādy abravīt. ato naivaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:2342_2: codanīyaṃ kathaṃ hetor aprayojakatva ukte punas tenaiva hetunā pratyavasthānam iti.{1,
GSP28mimsvtku:2343: 151}agṛhītābhiprāyasya paricodanāt. evaṃ hi manyate -- bhavatu yathātathā vā puruṣavacasāṃ mithyātvam,
GSP28mimsvtku:2344: evam api pratibandhasiddher hetur gamaka eveti kṛtakākṛtakavākyayoḥ sāmānyatodṛṣṭam ity anvaya iti. atra parihārabhāṣyaṃ na,
GSP28mimsvtku:2346: tadākṣipati -- nānyatvād iti. katham adūṣaṇam ata āha -- etasmād iti. vedavākyamithyātve sādhye puṃvākyaṃ dṛṣṭānta uktaḥ. tatra kim ayaṃ doṣaḥ yad anyatvaṃ nāma,
GSP28mimsvtku:2347: pratyuta guṇa evāyam. anyatvād eva hi dṛṣṭānto bhavati. anantyatve sādhyasamatvāpatteḥ. na hi pakṣa eva sapakṣo bhavati. pakṣasya sādhyatvāt,
GSP28mimsvtku:2352_0: tasmād upekṣyaiva tāvad granthavyākhyāṃ bhāṣyakārābhiprāyam abhidadhmahe ity āha
GSP28mimsvtku:2352_1: -- tasmād iti. tam evābhiprāyaṃ varṇayati -- abhyupetyeti vākyatāntena. ayam arthaḥ
GSP28mimsvtku:2352_2: -- paramatābhiprāyeṇāpicetyādi bhāṣye vaktṛjñāna eva vākyaṃ pramāṇam,
GSP28mimsvtku:2353_0: arthe tu na tasya vyāpāra ity uktam. tad abhyupagacchāmaḥ. bhavatu puṃvākyaṃ bāhya
GSP28mimsvtku:2353_1: evārthe pramāṇaṃ na vaktṛjñāne. bāhyārthāpekṣayaiva cāprāmāṇyavādino dṛṣṭānto 'stu
GSP28mimsvtku:2353_2: nāma. tathāpi dūṣaṇam ucyate -- vyavadhāne 'pīti. yady api jñānavyavahite 'rthe 'pramāṇam eva puṃvākyaṃ,
GSP28mimsvtku:2354_0: tathāpi tadviṣayaprāmāṇyābhyupagamenaiva brūmaḥ sādhāraṇānaikāntiko hetur iti. satyeṣv
GSP28mimsvtku:2354_1: apy āptavākyeṣu vākyatvasya hetor dṛṣṭatvād itīdam atra sāmānyatodṛṣṭānumānadūṣaṇaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:2354_2: bhāṣyakārasya manasi viparivartate. anenaivābhiprāyeṇa bhāṣyam api gamayitavyam iti bhāvaḥ. nanv{1,
GSP28mimsvtku:2355_0: 152}atīndriyārthave saty api vākyatvād iti viśeṣayiṣyāmaḥ. pauruṣeyavacanaṃ sarvam
GSP28mimsvtku:2355_1: atīndriyārtham apramāṇam iti nānaikāntikatvam ata āha - atīndriyeti. atīndriye 'pi
GSP28mimsvtku:2355_2: hi yadā kaścid yadṛcchayā adṛṣṭapūrvārthe vākyaṃ praṇayati,
GSP28mimsvtku:2357_0: anyo nāstīti. tatra dvayor anyatareṇa niyogataḥ satyena bhavitavyam ity ekasya vākyasya
GSP28mimsvtku:2357_1: satyatā. na hīndrasadasadbhāvayor anyatarad api pramāṇāntareṇāvadhāritam. ato 'nāptavākyam
GSP28mimsvtku:2357_2: api kvacid yadṛcchayā prayuktam atīndriyārthaviṣayam eva satyaṃ dṛṣṭam iti viśiṣṭe
GSP28mimsvtku:2358: evaṃ bhāṣyakārābhiprāyam uktvā tatraiva bhāṣyaṃ yojayati -- nānyatvād ity ābhāso'ntena. atham arthaḥ -- yādṛśaṃ parair naiyāyikaiḥ sāmānyatodṛṣṭānumānam uktaṃ,
GSP28mimsvtku:2359_0: tato 'nyad idam anaikāntikahetukaṃ tadābhāsam uktam. ato 'smāt sāmānyatodṛṣṭābhāsāt
GSP28mimsvtku:2359_1: sādhyaṃ na siddhyati iti. pramāṇabhūtāt sāmānyatodṛṣṭād asya tadābhāsasyānyatvād
GSP28mimsvtku:2359_2: iti bhāṣyārtha iti vyākhyānāntaram āha -- vipakṣam iti. ayam abhiprāyaḥ -- vākyatvahetur
GSP28mimsvtku:2359_3: āptavākyeṣu satyeṣv api dṛṣṭa iti vipakṣavṛttir na sādhyaṃ sādhayatīti tad eva dūṣaṇaṃ,
GSP28mimsvtku:2360: yojanāmātraṃ tu bhidyate. mithyātve sādhye vipakṣasya satyatvasya tato 'nyatvāt tadgāmitvāc ca hetor iti bhāvaḥ || 179 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:2361: anyathā vyācaṣṭe -- yad veti. yat tad vākyatvasyāprayojakatvam api cetyādi bhāṣye darśitaṃ yad ajñātvā pareṇa sāmānyatodṛṣṭānumānam uktaṃ,
GSP28mimsvtku:2362: tad eva na anyatvād iti bhāṣyakāreṇoddhāṭitam. anyaḥ khalu aprāmāṇyasya prayojako hetur visaṃvādaḥ,
GSP28mimsvtku:2363: na vākyatvam. na cāsau vede sambhavati,
GSP28mimsvtku:2364_0: apauruṣeyatvāt. puruṣāśrayatvāc ca śabde doṣāṇām. aduṣṭakāraṇajanityasya ca jñānasya
GSP28mimsvtku:2364_1: visaṃvādāsambhavāt. naitad evam iti pratyayaviparyāso visaṃvādaḥ katham aduṣṭakāraṇaje
GSP28mimsvtku:2365_0: 153}vyākhyānāntaram āha -- viṣayasyeti. pūrvaṃ hi paramatena sādhyānāsaṅgī dṛṣṭānta
GSP28mimsvtku:2365_1: ity uktam. saiveyaṃ sādhyānāsaṅgitā viṣayānyatvād ucyate. anyo hi puṃvākyasya viṣayo
GSP28mimsvtku:2365_2: vaktrabhiprāyaḥ. na ca tatra mithyātvam abhyabhicārāt. pūrvaṃ tv arthaviṣayavyāpāram
GSP28mimsvtku:2365_3: upetyānyatvam uktam. adhunā punaḥ paramata eva sthitvā sādhyānāsaṅgitocyata iti || 180 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:2366_0: aparam api na hy anyasya vaitathye 'nyasyāpi vaitathyam iti bhāṣyam. tasyārthaṃ darśayati
GSP28mimsvtku:2366_1: -- na hīti. na hy anyasyetyādinā bhāṣyeṇa nānyasyānyathātve 'nyasya mṛṣārthatā bhavatīty
GSP28mimsvtku:2366_2: ucyata iti. etad eva vivṛṇoti -- vivakṣeti. vivakṣā hi vaktus tatrāyathārthagocaratvān
GSP28mimsvtku:2367_0: tasya tatpratipādanamātreṇa prāmāṇyāt. tasyāś ca tataḥ pratibandhabalāt siddheḥ.
GSP28mimsvtku:2367_1: ato na vākyaṃ mṛṣārtham iti[496]siddhā sādhyānāsaṅgiteti. prathamapakṣe[497]pi caivaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:2367_2: na hītyādi bhāṣyaṃ vyākhyātavyam. nānyasyānāptavākyasya mṛṣārthatve 'nyasyāptavākyasyāpi
GSP28mimsvtku:2367_3: tad bhavatīti. satye vipakṣe puṃvākyatvasya bhāvād anaikāntiko hetur iti. evam eva
GSP28mimsvtku:2367_4: dvitīye tṛtīye ca visaṃvādasya vaitathye sādhye 'nyasya vākyatvasya vaitathyaṃ sādhyaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:2367_5: na sambhavatīti vyākhyeyam. caturthe tu vārttikasthā vyākhyeti || 181 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:2372: anyac ca na hi devadattasya śyāmattva ityādi bhāṣyaṃ,
GSP28mimsvtku:2373: tasyābhiprāyam āha -- śyāmatva iti. yathā śyāmatve sādhye puṃstvam anaikāntikaṃ gaurādiṣv abhāvād,
GSP28mimsvtku:2374_0: evaṃ vākyatvam api satyāptavākyasya sādhāraṇam iti sādhāraṇyapradarśanārthaṃ vedaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:2374_1: nidarśanam iti. anye tu duṣṭasādhanaprayoge duṣṭam evottaraṃ deyam iti manvānā vikalpasamā
GSP28mimsvtku:2374_2: nāma jātir iyaṃ bhāṣyakāreṇa nānyatvād ity uktam{1,
GSP28mimsvtku:2375_0: 154}ity āhur ity āha -- parokter iti. dharmāntaravikalpanāt sādhyadharmavikalpāpādanaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:2375_1: vikalpasamā. sā caivaṃ darśanīyā -- vākyam eva kiñcit puruṣavākyād anyad dṛṣṭaṃ yathā
GSP28mimsvtku:2375_2: vedavākyam. kiñcid ananyad yathā tad eva. evam anyānanyatvayor api vikalpanāt[498]satyamithyātvayor
GSP28mimsvtku:2375_3: api vākyatvāviśeṣe vikalpo bhaviṣyatīti nāvaśyaṃ vākyatvān mithyātvaṃ sidhyatīti.
GSP28mimsvtku:2380_0: evaṃ tāvan nānyatvād iti dūṣaṇoktir iyam ity uktam. idānīṃ sādhana vacanam evedam
GSP28mimsvtku:2380_1: iti vyākhyānāntaram āha -- yad veti. pareṇa hi mithyātve sādhite siddhāntī hetvantareṇa
GSP28mimsvtku:2380_2: sayatvaṃ sādhayati. pramāṇam anumānam. tadupariṣṭād vakṣyata iti. kīdṛśaṃ punas tat
GSP28mimsvtku:2380_3: pramāṇam ity āha -- viruddheti. yadi tulyabalatvaṃ,
GSP28mimsvtku:2381: viruddhāvyabhicārī nāma saṃśayahetuḥ. atha siddhāntahetur balīyān,
GSP28mimsvtku:2383: satyatvahetor[500]balīyastvād anyatvād asatyatvahetūnām iti bhāṣyārtha iti || 183 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:2387_0: tad eva[501]satyatve pramāṇam upanyasyati -- codaneti. idaṃ caikāntikahetukam anumānaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:2387_1: sāmānyatodṛṣṭād anaikāntikahetukād balavat. anaikāntikatā ca kevalasya saviśeṣaṇasya
GSP28mimsvtku:2387_2: ca hetor uktaiva. ato 'nenaiva balavatā mithyātvānumānaṃ bādhyata iti || 184 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:2391: asminn eva sādhye 'param api hetudvayam āptoktinidarśanenaiva darśayati -- tatheti. deśakālādibhedādau bādhavarjanād ity anvayaḥ. atra ca{1,
GSP28mimsvtku:2392: 155}bādhavarjanād iti hetor liṅgākṣabuddhyor api dṛṣṭāntatā sambhavaty eva. sādhāraṇyena tvāptoktipratyayo nidarśita iti || 185 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:2394: sarvavākyānāṃ kṛtakatvād ata āha -- akartṛkatveti. sādhayiṣyate hi vedānām[502]akartṛkatvam,
GSP28mimsvtku:2395: ato nāsiddho hetur iti. evamādisatyatvānumānābhiprāyeṇedam anyatvam uktavān bhāṣyakṛd ity āha -- evam iti. ādiśabdena sambandhākṣepoktā hetavo 'nusandhātavyāḥ.
GSP28mimsvtku:2401: atrāparaṃ sāmānyatodṛṣṭasyāgamabādhapradarśanārthaṃ bhāṣyam api ca puruṣavacanasādharmyād vedavacanaṃ mithyety anumānaṃ,
GSP28mimsvtku:2402: pratyakṣas tu vedavacane pratyayaḥ iti. tad yadi vākyagocarapratyayābhiprāyaṃ,
GSP28mimsvtku:2403_0: tad ayuktam. anāptavākye 'pi samānatvāt. tatsvarūpapratyayo 'pi pratyakṣa eva. na
GSP28mimsvtku:2403_1: ca[503]tanmithyā. arthas tu vedavākyānām atīndriya iti pratyakṣasūtre vakṣyate. ato
GSP28mimsvtku:2404: sāpy ayuktā. śūnyavāde tasyāpy anumeyatāyā vakṣyamāṇatvāt. ato vyākhyeyam,
GSP28mimsvtku:2405_0: ata āha -- pratyakṣa iti. ayam abhiprāyaḥ -- mukhyapratyakṣatvāsambhavād gauṇaḥ pratyakṣaśabdaḥ.
GSP28mimsvtku:2405_1: dṛḍhaṃ hi pratyakṣaṃ prathamaṃ ca svataḥpramāṇaṃ parato visaṃvādād apramāṇam. etac
GSP28mimsvtku:2405_2: catuṣṭayānyatam aguṇavivakṣayā pratyakṣaśabda āgamika eva pratyaye pratyuktaḥ. so 'pi dṛḍhaḥ,
GSP28mimsvtku:2407_1: prāmāṇyāprāmāṇyayoḥ svaparāśrayatvaṃ sarvapramāṇānāṃ sādhitam. ataḥ pratyakṣatulyo
GSP28mimsvtku:2407_2: 'yam pratyayaḥ katham anyathā bhavati. tad[504]etad viparītārthapratijñānam[505]anena virudhyata iti.{1,
GSP28mimsvtku:2408_0: 156} na ceha vedaprāmāṇyam asmākam asiddham iti pratyavasthātuṃ śakyam. nāstikānām
GSP28mimsvtku:2408_1: api tacchravaṇe asandigdhāviparyastajñānajanmano 'viśeṣān nityāgamajanitāyāś ca saṃvido
GSP28mimsvtku:2408_2: duṣṭakāraṇajanitatvāsambhavāt. pauruṣeyāgamavādibhis tv ātmātmanaiva baddhvā samarpita
GSP28mimsvtku:2408_3: iti na te pareṣāṃ mithyātvaṃ sādhayatām āgamavirodham udbhāvayitum utsahante. puruṣāśrayadoṣāśaṅkayā
GSP28mimsvtku:2408_4: svāgamānāṃ[506]dūṣitatvāt. sarvaṃ cedaṃ bhāṣyoktam eva vārttikakṛtā prāg evodgrāhitaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:2415_0: mukhya eva vā pratyakṣaśabdo vyākhyeya ity āha -- jñānābhāvaś ceti. evaṃ mithyātvavādī
GSP28mimsvtku:2415_1: vaktavyaḥ -- tredhā khalu mithyātvam. iha ca na tāvat saṃśayaviparyayau sta iti bhāṣya
GSP28mimsvtku:2415_2: evoktam. tad yadi jñānābhāva eva mithyātvaṃ sādhyate,
GSP28mimsvtku:2416: tatra te pratyakṣavirodhaḥ. pratyakṣam eva hi bhavatsiddhānte jñānam. yadi[507]kāmam asyaiva śrotriyasya tadanumeyaṃ[508]tattvaṃ,
GSP28mimsvtku:2417: pratyakṣam eva vedavākyaśravaṇād utpannaṃ jñānaṃ vilokayamānaḥ kathaṃ tadabhāvātmakaṃ mithyātvamattha iti || 188 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:2422_0: evaṃ tāvadāgamavirodho 'nena bhāṣyeṇokta iti vyākhyātam. idānīm asyaiva tātparyāntaraṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:2422_1: darśayati -- yathaiveti. ayam arthaḥ -- etad anena bhāṣyeṇocyate puṃvākyasādharmyād
GSP28mimsvtku:2422_2: bhavān mithyātvaṃ sādhayati. tad yathaivaitan mithyātvaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ,
GSP28mimsvtku:2423_0: tathaiva vedavākyenāpi mithyā bhavitavayam. tac ca bādhakādhīnaṃ mithyātvaṃ dṛṣṭam
GSP28mimsvtku:2423_1: iti vede 'pi tathaiva bhavet. na ca tathā sambhavatīti sādhitam eva. ataḥ pratyakṣo[509]hi
GSP28mimsvtku:2423_2: dṛḍho vedavacane pratyayaḥ. nāsau kvacid bādhyate. ato viśeṣaviruddho hetur iti || 189 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:2428_0: 157} evaṃ codanālakṣaṇatvam upapādya bhāṣyakāreṇopasaṃhṛtaṃ tasmāc codanālakṣaṇaḥ
GSP28mimsvtku:2428_1: śreyaskaraḥ iti. atra ca yathāsūtram eva nigantavye śreyaskarapadaprayoge 'bhiprāyam
GSP28mimsvtku:2428_2: āha -- dharma iti. dharmapadārtham eva vyākhyātuṃ śreyaskaraśabdaḥ prayuktaḥ. tatprayoge
GSP28mimsvtku:2428_3: hi codyaparihārakrameṇa śreyaskaro dharma ity āveditaṃ bhavatīti || 190 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:2429_0: atra bhāṣyakāreṇa evaṃ tarhi śreyaskaro jijñāsitavyaḥ iti paricodanāpūrvam uktaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:2429_1: ya eva śreyaskaraḥ sa eva dharmaśabdenocyate iti. tatra kasyānena prakāreṇa dharmatokteti
GSP28mimsvtku:2429_2: na jñāyate. atas tadvivekārtham āha -- śreya iti. śreyaśśabdo 'yaṃ puruṣaprītau prasiddhaḥ.
GSP28mimsvtku:2429_3: tatkāraṇāni ca dravyaguṇakarmāṇi codanāsāmarthyād avagamyante. atas teṣv eva śreyaskaratayā
GSP28mimsvtku:2430_0: atrāparaṃ bhāṣyaṃ - yo hi yāgam anutiṣṭhati taṃ dhārmika iti samācakṣate iti. tasyārthaḥ
GSP28mimsvtku:2430_2: laukikā upacaranti. tad evam upapadyate yadi yāgādir dharmaḥ,
GSP28mimsvtku:2431: yo hi dharmaṃ carati sa dharmikaḥ. ato yāgāder dharmatvam. ata eva hi taccaritari dhārmikapadaprayogo ghaṭate,
GSP28mimsvtku:2432: nānyatheti. tad ayuktam. nāvaśyam ayaṃ prayogo yāgādīnāṃ eva dharmatāṃ gamayati,
GSP28mimsvtku:2433: nṛguṇāpūrvādidharmatvenāpy asyopapatteḥ. yāgādikāry eva hy apūrvādy api karoti. tat kuto 'yaṃ vivekaḥ yāgacaraṇād ayaṃ dhārmikaḥ nāpūrvādicaraṇād iti,
GSP28mimsvtku:2434: ata āha -- anyad iti. ayam abhiprāyaḥ -- satyaṃ,
GSP28mimsvtku:2435: yāgādyanuniṣpādinyapūrvasiddhir iti na tu tadyāgādisādhyam apūrvaṃ prayoktṛbhir nirdiśyate. śaktirūpatvāt tasya. śakteś{1,
GSP28mimsvtku:2436: 158}cātīndriyatvāt. atas taddarśanena taccaritari dhārmikapadaprayogo na ghaṭate. tasmād yāgādiyogād eva dhārmikatvasamākhyānam iti niścīyate.
GSP28mimsvtku:2437: kiṃ punar yāgādīnāṃ svarūpam eva dharmaḥ. yady evaṃ pūrvāparavirodhaḥ. pūrveṇa tāvadukataṃ tādrūpyeṇa ca dharmatvam iti. apareṇa ca
GSP28mimsvtku:2442_0: iti. tad api ca rūpaṃ yāgādīnām atīndriyatayā nāpūrvavat pratyakṣādidṛśyam yāgādisvarūpābhidhāne
GSP28mimsvtku:2442_1: tv anantā[511]ekasya dharmapadasya śaktayaḥ kalpanīyā bhaveyuḥ. kathaṃ khalv ekayaiva
GSP28mimsvtku:2442_2: śaktyāyaṃ nānājātīyeṣu dravyaguṇakarmasu vartate. syād etat -- sakalānugataprītisādhanatvavacanād
GSP28mimsvtku:2442_3: adoṣa iti. na. tasyāpy atīndriyatvād ity uktam. viśeṣaṇamātrābhidhānaprasaṅgāc ca.
GSP28mimsvtku:2442_4: prītisādhanaṃ hi nānabhidhāya prītiṃ śakyate 'bhidhātum iti saiva pūrvataram abhidheyā
GSP28mimsvtku:2442_5: bhavet. evañ ca tanmātropakṣayiṇy abhidhāvyāpāre na tadvi[512]śiṣṭābhidhānasiddhiḥ.
GSP28mimsvtku:2442_6: gavādiśabdavat sāmaśabdavac ca. yatra hy akhaṇḍena śabdena viśiṣṭo bodhyate tatra
GSP28mimsvtku:2442_7: viśeṣaṇam eva śabdasya vācyam iti siddham. ata eva sāmaśabdo gītimātravacano na saktāṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:2442_8: gītimāheti vakṣyati. vārttikakāreṇāpy apūrvaviśiṣṭaṃ karma dharma iti nirākurvatoktaṃ -
GSP28mimsvtku:2449_0: iti. tad idaṃ phalaviśiṣṭābhidhāne 'pi samānam. syān mataṃ vidheyo dharmapadārtha
GSP28mimsvtku:2449_1: iti. tan na. evaṃ sati vidher atyantapratyāsannā bhāvanaiva vidheyatayā dharmaśabdavācyatām
GSP28mimsvtku:2449_2: aśnuvīta. sā hi tryaṃśā vidhīyate iti siddhāntaḥ. tadvaram apūrvam eva dharmapadavācyaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:2449_3: tadanvayavyatirekānuvidhānād dharmapadasya. tathā hi phalakāle 'saty api karmaṇi
GSP28mimsvtku:2449_4: apūrvasattayaiva dharmavān ayam ity upacaranto dṛśyante. satsv api yāgādiṣu vaiguṇyād
GSP28mimsvtku:2449_5: alabdhāpūrvaniṣpattiṣu na dharmapadaṃ prayuñjānā dṛśyante. ato vaktavyo dharmapadārthaḥ.
GSP28mimsvtku:2451_0: 159} sa ucyate -- dharmaśabdo 'yaṃ pācakādivat sabhāga eva dhṛtisādhane vartate.
GSP28mimsvtku:2451_1: dhṛtiś ca prītiparyāyaḥ. ayaṃ ca yathopadiṣṭānugatapṛṣodarādimadhye paṭhitaḥ prakṛtipratyayavibhāgenohitavyaḥ.
GSP28mimsvtku:2452_0: [513]maninpratyayena ca tatsādhanam abhidhīyate. na caivamāhāravihārādau prasaṅgaḥ.
GSP28mimsvtku:2452_1: paṅkajādivad yogarūḍhyabhyupagamāt codanālakṣaṇaśreyaskaramātrābhidhānāt. na ca yoganirapekṣā samudāyaśaktiḥ,
GSP28mimsvtku:2453: yena viśeṣaṇamātre prasaṅgo bhavet. na ca bhāvanāyāṃ prasaṅgaḥ,
GSP28mimsvtku:2455_1: eṣṭavyam. pratītisādhanatvasya vihitatvasya ca prītisādhane vihite ca dharmapadopacārāt.
GSP28mimsvtku:2455_2: prāyikaṃ caivākhaṇḍasya viśeṣaṇamātrābhidhānam. asatyāṃ tu gatau sarvābhidhānam eva.
GSP28mimsvtku:2455_3: tulyavac ceha dharmapadāt prītis tatsādhanaṃ ca vihitam avagamyate iti kiṃ na śabdenocyate.
GSP28mimsvtku:2455_4: yad etad api rūpam adṛśyam ity uktam. tan na,
GSP28mimsvtku:2456_0: vedād avagamāt. abhyudayasādhanaṃ yāga ity etāvad eva viditavanto 'pūrvam agaṇayitvaiva
GSP28mimsvtku:2456_1: yāgādikartṛṣu dhārmikaśabdam upacaranto dṛśyante. atas tādrūpyamātreṇaiva te dharmā
GSP28mimsvtku:2456_2: iti niścīyante. ataḥ siddham abhyudayasādhanaṃ vihitaṃ dharmapadārtha iti. yat tūktaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:2456_3: viguṇe prayogābhāvān na yāgādir dharma iti. tan na. tathāvidhasyābhyudayasādhanatvābhāvāt
GSP28mimsvtku:2456_4: tasya cādharmatvāt kathaṃ tatra dharmaśabdaḥ prayujyate. phalakāle tu dharmapadaprayogo
GSP28mimsvtku:2456_5: 'bhyudayasādhanābhiprāya eva. asti hi tat tadānīm api. śaktirūpeṇādhriyamāṇam api
GSP28mimsvtku:2456_6: svarūpeṇa. yathā cāpūrvaṃ na dharmapadavācyaṃ tathā vakṣyata eveti || 192 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:2460_0: evaṃ tāvallaukikaprayogānusāreṇa[514]yāgādayo dharmā ity uktam. api ca yeyaṃ paśvādiṣu
GSP28mimsvtku:2460_1: dharmaphalatvaprasiddhiḥ tayāpi yāgādīnām eva dharmatvam avagamyata ity āha -- paśvādīnīti.
GSP28mimsvtku:2460_2: ayam arthaḥ -- paśvādīni tāvad dharmaphalatayā prasiddhāni. ato yasyaiva tāni[515]phalāni
GSP28mimsvtku:2460_3: sa eva dharma iti bhavati matiḥ. citrādiphalatayā caitāni śāstrād avagatānīti citrādayo
GSP28mimsvtku:2460_4: dharmā iti upasaṃharati -- tasmād iti. na kevalaṃ loke. vede 'pi yāgādiṣv eva dharmapadaprasiddhir{1,
GSP28mimsvtku:2461_0: 160}iti darśayatā bhāṣyakāreṇa darśitaṃ yajñena yajñam ayajanta devāḥ. tāni dharmāṇīti.
GSP28mimsvtku:2461_1: tad darśayati -- dharmāṇīti. asyām api śrutau yajñasamānādhikaraṇo dharmaśabda iti
GSP28mimsvtku:2461_2: tadvacano niścīyata iti. kathaṃ punar viliṅgo visaṅkhyaś ca dharmaśabdaḥ yajñasamānādhikaraṇatayā
GSP28mimsvtku:2461_3: nirdiśyate. tatsāmānādhikaraṇye hi sa dharma iti bhavet. ekasyaiva yajñasya prakṛtatvāt,
GSP28mimsvtku:2463: ata āha -- liṅgeti. samujjhitaliṅgasaṅkhyāviśeṣo dharmaśabda evātra bhāṣyakṛtā darśitaḥ. tadvṛttasya prakṛtagrāhitvāt,
GSP28mimsvtku:2464_0: anyasya cāprakaraṇān niścīyate yajñasamānādhikaraṇo dharmaśabda iti. liṅgasaṃkhyayoś
GSP28mimsvtku:2464_1: ca chāndaso vyatyaya iti bhāvaḥ. ādyaś cātra yajñaśabdo yajñasādhanalakṣaṇārthaḥ.
GSP28mimsvtku:2469_0: evaṃ tāvad bhāṣyakārānusāreṇa dharmapadārtho vyākhyātaḥ. matāntarāṇīdānīm upanyasya
GSP28mimsvtku:2469_1: nirasyati -- antaḥkaraṇeti na dṛṣṭo'ntena. sāṅkhyā hy antaḥkaraṇasya manaso vṛttiviśeṣaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:2469_2: dharmam āśritāḥ. śākyās tu cittasyaiva cittāntareṇa[516]bhāvitāṃ śubhāṃ vāsanām.
GSP28mimsvtku:2469_3: ārhatās tu kāryārambhakān sūkṣmān mūrtimataḥ pudgalān dharmam āhuḥ. pudgalaśabdas
GSP28mimsvtku:2469_4: tv ārhatais teṣv eva paribhāṣitaḥ. vaiśeṣikās tv ātmano viśeṣaguṇā dharmā iti pratipannāḥ.
GSP28mimsvtku:2469_5: mīmāṃsakaikadeśinas tv apūrvajanmany eva dharmaśabdam upacaranti. varṇitaś ca teṣām
GSP28mimsvtku:2469_6: abhiprāyaḥ. apūrvajanmanīti cāpūrvaśabdanirvacanam. na pūrvaṃ janmāsyety arthaḥ.
GSP28mimsvtku:2469_7: tad dhi na karmaṇaḥ pūrvaṃ jāyata eva,
GSP28mimsvtku:2470_0: kṛte karmaṇi tanniṣpatteḥ. eteṣu sarveṣu ca loke dharmaśabdaprayogo na dṛṣṭaḥ. laukikaś
GSP28mimsvtku:2470_1: ca prayogaḥ śabdād arthāvadhāraṇe mūlam. ato na te dharmāḥ. kathaṃ punar antaḥkaraṇavṛtter
GSP28mimsvtku:2470_2: dharmatvaṃ nirākriyate. mīmāṃsakair api taddharmatvam iṣyata eva. yāgādyanīkṣaṇādisaṅkalpānāṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:2472_0: ātmakartṛkatvād upaniṣatsu tathā darśanāt. śrūyate hi -- ya ātmā apahatapāpmā virajo
GSP28mimsvtku:2472_1: vimṛtyur viśoko vijighatso 'pipāsaḥ satyakāmaḥ satyasaṅkalpaḥ iti. tathā sa yadi
GSP28mimsvtku:2472_2: pitṛlokakāmo bhavati saṅkalpād evāsya pitaraḥ samuttiṣṭhantīti. kṛdyogalakṣaṇā kartari
GSP28mimsvtku:2472_3: ṣaṣṭhī ātmakartṛkatāṃ saṅkalpasya darśayatīti na manovṛtter dharmatvam. cittānāṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:2472_5: tad upekṣyaiva tāvat prayogābhāvān na cittavāsanā dharma ity uktam. puṇyāḥ pudgalā iti yadyaṇavaḥ,
GSP28mimsvtku:2473: na teṣu dharmaśabdaprayogo loke dṛṣṭaḥ. athānye te,
GSP28mimsvtku:2474: tarhi pramāṇābhāvāt kutaḥ setsyanti. kutas tarāṃ ca teṣu dharmaśabdaprayogo 'labdhasadbhāveṣu. puṃguṇas tu nityo vā vaibhavādivat,
GSP28mimsvtku:2475_0: kāryo vā sukhādivat. nityatve anuṣṭhānavaiyarthyam. kāryaṃ tu nāpūrvādyanyatamam
GSP28mimsvtku:2475_1: ātmasamavāyinaṃ guṇabhedam upalabhāmahe. apūrvaṃ tu yathā na dharmas tathoktam eva.
GSP28mimsvtku:2475_2: aprayogād iti vakṣyati ca. yad api ca kartṛphaladāyyātmaguṇaḥ saṃyogajo dṛṣṭaḥ kāryavirodhīti
GSP28mimsvtku:2478_0: smṛtihetusaṃskārasādhāraṇyāc ca. tayor apy evaṃlakṣaṇakatvena dharmatvaprasaṅgāt.
GSP28mimsvtku:2478_1: kartṛphaladāyīti cāvyāpakaḥ. śrāddhe tv akartṝṇāṃ pitrādīnāṃ tṛptiphalaśruteḥ. vaiśvānaryāś
GSP28mimsvtku:2478_2: ca pitṛkartṛkāyā eva putragāmi phalam iti vaḥ siddhāntaḥ. vaiśvānaraṃ dvādaśakapālaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:2478_3: nirvapet putre jāte iti hi vidhāya āmnāyate yasmin jāta etām iṣṭiṃ nirvapati pūta
GSP28mimsvtku:2478_4: eva sa tejasvyannāda indriyāvī paśumān bhavatīti. śāstraphalaṃ prayoktari (3.7.18)
GSP28mimsvtku:2479_0: ity utsargataḥ prāptapitṛgāmitā putragāmiphalaśrutyāpodyate. ataḥ siddhaṃ nāntaḥkaraṇavṛttyādayo
GSP28mimsvtku:2479_1: dharmā iti. nanu śreyassādhane tāvad dharmapadaprayogo bhavadbhir apīṣyate. ete ca
GSP28mimsvtku:2479_2: śreyassādhanā iti kathaṃ teṣu dharmaśabdaprayogo na dṛṣṭa ity ucyate. ata āha --
GSP28mimsvtku:2479_3: na ceti. na tāvad eṣāṃ phalasādhanatā pratyakṣādigamyā,
GSP28mimsvtku:2486: 162}āha -- astv antaḥkaraṇavṛttyādayo na śreyassādhanatayāvagamyanta iti na dharmā iti. apūrvaṃ tu prītisādhanam eva,
GSP28mimsvtku:2487_0: atikrānte karmaṇi tata eva phalasiddheḥ. yāgasādhanavādino 'pi hi apūrvaṃ kṛtveti
GSP28mimsvtku:2487_1: vyācakṣāṇā apūrvasiddhim antarbhāvayanti. parair apy uktam -- ārambhāt svargaḥ karmaṇā
GSP28mimsvtku:2487_2: cārambhaḥ iti. ārambha ity apūrvam eva samācakṣate. sa hy ārabhyate. ato 'pūrvaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:2488: ata āha -- na ceti. ayam abhiprāyaḥ -- kim idam apūrvaṃ nāma. yadi tāvat karmaśaktiḥ phalaśaktir vā,
GSP28mimsvtku:2489: nāsau sādhanaṃ sādhyaṃ vā. śakter akārakatvāt,
GSP28mimsvtku:2490: puruṣābhilaṣitaphalānuṣaṅgikatayā siddhatvāc ca. yadi vastvantaram evāpūrvam ucyate,
GSP28mimsvtku:2491: tad apy ayuktam. tasya sādhyasādhanayor anyatararūpānanupraveśitayā pratyetum aśakteḥ. na hi tat svargasya sādhanaṃ yāgasya ca sādhyaṃ śabdād avagacchāmaḥ. nānyataḥ pramāṇāt,
GSP28mimsvtku:2493_0: pramāṇāntarāgocare vyutpattyabhāvāt. apadārthasya cāvākyaviṣayatvāt. ataḥ sādhyasādhanabhāvād
GSP28mimsvtku:2493_1: anyathāpi[517]pramāṇāntareṇa na vastvantarabhūtam apūrvaṃ śakyāvagamam. etadrūpadvayarahitasya[518]tasya
GSP28mimsvtku:2499: api ca yady apūrvaṃ yāgasya sādhyaṃ svargasya ca sādhanam iṣyate,
GSP28mimsvtku:2500_0: tataḥ śrutahānir aśrutakalpanā cety āha -- śrutasādhaneti. tādrūpyaṃ tena bhāvanā
GSP28mimsvtku:2500_1: ca vākyārthaḥ. sā ca sādhyasādhanāpekṣiṇī yathā svargayāgāv eva gṛhṇāti tathā bhāvārthādhikaraṇe
GSP28mimsvtku:2500_2: vakṣyate. ihāpi ca bhāvanāpañjaraprakaraṇe. atas tat tāvad dheyam aśrutaṃ ca. atīndriyasyāvastuno
GSP28mimsvtku:2500_3: gaganakusumādisannibhasya sādhyasādhanatvaṃ kalpanīyam ity aśrutakalpaneti. anyatararūpānabhyupagame
GSP28mimsvtku:2500_4: nissvabhāvasyābhāva eva bhaved ityabhiprāyeṇāha -- vyatireke tv arūpateti || 198 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:2502_0: 163} idaṃ ca prauḍhipradarśanārtham uktam. na tv etadrūpadvayarahitasya dharmaśabdavācyatopapadyata
GSP28mimsvtku:2502_1: iti. ato na tattvāntaram apūrvam. kin tu phalaṃ kartum abhipravṛttasya yāgāder eva śaktimātraṃ,
GSP28mimsvtku:2503: paśvāder votpattāv abhipravṛttasya śaktimātram eva sūkṣmāvasthā apūrvam.
GSP28mimsvtku:2504: na tattvāntaram. na ca karmaśaktir eva phalasādhanaṃ,
GSP28mimsvtku:2506_0: kāṣṭhādīnāṃ jvalanādivyāpāravyavadhāne tatprasaṅgāt. ataḥ karmaiva śaktaṃ phalasādhanaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:2506_1: na śaktir iti śāstrād avagamyamāne kathaṃ śakter dharmapadavācyatetyabhiprāyeṇāha
GSP28mimsvtku:2507_0: itaś ca phalasādhanaśaktir na dharma ity āha -- śaktaya iti. asyārthaḥ -- bhāvaśaktayaḥ
GSP28mimsvtku:2507_1: khalu sādhāraṇaśabdair eva yogyatāśaktisāmarthyādibhir dṛṣṭābhidhānāḥ na viśeṣato
GSP28mimsvtku:2507_2: bhāvaśabdair upākhyāyante. dharmaśabdas tu viśeṣato bhāvaśabdaḥ. anyatraivañ jātīyake
GSP28mimsvtku:2507_3: 'prayogāt. na hi laukikānāṃ dravyādīnāṃ śaktayo dharmapadenopākhyāyante. ato na yāgādīnāṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:2508: atrāparam arthapadavyākhyānārthaṃ bhāṣyam -- ubhayam iha codanayā lakṣyate artho 'narthaś ca. ko 'rthaḥ,
GSP28mimsvtku:2510: yaḥ pratyavāyāya śyeno vajra iṣur ityevamādiḥ. tatrānartho dharma ukto mā bhūd ityevamartham arthagrahaṇam iti. asya kilāyam arthaḥ -- yadi codanālakṣaṇo dharma ity etāvad ucyeta,
GSP28mimsvtku:2511_0: ato 'narthasya codanālakṣaṇasya śyenāder dharmatā bhavet. anarthaś cāsau pratyavāyakaratvena.
GSP28mimsvtku:2511_1: atas tannivṛttyartho 'rthaśabda iti. tad etad ākṣipati -- purastād iti. asyārthaḥ
GSP28mimsvtku:2511_2: -- ekāṅgavikalaṃ hi pratyudāharaṇaṃ bhavati.[519] na dvyaṅgavikalam. tad yad eva
GSP28mimsvtku:2512_0: tadarthagrahaṇena vyāvartanīyam. anarthaś ca codanālakṣaṇapadena vyāvartitaḥ. vidhāyakasya
GSP28mimsvtku:2512_1: vākyasya codanātvāt. tena cānarthahetoḥ hiṃsāyā alakṣyamāṇatvāt. prāṇaviyogaphalo
GSP28mimsvtku:2512_2: hi vyāpāro hiṃsā. sā ca na hiṃsyād iti śrutyā niṣiddhety anarthaḥ. sa ca niṣedhalakṣitaḥ
GSP28mimsvtku:2512_3: na tu codanālakṣita iti codanālakṣaṇapadenaiva tadvyāvṛttisiddher anarthakam arthapadam
GSP28mimsvtku:2512_4: iti. purastād iti. codaneti kriyāyāḥ pravartakaṃ vacanam ity atrety arthaḥ || 201 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:2517: te ca codanālakṣaṇā eveti. tad ayuktam. yadi nāma śyenādayaś codanālakṣaṇāḥ,
GSP28mimsvtku:2518_0: na tv arthapadena vyāvartayituṃ śakyante. niṣedhapramāṇakatvād anarthatvasya. teṣāṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:2518_1: ca vidhiviṣayāṇāṃ niṣedhāgocaratvād ity abhiprāyeṇāha -- codaneti. tad iha yo 'nartho
GSP28mimsvtku:2520: na te 'narthā ity ubhayataḥpāśā rajjur iti || 202 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:2521: syād etat -- yadi nāma niṣedhapramāṇakam anarthatvaṃ na. evam api śyenādau na sambhavati,
GSP28mimsvtku:2522_0: vidhiviṣayāṇām api niṣedhaviṣayatvasambhavādatirātra iva ṣoḍaśinaḥ. ata āha -- yady
GSP28mimsvtku:2522_1: apīti. ayam abhiprāyaḥ -- na tāvad vidhyavaruddhe viṣaye niṣedhaḥ sambhavati. yady api kvacid bhavati,
GSP28mimsvtku:2523: tathāpi na tādṛśān niṣedhād anarthatvaṃ vijñāyate. kevalo hi niṣedho 'narthatvam āpādayati,
GSP28mimsvtku:2524: na vidhisahitaḥ yathodāhṛta eva ṣoḍaśini. na hy asāv anarthaḥ,
GSP28mimsvtku:2526_0: ubhayathāpi kratuphalasampado 'viśeṣāt.[520]ato yadi nāma śyeno niṣidhyeta naivam
GSP28mimsvtku:2526_1: apy abhicāravidhinā vihito 'narthatvaṃ pratipadyate. kevalaniṣedhagocarā eva kalañjabhakṣaṇādayo 'narthāḥ,
GSP28mimsvtku:2532: 165}kiṃ punas teṣāṃ pratyavāyahetutve pramāṇam. yadi niṣedhaḥ,
GSP28mimsvtku:2533_0: tad ayuktam. nañarthaparyavasāyy eva hi niṣedhavidhir na niṣedhyasyānarthatām āpādayituṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:2533_1: kṣamaḥ. tāvataiva niṣedhavidhyarthasiddheḥ. niṣidhyamānakriyākartur eva niṣedhavidhiṣv
GSP28mimsvtku:2533_2: adhikāraḥ. tasyāṃ ca rāgādinā pravṛttaḥ pumān adhikārī labdha eveti nādhikāryantarāpekṣā.
GSP28mimsvtku:2533_3: evañ ca na tadviśeṣaṇe 'pi. adhikārī hi nānavacchinno viśeṣaṇena boddhuṃ śakyata
GSP28mimsvtku:2533_4: iti tadviśeṣaṇāpekṣā. tatra svargaputrādiśrutiṣu kāmādhikāreṣu kāmyaparyantatā siddhā.
GSP28mimsvtku:2533_6: vibhajante. niṣedhādhikāreṣu na tāvat pratyavāyaparihāraḥ sādhyatayā śrutaḥ. na ca
GSP28mimsvtku:2533_7: piṇḍapitṛyajñavat kalpayituṃ śakyate. adhikārilābhāt. uktaṃ hi -- niṣidhyamānakriyākartur
GSP28mimsvtku:2533_8: evādhikāraḥ iti. kiṃ punas tatra viśeṣaṇam. bhakṣayatir eva. nanv asau viṣayaviśeṣaṇam. satyam,
GSP28mimsvtku:2534_0: viṣayasyaiva viśeṣaṇaṃ gale pātikayā bhakṣayatir adhikāriviśeṣaṇam ākhyāyate. yatra
GSP28mimsvtku:2534_1: khalu nañarthe puruṣo niyujyate sa viṣayaḥ. na cāsau bhakṣayatinānavacchinno boddhuṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:2534_2: śakyata iti tadviśeṣaṇatayaiva paryupayuktasya bhakṣayater balād adhikāriviśeṣaṇatā
GSP28mimsvtku:2534_3: sampatsyate. eṣā hi tatra vacanavyaktiḥ yo bhakṣayet sa neti. evañ ca sampannam ubhayaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:2534_4: yaś ca viṣayo nañarthaḥ yaś ca bhakṣayati pravṛtto 'dhikārīti nādhikāryantarāpekṣāyāṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:2534_5: pramāṇam asti. na ca kiñcid adhikāre hetutayā sambaddhaṃ sādhyatayā sambadhyate.
GSP28mimsvtku:2534_6: niyogasiddhināntarīyakatvāt phalasiddheḥ. itarathā sādhyadvayāpatteḥ. evaṃ sarvatra.
GSP28mimsvtku:2534_7: kim idānīṃ pratyavāyakarāṇi. niṣiddhāni mahāpātakopapātakādīni tathā nāma. na tu
GSP28mimsvtku:2534_8: śrutiparatantrāṇām aśabdārthakalpanā mīmāṃsakānām. kim iti tarhi niṣiddhaṃ na kriyate,
GSP28mimsvtku:2535: vihitaṃ vā kim iti kriyate. vihitatvād iti cet,
GSP28mimsvtku:2536_0: samānam idaṃ niṣiddhāyāṃ kriyāyām. tad api niṣiddhatvād eva na kriyate. na hi vidhiniṣedhābhyām
GSP28mimsvtku:2536_1: anyad asti nāma hetvantaraṃ vaidikeṣu pravṛttinivṛttyoḥ. tasmān na kiñcinniṣiddhānāṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:2536_2: pratyavāyakaratve pramāṇaṃ paśyāmaḥ. kas tarhi duḥkhahetuḥ. kiṃ no viditena kāraṇena.
GSP28mimsvtku:2536_3: asti tāvad duḥkhahetuḥ tad eva hi nas tatra pramāṇam.
GSP28mimsvtku:2537: atrābhidhīyate -- niṣedhaśrutāv arthāpattir eva niṣiddhānāṃ pratyavāyakaratve pramāṇaṃ vidhiśrutāv iva vihitānām abhyudayahetutve. tathā vyutpatteḥ. yathā{1,
GSP28mimsvtku:2539_0: evaṃ vārito 'pi na tāvac cikīrṣitān nivartate yāvad duḥkhahetur ayam iti na pratipadyate.
GSP28mimsvtku:2539_1: eṣa hy āsambhavād duḥkhahetum eva trividham ahāsīd iti niṣedhaśrāvī duḥkhahetur ayaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:2539_2: niṣedhaviṣaya iti pratipadyate. yat tv adhikārilābhe na kalpanābījam iti. tan na.
GSP28mimsvtku:2539_4: eva sarvatrādhikārasamarthanāt. yā tu viṣayaviśeṣaṇatā niṣedhagocarāṇāṃ kriyāṇām uktā,
GSP28mimsvtku:2540_1: atyantānupākhyeyanañarthavādināṃ ca sutarām avidhiviṣayatvaṃ tadarthasya. ato nātra
GSP28mimsvtku:2540_3: evātra nañ. eṣā cātra vacanavyaktiḥ yad dhanyāt tan neti. vakṣyati ca -- bhāvavārikā
GSP28mimsvtku:2540_4: naño vṛttir iti. ato yeṣām eva nātyantam avastvātmā nañarthaḥ,
GSP28mimsvtku:2541: teṣām eva tāvat tadartho 'bhidhīyata iti yuktam abhidhātum iti. api ca yad etad viṣayaviśeṣaṇatayopayuktasya punaradhikāriviśeṣaṇatvakalpanaṃ,
GSP28mimsvtku:2542_0: tad api na caturaśram iva manyāmahe. viṣayaviśeṣaṇaṃ hi sarvam apūrvavat sādhyatayāgnīṣomīyasauryādiṣu
GSP28mimsvtku:2542_1: samadhigacchanto dṛśyante evaṃ yāgaṃ kuryād iti. adhikāriviśeṣaṇaṃ tu siddhaṃ yat
GSP28mimsvtku:2542_2: svargakāmajīvanabhedanādimān iti. tat katham eka eva bhakṣayatiḥ siddhasādhyabhāvam
GSP28mimsvtku:2542_3: anubhavatīti sambhāvayāmaḥ. nirdoṣāś ca niṣedhādhikārā iti lokaśāstraviruddham abhidhīyamānaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:2542_4: nāstikyam evāpādayati. duḥkhotpattau kiṃ no viditena kāraṇeneti[522]nissaraṇopāyamātram.
GSP28mimsvtku:2542_5: naivaṃvidhenottareṇa śiṣyāṇāṃ bhrāntir ādhātum ucitā. na tāvad ahetukāni duḥkhāni,
GSP28mimsvtku:2543: abhūtvā bhavanāt. na vihitahetukāni.[523]teṣāṃ śrutāśrutānekavidhābhyudayahetutvāt. na cāvihitāpratiṣiddhahetukāni,
GSP28mimsvtku:2544: teṣām api varjanīyatvāpatteḥ. ko[524]hi prekṣāvān duḥkhahetuṃ na pariharati. pāriśeṣyān niṣiddhānām eva duḥkhahetutvam āstheyam. kathaṃ tadapramāṇam abhidhīyate. pāriśeṣyaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:2545_0: pramāṇam astu[525]na śāstram iti cet. evañjātīyakeṣv anumānasyāpravṛtteḥ. aśrutaphalānāṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:2545_1: ca vihitānām api nityānāṃ hetutvasambhavān na pāriśeṣyalābhaḥ. tasmāt śabdapramāṇam
GSP28mimsvtku:2554_0: 167}yas tu vadati -- brāhmaṇahananādiṣu niṣedhādhikāreṣu hy arthavādopāttā yātanāviśeṣāḥ
GSP28mimsvtku:2554_1: taṃ śatena yātayād ityādayaḥ sādhyatayā śrūyante. taiś ca militaiva niṣidhyamānakriyādhikāriṇaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:2555_0: śatādiyātanāparihārakāmo hananābhipravṛtto na kuryād iti. dṛṣṭaṃ cārthavādopāttam
GSP28mimsvtku:2555_1: adhikāriviśeṣaṇaṃ rātrisatre. tad ihādhikārihetvapekṣāyām agṛhyamāṇe viśeṣe tad api
GSP28mimsvtku:2555_2: hetutayā svīkriyata iti. tad ayuktam. agṛhyamāṇe viśeṣa evaṃ nāma. na ceha tadagrahaṇam.
GSP28mimsvtku:2555_3: svapadavākyāntaropāttayor mahāviśeṣāt. rātrisatre hi phalāntarāśravaṇād arthavādopāttapratiṣṭhābrahmavarcasādīnāṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:2555_5: iti yuktaṃ kalpayitum.[526]evaṃ jāteṣṭāv api samastārthavādopāttapūtādiviśeṣāṇām
GSP28mimsvtku:2555_7: sarvaviśeṣaṇaviśiṣṭo 'dhikārīti kathyate. iha tu na kalañjaṃ bhakṣayed iti samānapadopātto
GSP28mimsvtku:2555_8: bhakṣayatir adhikāriviśeṣaṇatayāvagata iti nādhikārihetvantarāpekṣā. evaṃ brāhmaṇahananādipratiṣedheṣv
GSP28mimsvtku:2555_9: apīti na kvacid ārthavādikaphalaviśeṣaṇāpekṣā.[527]yadi tūcyate -- nañarthaviśeṣaṇatayaiva
GSP28mimsvtku:2557_1: arthavādopāttāni tv ananyatropayuktānīti tadviśiṣṭādhikārikalpanaiva nyāyyeti na
GSP28mimsvtku:2557_2: saṃvalitādhikārasiddhiḥ. evañ ca viṣayaviśeṣaṇasyaiva bhakṣayater galepātikayādhikāriviśeṣaṇatvam
GSP28mimsvtku:2557_3: ity upekṣitavyam. yad api śatena yātayād ityādividhyupanibandhanaṃ sādhyatvām ācakṣate,
GSP28mimsvtku:2558: tad apy ayuktam. avidhiviṣayatvāt phalānāṃ sādhyabhāvasya. vakṣyate ca tasya lipsārthalakṣaṇeti. kāmyatayaiva phalāni śrutibhir upanīyante,
GSP28mimsvtku:2559: kim atra vidhiśrutyā. ata eva rātrisatre pratiṣṭhākāma iti vipariṇāmāśrayaṇaṃ pratiṣṭhādīnāṃ sādhyatāsiddhyarthaṃ,
GSP28mimsvtku:2560: na tu pratitiṣṭheyur iti vidhyāśrayaṇam iti yat kiñcid etat. ataḥ siddhaṃ niṣedhapramāṇakam anarthatvam iti || 203 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:2568_0: evaṃ śyenādisvarūpābhiprāyeṇa tatphalābhiprāyeṇa vā na pratyudāharaṇagrantho ghaṭata
GSP28mimsvtku:2568_1: ity uktam. pūrvāparivirodhād apy ayam agrantha ity āha -- codaneti. ubhayam iha codanayā
GSP28mimsvtku:2568_2: lakṣyate iti śyenādīnāṃ codanālakṣaṇatvam uktam. punaś ca kathaṃ punar asāv anarthaḥ.
GSP28mimsvtku:2568_3: hiṃsā hi sā. sā ca pratiṣiddheti yan niṣiddhatvam ucyate,
GSP28mimsvtku:2569_0: tat tena codanālakṣaṇatvapratijñānena virudhyate. vidhāyakaṃ hi vākyaṃ codanā. ataḥ
GSP28mimsvtku:2569_1: kathaṃ tallakṣitasya vidheyasya niṣiddhatvaṃ punarabhidhīyate iti. aparam api hiṃsā
GSP28mimsvtku:2569_2: hi sā. sā ca pratiṣiddheti bhāṣyaṃ,
GSP28mimsvtku:2570: tad dūṣayati -- śyenādāv iti. yo 'yam upadiṣṭaś codanālakṣaṇaḥ śyenādir asau hiṃseti samabhivyāhāro na yujyata iti || 204 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:2572_0: ata āha -- hiṃsā hīti. na śyenādayo hiṃsā. phalaṃ hi teṣāṃ hiṃsā. sā ca svarūpeṇa
GSP28mimsvtku:2572_1: bhinnā. na tu ta eva hiṃseti svarūpabhedam eva darśayati -- sā hīti. abhicāro hiṃsā
GSP28mimsvtku:2572_2: māraṇam iti paryāyā iti prāṇaviyojanātmikaiva hiṃsā. na tu tathā śyenādiḥ,
GSP28mimsvtku:2573: tasyāsivaddhiṃsāyāḥ pṛthaktvāt. yathā hy asinā śatrau vyāpādyamāne chedanam evāsijanyaṃ,
GSP28mimsvtku:2575: evaṃ śyenādijanyamāyurbhāgyacchedanam eva hiṃsā na śyena iti na tasmin hiṃsābhidhānam upapannam iti || 205 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:2576: aparam api kathaṃ punar asāv anarthaḥ kartavyatayopadiśyate iti praśnapūrvakam uktaṃ naiva śyenādayaḥ kartavyā vijñāyante,
GSP28mimsvtku:2577_0: yo hi hiṃsitum icchet tasyāyam abhyupāya iti hi teṣām upadeśaḥ iti. tad api nopapannam
GSP28mimsvtku:2577_1: ity āha -- upadeśeti. yadā hi naiva śyenādayaḥ kartavyatā vijñāyanta iti teṣāṃ vidheyatvam apahnutaṃ,
GSP28mimsvtku:2578: [531]tadā katham avidheyeṣv evopadeśābhidhānaṃ teṣām upadeśa iti. vidhyupadeśaśabdayoḥ paryāyatvād iti bhāvaḥ.
GSP28mimsvtku:2583_0: 169} syād etat -- avidheyeṣv eva codanālakṣaṇatvamātreṇopadeśavācoyuktiḥ. katham
GSP28mimsvtku:2583_1: avidheyānāṃ codanālakṣaṇatvam iti cet. kramavad iti brūmaḥ. yathā khalu adhvaryur
GSP28mimsvtku:2583_2: gṛhapatiṃ dīkṣayitvā brahmāṇaṃ dīkṣayatīti na tāvat kramo vidhīyate. yāgādivad abhāvārthībhūtasyāvidhiviṣayatvāt.
GSP28mimsvtku:2583_3: na ca dadhyādidravyavat. akārakatvāt. akārakatvaṃ cāmūrtatvāt. na cāruṇādiguṇavad
GSP28mimsvtku:2585: apṛthakpadābhidheyatvāt. pṛthakpadābhidheyā hi saṃkhyā tāṃ caturbhir ādatta iti sā vidhīyetāpi. na caivaṃ kramaḥ,
GSP28mimsvtku:2586_0: pracayād avagamyatvāt. ataḥ kathaṃ vidhiviṣayo bhavet. tathā vedaṃ kṛtvā vediṃ kuryād
GSP28mimsvtku:2586_1: iti padārtha eva kartavyabuddhyā gṛhyate na tu kramaḥ. kathaṃ va atadgocaro vidhīyeta.
GSP28mimsvtku:2586_2: ato 'vidheya eva kramaḥ. atha ca nācodanālakṣaṇaḥ. vidhyanumatatvāt. anumanyate hi
GSP28mimsvtku:2586_4: upasaṃharan. na hy ekaḥ kartā yugapadakhilam upapādayitum alaṃ vidhivitānam. ato
GSP28mimsvtku:2586_5: vidhyabhyanujñāmātreṇa vidhānaviniyogaśūnyo 'pi kramaḥ śāstrārtha eva. evaṃ śyenādayo
GSP28mimsvtku:2587_0: na tu vidhīyante. yad dhi niyogasāmarthyād evopādīyate tad vidheyam iti tantre vyavahāraḥ.
GSP28mimsvtku:2587_1: kathaṃ tarhi viṣayabhāvaḥ.[532]yasminn arthe sthitvā puruṣo niyujyate niyukto 'smīty
GSP28mimsvtku:2588_0: na tu viṣaye niyogo niyuṅkte. ātmany eva niyogāt. vakṣyati cāpūrvādhikaraṇe -- ārambhe
GSP28mimsvtku:2588_1: hi puruṣo niyujyate na karmaṇīti. ataḥ siddham avidheyā api codanālakṣaṇāḥ śyenādaya
GSP28mimsvtku:2588_2: iti. evaṃ ca ubhayam iha codanayā lakṣyate iti śyenādisvarūpābhiprāyam eva,
GSP28mimsvtku:2589: śyenasya vidhiviṣayatvena codanālakṣaṇatvāt. avidheyatvāc ca niṣedhaviṣayatvopapattiḥ. ato niṣiddhatvābhidhānam api yuktam eva. phalārthitā hi śyenānuṣṭhāne nimittaṃ,
GSP28mimsvtku:2590: na vidhiḥ. tadabhiprāyeṇa ca tasya lipsārthalakṣaṇeti. aṅgahiṃsā tv aphalasādhanatvād asatyāṃ phalaprayuktau vidhinaivānuṣṭhāpyate iti nāspadaṃ niṣedhasya.{1,
GSP28mimsvtku:2591: 170}itikartavyatā hi[533]sā. sā vidhinaivāṅgīkṛtā kathaṃ niṣedhaviṣayo bhavet. hiṃsāhīty api śyenādisvarūpābhiprāyam eva. prāṇaviyogaphalo hi vyāpāro hiṃsā, tathā ca śyenādiḥ
GSP28mimsvtku:2592: ataḥ so 'pi hiṃsaiva. na ca khaṅgādau prasaṅgaḥ,
GSP28mimsvtku:2593: avyāpārarūpatvāt. na ca śyenasam anantaraṃ nidhanaṃ nopalabhyata iti śyeno na hiṃsā,
GSP28mimsvtku:2594_0: tāvatāpi tatphalatvānapāyāt. na hi khaṅgādihate vraṇaparipākādinā cirād vipadyamāne
GSP28mimsvtku:2594_1: khaṅgābhighāto hiṃseti na budhyate. ata eva khādakādayo 'pi ghātakā iti mānavāḥ smaranti.
GSP28mimsvtku:2594_2: ato hiṃsā śyeno niṣiddhaś cānarthaś ca codanālakṣaṇatvena dharmo mā bhūd ityarthagrahaṇena
GSP28mimsvtku:2594_3: vyāvartita[534]iti sarvaṃ samañjasam eveti. ata āha -- śyenāder iti. asyābhiprāyaḥ
GSP28mimsvtku:2594_4: -- yat tāvadavidheyā api kramavaccodanālakṣaṇāḥ śyenādaya iti. tad ayuktaṃ,
GSP28mimsvtku:2595_0: dṛṣṭāntāsiddheḥ. na hi naḥ kramo na vidhīyate. yatraiva hi vidher anyataḥ puruṣo
GSP28mimsvtku:2595_1: na pravartate tadvidheyam. apravṛttapravartakatvād vidheḥ. na ca phalād anyatra puruṣo
GSP28mimsvtku:2595_2: rāgādinā pravartate. na hy asya kramānuṣṭhāne rāgādayaḥ pravartakāḥ. vidhir eva tu
GSP28mimsvtku:2595_3: niśśeṣaśeṣaśeṣiviṣaye prayoge ekaṃ kartāram āyojayan nānākṣiptānupūrvyaviśeṣaparigraha
GSP28mimsvtku:2595_4: ātmānaṃ labhata iti ṣoḍhāvibhaktapāñcamikapramāṇasahāyas taṃ tam ānupūrvyaviśeṣaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:2601_0: kim idānīṃ prayogavidhipramāṇaka eva kramaḥ. nanv asau yugapad upasaṃharati. tatra
GSP28mimsvtku:2601_1: ca kramavirodhaḥ. na. kramānuguṇayaugapadyaparigrahāt. na khalv īśvaro 'pi sāṅgaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:2601_2: pradhānam ekatra kṣaṇa upasaṃhartuṃ kṣamaḥ. ata ekopakramāvasānatvam eva śeṣaśeṣiṇāṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:2601_3: prayogavidhipramāṇakaṃ naikakṣaṇabhāvitvam. avadhṛtasvarūpāṇāṃ prayogo racyate. sakramakāś
GSP28mimsvtku:2601_4: ca padārthā avadhṛtā iti[535]tadvirodhiny eva yaugapadyakalpanā. yat tu asati viniyoge
GSP28mimsvtku:2601_5: nāṅgatvam iti. tan na. tārtīyair eva śrutyādibhiḥ kiñcidvilakṣaṇarviniyogāt. api
GSP28mimsvtku:2601_6: ca aviniyuktam api paśvekatvam aṅgam icchatāṃ kim aparāddhaṃ krameṇa,
GSP28mimsvtku:2602: yad asāv anaṅgam ity āśritam. aupādānikaṃ tasyāṅgatvam iti cet,
GSP28mimsvtku:2604: nāsāv iha daṇḍavāritaḥ. atrāpi hi kramaṃ prati vidhyākṣepo varṇita eva. abhidheyā saṃkhyā sopādānataḥ śeṣo bhavatīti yuktam. na tv evaṃ krama iti cet,
GSP28mimsvtku:2606_0: 171}yad eva kiñcit kathañcid avagataṃ tad eva vidhyananyathāsiddhyā tenākṣipyate.
GSP28mimsvtku:2606_1: virodhaparihāraś coktaḥ.[536]api ca vaṣaṭkartuḥ prathamabhakṣaḥ ityādāv ananyaparābhidhānāvagatatvād[537]vidher
GSP28mimsvtku:2606_2: nāvidheyatā sidhyati. tatraiva hi vidhīyate nānyatreti cet. tadardhajaratīyam. yat
GSP28mimsvtku:2606_3: tu kartavyatā[538]buddhiviṣayo neti. tan na. vedaṃ kṛtvā vediṃ kuryād iti sakramapadārthakartavyatāvagamāt.
GSP28mimsvtku:2606_4: niṣkṛṣyakartavyatā nāvasīyata iti cet padārthā vā kiṃ tadrahitāḥ kartavyatādhiyā[539]gocarīkriyante
GSP28mimsvtku:2606_6: yat tv ekaikapadārthāvacchedakatayā nāvagamyata iti.[540]naitāvatā akārakatvaṃ śakyate
GSP28mimsvtku:2606_7: vaktum. svabhāvo hy ayaṃ kramasya yan nānāśrayatvaṃ dvitvādivat. na hi dvitvādayaḥ
GSP28mimsvtku:2606_8: saṃkhyā ekaikatra na samavayantīti nāvacchedikā bhavanti. akārakaṃ vā. ataḥ siddhaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:2606_9: tāvat kramo vidhīyata iti. evaṃ ca na tannidarśanenāvidheyānām eva codanālakṣaṇatvaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:2606_10: śyenādīnām. api ca yadi śyenādayo na vidhīyante,
GSP28mimsvtku:2607_0: kim anyad vidheyam iti na vidmaḥ. nanv aṅgāni vidhīyanta ity uktam. rāgādibhis teṣu
GSP28mimsvtku:2607_1: narāṇām apravṛttiviṣayavāt. kiṃ punas teṣu rāgādayo na pravartakāḥ. aprītyātmakatvād
GSP28mimsvtku:2607_2: iti cet. samānam idaṃ sādhaneṣu. tāny api bahvāyāsasādhyāni
GSP28mimsvtku:2608: duḥkhātmakāny eveti na naraṃ rañjayantitarām. yadi tu prītisādhanatvāt teṣu rāgādayaḥ pravartakā ity ucyante,
GSP28mimsvtku:2609_0: aṅgeṣv api prasaṅgaḥ. ananugṛhītasya sādhanatvānupapatteḥ. aṅgajanyatvāc cānugrahasya.
GSP28mimsvtku:2609_1: evaṃ cāṅgapradhānadvayasyāvidheyatvād aviṣayo vidhir āpadyate. api ca vidhiviṣayāḥ
GSP28mimsvtku:2609_2: śyenādayo na vidhīyanta iti duradhigamam. vidhiviṣayam eva vidheyavido vidheyaṃ manyante.
GSP28mimsvtku:2609_3: avidheyasya vidhiviṣayabhāvānupapatteḥ. nanv etāvad eva[541]vidhiviṣayatvaṃ yat tatra
GSP28mimsvtku:2609_4: vidhir avagamyate. na punas tasya[542]kartavyatā. yathāhuḥ -- kartavyatāviṣayo hi
GSP28mimsvtku:2609_5: niyogo na tat kartavyatām āheti. kā punaḥ kartavyatā. yāgādayaḥ. eṣaiva hi niyogasya
GSP28mimsvtku:2609_6: kartavyatā yadyāgānuṣṭhānam. tatprakārāś cetikartavyatāḥ prayājādayaḥ. yady evaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:2609_7: kena rūpeṇa yāgādiṣu vidhir avagamyate. yadi yāgaṃ kuryād iti,
GSP28mimsvtku:2610: nanv iyam evāsau kartavyateti kathaṃ na{1,
GSP28mimsvtku:2611_0: 172} yāgādīnāṃ kartavyatām āhety ucyate. nanv ātmany eva pravartayatīty uktam. satyam.
GSP28mimsvtku:2611_1: na tu yāgātireki kiñcit kāryaṃ kāryatayāvagamyate iti vidhivivaraṇe vakṣyāmaḥ. ato
GSP28mimsvtku:2612: asya bhrātṛvyavadhasya sādhanānīti nānarthatayā pratyudāharaṇam arhantīti. yad api teṣv eva hiṃsāśabdo mukhya ity uktaṃ,
GSP28mimsvtku:2613_0: tad ayuktam. abhicāraparyāyo hi hiṃsāśabdaḥ. sā ca hiṃsā phalaṃ śyenasya abhicaran
GSP28mimsvtku:2613_1: yajeteti hi śrūyate. na tu śyenādaya evābhicārāḥ. khādakādiṣu ghātakādipadaprayogo
GSP28mimsvtku:2613_2: gauṇaḥ. na ceha gauṇahiṃsāpadāśrayaṇe kiñcit kāraṇam. śyenaśabde[543]tu phalalakṣaṇākāraṇaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:2613_3: vakṣyāmaḥ. tasmāt sūktam avidheye śyenādau na kiñcid vidheyam iti || 206 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:2625: evaṃ tāvadupapattitaḥ śyenādīnāṃ vidheyatvam uktam. idānīm etat parityāge siddhāntahānir apīty āha -- sarvatreti hāntena. jānāty evāsau mayaitat kartavyam iti,
GSP28mimsvtku:2626_0: upāyaṃ tu na vedetyādau sarvatra bhāṣyakārānusāreṇaivāṃśadvayagāmī vidhir avagamyate.
GSP28mimsvtku:2626_1: tad iha śyenādyavidheyapakṣe bādhyata iti. ayaṃ cāparaḥ śyenādīnām avidheyatve doṣa
GSP28mimsvtku:2626_2: ity āha -- ye ceti syurantena. nanu[544]yathā jyotiṣṭomādayo na vidhīyante evaṃ na
GSP28mimsvtku:2626_3: niṣidhyante te 'pīti.[545]kasmād dharmatā na bhavaty ata āha -- hiṃseti. yady api
GSP28mimsvtku:2627_0: tathāpy agnīṣomīyādipaśuhiṃsā teṣāṃ sādhanam. sā cāṃśadvayagāminy api niṣiddhety
GSP28mimsvtku:2627_1: uktam. ato niṣiddhāṅgatvena pratyavāyahetutvād adharmatā jyotiṣṭomādīnām iti. api
GSP28mimsvtku:2627_2: cāṃśadvayāvidhāne tadutkhātir evety āha -- na ceti. vidher ayaṃ mahimā yat svabhāvasādhyo yāgaḥ phalāṅgaḥ,
GSP28mimsvtku:2628: tathā vakṣyati jaiminiḥ karmāṇy api phalārthatvāt (3.1.4)
GSP28mimsvtku:2629_0: iti. tathetikartavyatāpi yat phalasādhanāṅgam asāv api vidhimahimnaiva. sā vihitā
GSP28mimsvtku:2630: 173}vakṣyate. avidhīyamānasya yāgasyāgneyādeḥ pradhānasyāṅgasya vā prayājāder yathākramaṃ na phalāṅgatā tatsādhanāṅgatā vāpi sidhyatīti || 208 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:2635_0: syād etat -- sādhanatvena vihitā api na sādhyatayā vidhīyanta ity avidheyā ity ucyante.
GSP28mimsvtku:2635_1: ata evāha -- naiva śyenādayaḥ kartavyā vijñāyante iti. naiva sādhyatayā vidhīyanta
GSP28mimsvtku:2635_2: iti yāvad ity ata āha -- sādhanatveneti. vidhānaṃ hy anarthatvaparipanthi tad yathātathā
GSP28mimsvtku:2635_3: vā vihitasya na sambhavati. ataḥ kim avāntarabhedāśrayaṇeneti. anvāruhya cedam asmābhir
GSP28mimsvtku:2635_4: ucyate. na tu sādhyatayā vidhānaṃ sambhavati,
GSP28mimsvtku:2636: svayam eva sādhye puruṣāṇāṃ pravṛtteḥ. tad etad āha -- sādhyatveneti. sarvaṃ yāgadānajapopavāsādīṣṭasādhanatayaiva vidhīyata iti bhāvaḥ || 209 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:2637_0: ato na śyenādinivṛttir arthaśabdasya prayojanam ity anyathā varṇanīyam ity āha teneti.
GSP28mimsvtku:2637_1: prayojanavarṇanāṃ pratijñāya tad upoddhātam eva tāvad bhāṣyakārābhiprāyam āha --
GSP28mimsvtku:2637_2: pravṛttau veti. pravartikā nivartikā cobhayy[546]api codaneti bhāṣyakārasya hṛdaye
GSP28mimsvtku:2637_3: lakṣaṇaṃ vyavasthitaṃ codanāyāḥ. ato niṣedhacodanālakṣaṇānāṃ dharmatvaṃ nivartayitum
GSP28mimsvtku:2637_4: arthaśabda ity abhiprāya iti. kathaṃ tarhi pravartakaṃ vākyaṃ codaneti bhāṣyam ata
GSP28mimsvtku:2637_5: āha -- pravartaka iti. pravartakagrahaṇaṃ pradarśanārtham ity artha iti || 211 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:2641: udāharaṇārthatve kāraṇam āha -- tātparye hīti. pūrvāparasaṅgato hi grantho vyākhyeyaḥ. yady api pravartakaikapara eva pūrvagrantho bhavet,
GSP28mimsvtku:2649_0: athavā dharmapramāṇam atra sūtrakāreṇa sūtritaṃ dharmasya pravartakam eva vākyaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:2649_1: pramāṇam iti. tac codanālakṣaṇam eva bhāṣyakāreṇa varṇitam ity āha -- dharmeti. yadā
GSP28mimsvtku:2649_2: cobhayy api codaneti sthitaṃ tadā vidhicodanābhyas tāvad vidheyānāṃ jyotiṣṭomādīnām
GSP28mimsvtku:2649_3: arthatvenāvadhāraṇaṃ bhavati. niṣedhacodanābhyaś ca niṣedhyānāṃ brahmahatyādīnām
GSP28mimsvtku:2649_4: anarthatvena nirṇayaḥ. ubhayor ubhābhyām arthānarthatve lakṣite iti yāvat. tad etad
GSP28mimsvtku:2649_5: āha -- evaṃ satīti. yena ca vidhipramāṇakam arthatvaṃ,
GSP28mimsvtku:2650: tena tallakṣitānāṃ jyotiṣṭomādīnām atrārthagrahaṇena dharmatvam uktam ity āha -- teneti || 214 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:2651_0: vidheyārthadharmatve cokte viparītānām adharmatvam arthasiddhatvān na sūtrakāreṇa
GSP28mimsvtku:2651_1: sūtritam ity āha -- niṣedhyānām iti. evam udgrantham eva bhāṣyakārābhiprāyam uktvā
GSP28mimsvtku:2651_2: tadanusāreṇobhayam ityādi bhāṣyaṃ yojayati -- tasmād iti. yasmād evaṃ bhāṣyakārābhiprāyaḥ,
GSP28mimsvtku:2652_0: tasmād ubhayam ihetyādigranthe vidheyapratiṣedhyayor yathākramaṃ yāgādibrahmahatyādivargayor
GSP28mimsvtku:2652_1: nidarśanaṃ kāryam ity arthaḥ. yadi brahmahatyādivargasyānarthatayā nidarśanaṃ kathaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:2652_2: tarhi śyenādyupanyāsaḥ. te hi vidheyāḥ. tata eva ceṣṭasādhanāḥ. mahat khalv idam
GSP28mimsvtku:2652_3: iṣṭaṃ yaḥ śatruvadhaḥ. na hi tādṛśī{1,
GSP28mimsvtku:2653: 175}svarge 'pi narāṇāṃ tṛptiḥ sambhavati yādṛśī śaśruvadhe. ataḥ kathaṃ te 'narthatayodāhriyante,
GSP28mimsvtku:2654_0: ata āha -- śyenādīnām iti. ayam abhiprāyaḥ -- yathāvagatam āyuṣmatāṃ na svarūpeṇa
GSP28mimsvtku:2654_1: śyenādayo 'narthā iti. bhāṣyakāreṇāpi na tatsvarūpam anarthatayodāhṛtam. kin tu yat
GSP28mimsvtku:2655: so 'pi vihito niṣiddhaś ca. svayaṃ vihitatvād arthātmako 'py anarthānubandhīti tad idam anarthatvaṃ śyena upacaritaṃ,
GSP28mimsvtku:2656_0: kāraṇe kāryopacārāt. śyenaśabda eva vā tatphala upacaritaḥ kārye kāraṇopacārād iti
GSP28mimsvtku:2656_1: bhāvaḥ. kiṃ punarupacārāśrayaṇe kāraṇam ata āha -- pratiṣiddheti. bhāṣyakārānusāreṇaivedam
GSP28mimsvtku:2656_2: upacārāśrayaṇam. evaṃ hi bhāṣyakāro vadati -- pratiṣiddhā hi seti. na hi śyenādisvarūpābhiprāyaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:2656_3: pratiṣiddhā hītīdam upapadyate. tatas tatphalābhiprāya eva śyenādyupanyāsa iti bhāṣyakṛtā
GSP28mimsvtku:2657: idaṃ cāparaṃ liṅgadarśanam ity āha -- hiṃsā hīti. kathaṃ punar asāv anarthaḥ ity uktvā yad uktaṃ hiṃsā hi seti,
GSP28mimsvtku:2658_0: tato 'vagamyate na śyenādisvarūpamātram anarthatayā vivakṣitam iti. varṇitam idam
GSP28mimsvtku:2658_1: ākṣepakāle na svarūpeṇa śyeno hiṃseti. ato hiṃsā hīty atra bhāṣyakāreṇaitat sphuṭīkṛtam.
GSP28mimsvtku:2658_2: tathā śyenenābhicaran yajeteti hi samāmananti nābhicaritavyam ity ante vakṣyate.
GSP28mimsvtku:2658_3: atrāpy abhicārasyaiva śyenaphalasya niṣedhaṃ darśayann anarthatāṃ sphuṭīkariṣyatīti.
GSP28mimsvtku:2658_4: śyenādisvarūpābhiprāye tu granthe sarvo 'yam uttaragranthe na saṅgacchata ity āha
GSP28mimsvtku:2659: tatra pratiṣiddhā hīty etat tāvad anupapannam ity āha -- vihitatvād iti. vihitā hiṃsāsādhanatayā śyenādayaḥ. na teṣu pratiṣedho 'vakāśaṃ{1,
GSP28mimsvtku:2660_0: 176}labhata ityākṣepe varṇitam evaitat pradarśanārtham uktam. anye 'py ākṣepoktā
GSP28mimsvtku:2660_1: evānupapattiprakārā anusandheyā iti. evaṃ tāvad vidhiniṣedhātmikā codanetyāśrityobhayam
GSP28mimsvtku:2660_2: ityādigrantho vyākhyātaḥ. idānīṃ pravartikā codanety atrāpi pakṣe śakyata eva bhāṣyaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:2660_3: vyākhyātum ity āha -- yadeti. ubhayaṃ vidhāyikayā codanayā lakṣyate sādhyaṃ sādhanaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:2660_4: cety arthaḥ. kathaṃ punaḥ sādhyasādhanātmakam ubhayaṃ codanayā lakṣyate. na hi sādhyaṃ vidhīyate,
GSP28mimsvtku:2661: svayam eva hi tatra puruṣāḥ pravartante,
GSP28mimsvtku:2662_0: ata āha -- sādhyeti ubhayorantena. ayam abhiprāyaḥ -- satyam. sādhyasādhanāṅgagocaram
GSP28mimsvtku:2662_1: eva vidheḥ pravartanam. tathāpi vidhipramāṇakam eva svargayāgādīnāṃ sādhyasādhanasambandha
GSP28mimsvtku:2664: evaṃ svargādīnāṃ yāgādisādhyatvāvagatir apīti tena rūpeṇa te 'pi codanālakṣaṇā bhavanty eva,
GSP28mimsvtku:2665: yady api teṣu svayaṃ pravṛttaḥ puruṣo na codanayā pravartyata iti. yadi sādhyasādhanābhiprāyam ubhayatvaṃ,
GSP28mimsvtku:2667: ata āha -- dvividham iti. ayam arthaḥ -- phalasādhanātmakam ubhayaṃ codanālakṣaṇam ity uktam. tatredam ucyate phalam arthānarthātmakatvena dvividhaṃ kratūnām iti || 220 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:2668_0: phaladvaividhye kāraṇam āha -- svargādīti hiṃsādyantena. tatrobhayātmake phale svargādiphalaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:2668_1: tāvat jyotiṣṭomādīnām anatikrāntapratiṣedhenaivāvāpyate. tan na niṣiddham iti yāvat.
GSP28mimsvtku:2668_3: phalārthānarthavivekaḥ. asmiṃś ca vyākhyāne ko 'rthaḥ ityādi bhāṣyam evaṃ vyākhyeyam
GSP28mimsvtku:2668_4: arthātmakaphalasyāpi yat sādhanaṃ so 'py artha iti. antarṇīyaitat pradarśitaṃ ko
GSP28mimsvtku:2668_5: 'rthaḥ yo niḥśreyasāya jyotiṣṭomādir iti. etad uktaṃ bhavati -- arthātmakaphalasya
GSP28mimsvtku:2668_6: sādhanasya jyotiṣṭomāder dharmatvaṃ vaktum arthapadaṃ prayuktam iti. tad uktaṃ -
GSP28mimsvtku:2671: iti. ko 'nartha iti tu śyenādiphalaparo lakṣaṇayā śyenādipadaprayogaḥ,
GSP28mimsvtku:2672: tasya cārthād adharmatvam uktam iti veditavyam iti. nanu śyenādividhisāmarthyād eva śyenādiphalam āsādyamānaṃ kathaṃ pratiṣedhātikrameṇāvāpyata ity ucyate,
GSP28mimsvtku:2673: ata āha -- śāstrāntareti. ayam abhiprāyaḥ -- satyaṃ śyenacodanālakṣaṇaṃ tatphalaṃ,
GSP28mimsvtku:2674: tad uddiśya tadvidhānāt. kvacit kiñcid vidhīyata iti vidheḥ svarūpaṃ,
GSP28mimsvtku:2675: tatra vidheyam ivoddeśyam api vidhir vigāhata eva. yat tu na hiṃsyād iti śāstrāntaraṃ,
GSP28mimsvtku:2676: tannirīkṣaṇena śyenādiphalasya hiṃsāyāḥ pratiṣiddhatvam avagamyata iti || 221 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:2677: nanu vidhispṛṣṭe pratiṣedho 'navakāśaḥ. saty api vā pratiṣedhe naivaṃvidhasyānarthatvam ity uktam. tad yadi codanālakṣaṇā hiṃsā,
GSP28mimsvtku:2678: kathaṃ niṣiddhatvād anarthaḥ. codanālakṣaṇatve 'py avidheyatvam iti tu bhavadbhir eva nirākṛtam. ata eva kramo vidheya ity āśritam,
GSP28mimsvtku:2679: ata āha -- phalāṃśa iti vakṣyate'ntena. ayam abhiprāyaḥ -- uktam idam asmābhiḥ kiñcid vidhātuṃ phalam uddiśyate ity etāvatī codanālakṣaṇatā. na tu phalam eva vidhīyate,
GSP28mimsvtku:2680_0: bhāvanāyāḥ phalāṃśe pratyayāvidhāyakatvasya vakṣyamāṇatvāt. vakṣyati hi -- jānāty
GSP28mimsvtku:2680_1: evāsau mayaitat kartavyam iti upāyaṃ tu na vedeti. ataḥ svayam eva kartavyeṣu puruṣāṇāṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:2680_2: pravṛtter na tadviṣayapravṛttijñāpanaṃ vidheḥ phalam. sādhanopāyayos tv apravṛttaḥ
GSP28mimsvtku:2680_3: puruṣaḥ pravartyata iti tayor vidheyatvam. krame tu na tāvat kiñcid vidhīyate. so
GSP28mimsvtku:2681: kathaṃ codanālakṣaṇo bhaviṣyati. jaiminer apy etad evābhimatam ity āha -- jaiminir iti. lipsayā pravṛttiṃ lakṣayati,
GSP28mimsvtku:2682: tayā pravṛtteḥ. arthaśabdaḥ prayojanavācī phale pravṛttiḥ prayojanalakṣaṇā na vaidhīti darśitaṃ bhavatīti || 222 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:2684: 178} yataś cāyaṃ sūtrabhāṣyānugataḥ siddhāntaḥ yat phalaṃ na vidhīyata iti,
GSP28mimsvtku:2685: tena kāraṇena na hiṃsyād iti pratiṣedhaḥ śyenaphalopanipātinyāṃ hiṃsāyāṃ sāmānyato 'vataran vidhinā na nivārita iti tasyānarthatām āpādayatītyabhiprāyeṇāha -- teneti || 223 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:2686: evaṃ ca niṣedhena śyenaphalasyānarthaprāptihetutve bodhyamāne 'pi na śyenaḥ svarūpeṇānarthaḥ,
GSP28mimsvtku:2687: tatphalam eva tu hiṃsānartha ity āha -- anartheti || 224 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:2688_0: atrāparaṃ paricodanābhāṣyaṃ kathaṃ punar ityādi. tasyābhiprāyam āha -- paras tv iti.
GSP28mimsvtku:2688_1: ayam abhiprāyaḥ -- so 'yaṃ sādhanaphalayor vidheyāvidheyabhedo darśitas tam avidvān
GSP28mimsvtku:2688_2: ubhayam ityādibhāṣye śyenādeś codanālakṣaṇatvābhidhānāt[550]phalasyāpi vidheyatāṃ manvānaḥ,
GSP28mimsvtku:2689_1: ākṣiptavān. ayaṃ ca bhāṣyārthaḥ -- kathaṃ ya kartavyatayopadiśyate so 'narthaḥ. yady
GSP28mimsvtku:2690: tathāpy apauruṣeye upadeśaparyanuyogāsambhavād upadiśyamānasya katham anarthatvam ity eva paryanuyogārthaḥ. ata evoktam -- anarthatvam ākṣipad iti || 225 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:2695_0: atra parihārabhāṣyaṃ - naiva śyenādayaḥ kartavyatayā vijñāyante iti. tacchyenādikartavyatāniṣedhaparam
GSP28mimsvtku:2695_1: ivopalabhyate. tac cāyuktam. śyenādividhānasya pūrvoktatvāt. ato bhittvā yojayati
GSP28mimsvtku:2695_2: -- naiveti. asya śyenaphalasya hiṃsāyā naivety etāvataiva vidheyatvaṃ nirākāryam
GSP28mimsvtku:2696: 179}iti tūpaskṛtyottaragranthayojanety āha -- kim iti. śyenādayo yāgāḥ kartavyāḥ,
GSP28mimsvtku:2698_0: atra ca naiveti bhinne kathaṃ punar anartha ity asya praśnasyāpākaraṇe 'nuṣaktakartavyatāpade
GSP28mimsvtku:2698_1: phalasya kartavyatāyāṃ pratiṣidhyamānāyāṃ sādhyatāpratiṣedhabhramam apanetum āha
GSP28mimsvtku:2698_2: -- praśnāpākaraṇa ityarthentena. nātra phalasya sādhyatā pratiṣidhyate,
GSP28mimsvtku:2699_0: tanniṣedhe śyenabhāvanāparisamāpteḥ. kin tu vidheyataiva phalasya pratiṣidhyata iti.
GSP28mimsvtku:2699_1: anupayukte ca pūrvottarapakṣayoḥ sthāpanabādhane sādhyatvasyety āha -- dvaye 'pīti.
GSP28mimsvtku:2699_2: yadi kathaṃ punar iti pūrvapakṣavādinā sādhyatvānupapattir uktā bhavet,
GSP28mimsvtku:2700: evam uttaravādī naiveti tannirākuryāt. na tu sādhyatvasya pūrvapakṣe kaścid upayogaḥ. na ca tannirāsasya siddhānta[552]iti || 227 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:2704_0: atrobhayatrānupayogatulyatām eva darśayati -- anarthasyāpīti. na tāvat pūrvapakṣavādinaḥ
GSP28mimsvtku:2704_1: sādhyatāpratipādanam upayuktam. arthatvaṃ hi tasyāpādanīyam. ato yad eva tadanuguṇaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:2704_2: tad eva vaktavyam. na ca sādhyatāmātrānubandhyarthatvam,
GSP28mimsvtku:2705_0: anarthasyāpy avidheyasya surāpānādeḥ sādhyatāvagamāt. na ca sādhyatānirākaraṇaṃ siddhānta
GSP28mimsvtku:2705_1: upayujyate. arthatvaṃ hi tasya phalasya nirākaraṇīyam. tadanuguṇaṃ ca vidheyatānirākaraṇam
GSP28mimsvtku:2707: yac cedaṃ śyenādiphalābhiprāyam avidheyatvaṃ na svarūpābhiprāyam ity asmābhir ucyate,
GSP28mimsvtku:2708: tad bhāṣyakāreṇa sphuṭīkṛtam ity āha -- śatur iti. yo hi hiṃsitum icchet tasyāyam abhyupāya iti hi teṣām upadeśaḥ. śyenenābhicaran yajeteti{1,
GSP28mimsvtku:2709: 180}hi samāmananti nābhicaritavyam iti vadan bhāṣyakāro lakṣeṇe śatur utpattiṃ darśayati,
GSP28mimsvtku:2710_0: yo hi hiṃsitum icched ity abhicārapravṛttapuruṣānuvādāt. tac cedam abhicaran nābhicaritavyam
GSP28mimsvtku:2710_1: iti vyaktīkṛtam. lakṣaṇaṃ ca yadvṛttayuktaṃ siddhavad evāvagamyate na vidheyatayā.
GSP28mimsvtku:2710_2: ato na tāvad dhiṃsā vidhīyate. teṣām upadeśaḥ iti ca spaṣṭam eva śyenādīnāṃ vidhānam
GSP28mimsvtku:2711: vidhyupadeśaśabdayoḥ paryāyatvād iti bhāvaḥ. śyenādaya ityādiśabdasya prayojanam āha -- vidhitvam iti. sādhanāni tāvad vidhīyante. itikartavyatāpi hiṃsātmikā daikṣapaśvādi(?kā/gā)
GSP28mimsvtku:2712: vidhīyate.[553]etena phalāṃśasthaiva hiṃsā na vidhīyata iti darśitaṃ bhavati. vidhitvaṃ vidhiśaktir ity arthaḥ || 230 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:2717: ataḥ phalāṃśasthaivāvaidikī hiṃsā na hiṃsyād iti niṣidhyate. ataś cānartha ityabhiprāyeṇāha -- tasmād iti.[554]sarvasvāraphalasyedānīṃ kā vārtā. maraṇaṃ tasya phalaṃ,
GSP28mimsvtku:2718_0: na hiṃsā. tac[555]cāniṣiddham iti ced[556]na. asati bhāgyacchede tadanupapatteḥ.
GSP28mimsvtku:2718_1: ataḥ phalāṃśopanipātinīsarvasvārahiṃsānartho bhavet. ucyate -- pūrvāparībhūte hi
GSP28mimsvtku:2718_3: ato vidhikoṣṭhapraviṣṭaivāsau hiṃsā. anyatra tīrthebhyaḥ iti ca tīrthabahirbhūtaiva
GSP28mimsvtku:2718_4: hiṃsā niṣiddhā. iyaṃ tu tīrthamadhyagatā vidhispṛṣṭaiveti nānarthaḥ. śyenaphalaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:2718_5: tu cirātipanne śyene tajjanyāpūrvavicchinnabhāgyeṣu śatruṣu vipadyamāneṣu jāyate.
GSP28mimsvtku:2718_6: atas tīrthabahirbhāvād artho na bhavati. tena kratubahirbhūtā phalāṃśahiṃsāvaidikī
GSP28mimsvtku:2718_7: niṣidhyate. nāntaḥkratv iti vivekaḥ iti. kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇaṃ sādhanopāyabhūtā na niṣidhyate.

GSP28mimsvtku:2822_3: ātureṇa tu kriyamāṇam asamyagdhātupariṇāmāt kṛśī karoti. evam adṛṣṭārtheṣv api karmasu
GSP28mimsvtku:2823: yathā bhojanatvābhede 'pi svasthātur akartṛbhedanibandhanaṃ[573]vyaktibhedam āśritya tatra śaktibhedaḥ samādhīyate,
GSP28mimsvtku:2824: evam ihāpi hiṃsātvenābhede 'pi rūpasyeyam aṅgahiṃsā iyaṃ bāhyahiṃseti vyaktibhedāvagater upapannaḥ śaktibheda ityabhiprāyeṇāha -- rūpābheda iti || 258 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:2828: yadi tv avāntarabhedam anaṅgīkṛtya rūpābhedamātreṇaikaphalatvam iṣyate,
GSP28mimsvtku:2829_0: evaṃ sati sarvalaukikavaidikakriyāṇāṃ kriyātvād ekaphalatvaṃ syāt. tatredaṃ svargaphalam
GSP28mimsvtku:2829_1: idaṃ putraphalam ityādyasaṅkaro na sidhyatītyabhiprāyeṇāha -- tathāpīti. āstāṃ tāvanmahāsāmānyenaikatvāt
GSP28mimsvtku:2829_2: phalasaṅkaro bhavatīti. yajitvādyavāntarasāmānyābhedād api citrādīnāṃ karmaṇāṃ phalatulyatā
GSP28mimsvtku:2831_0: sehāpi samānety āha -- bhedād iti. nanu vihitā nāmāṅgahiṃsā. tathāpi kiṃ nānarthaḥ.
GSP28mimsvtku:2831_1: na vidhinānarthaphalena na bhavitavyam iti rājājñā. ata āha -- vidhīnām iti. ayam
GSP28mimsvtku:2831_2: abhiprāyaḥ -- neyaṃ rājājñā. śabdaśaktir eva. vidhir hi kartavyatābuddher hetuḥ.
GSP28mimsvtku:2831_3: iṣṭābhyupāyaṃ ca kartavyatayā loko budhyate. ato 'vaśyam eva sākṣād vyavahito[574]'pi
GSP28mimsvtku:2831_4: vā vidheyānāṃ puruṣārthaḥ phalam ity avasīyate. sākṣāt pradhānānāṃ,
GSP28mimsvtku:2832: vyavahito 'ṅgānām. tasmān nāto vidher anarthaphalatvam avasīyate. vidhibalād avagamyamānaṃ vidhīnāṃ phalam ity āheti. api ca,
GSP28mimsvtku:2833_0: anarthakaryaṅgahiṃseti nedaṃ sāndṛṣṭikam. na cānarthasamabhivyāhāro 'syāḥ śrūyate.
GSP28mimsvtku:2833_1: ataḥ katham anarthasādhanam ity āha -- na caiṣv iti. nanv aśrūyamāṇo 'pi kalañjabhakṣaṇādivat kalpayiṣyate,
GSP28mimsvtku:2834: ata āha -- niṣedhād iti. tatra niṣedhaḥ kalpanāyāṃ kāraṇaṃ,
GSP28mimsvtku:2835: nāsāv iha sambhavati. abhāvād eva vidhānadarśanād iti || 261 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:2839_0: api cāṅgahiṃsānāṃ puruṣārthatve siddhe kadācid anartho 'pi phalatayā kalpyate. na
GSP28mimsvtku:2839_1: ca tāsāṃ puruṣārthaḥ phalam. prakaraṇe pāṭhāt. prakaraṇavidhiviniyogena kratvarthatvād
GSP28mimsvtku:2839_2: ityabhiprāyeṇāha -- na ceti. kiṃ nāma[575]tat kalpyam ata āha -- karmopakāra iti.
GSP28mimsvtku:2840: tataḥ pradhānakarmopakāra eva kalpyate dṛṣṭo 'dṛṣṭo vā. yathāvaghātasya vrīhīṇāṃ vituṣībhāvo vidhyapekṣito dṛṣṭaḥ. adṛṣṭo vā yathā prayājādijanya iti || 262 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:2845: 191} ato nātrānarthakalpanāvasaro 'stīty āha -- kalpaneti. nāṅgahiṃsāsu phalam apekṣitaṃ,
GSP28mimsvtku:2846: kratūpakāreṇa nirākāṅkṣatvād iti bhāvaḥ. kratvarthe 'pi cāyaṃ viśeṣaḥ yad ayaṃ paśusaṃskāra eva,
GSP28mimsvtku:2848_0: tatpurassaraṃ viśasanādisaṃskārānuṣṭhānāt. ata eva saṃjñapane paśur vrīhivat pradhānatayā
GSP28mimsvtku:2848_1: śrutaḥ paśuṃ saṃjñapayatīti. tad etad āha -- kratvartha iti. sannipatyopakārapradarśanena[576]kratvarthataiva
GSP28mimsvtku:2848_2: balīyasīti darśitaṃ bhavati. ārād upakārakatve yāvān kleśo bhaved na ca tāvān apy astīti || 263 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:2852: saṃskāratve 'pi cāsyāyaṃ viśeṣaḥ yad ayaṃ dṛṣṭārtha evāvaghātādivat. na tu[577]prokṣaṇādivadadṛṣṭārthaḥ,
GSP28mimsvtku:2853_0: kratvapekṣitaikādaśāvadānaniṣpatteḥ. daikṣe hi paśau hṛdayasyāgre 'vadyati. atha
GSP28mimsvtku:2853_1: jihvāyāḥ. atha vakṣasaḥ ityādibhir ekādaśāvadānasādhyo yāga uktaḥ. na cāsati hiṃsāsaṃskāre
GSP28mimsvtku:2853_2: paśor ekādaśāvadānaniṣpattiḥ sambhavati. ato dṛṣṭārthatvād aṅgahiṃsāyā nānarthakalpanāvasaro
GSP28mimsvtku:2853_3: 'stītyabhiprāyeṇāha -- dṛṣṭeti. evaṃ tāvajjyotiṣṭomopāyāṃśasthā hiṃsā nādharma ity
GSP28mimsvtku:2854: tatrāpy ekāhānāṃ jyotiṣṭomaprakṛtitvāc codakaprāptāṅgahiṃsā nādharma ity āha -- abhicāra iti || 264 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:2858_0: ato 'naṅgabhūtāyām eva phalāṃśasthāyāṃ hiṃsāyām etad anarthatvam ity upasaṃharati
GSP28mimsvtku:2858_1: -- tasmād iti. nanu ca phalāṃśasthāpi hiṃsā śyenādyuddeśena vidhīyamāṇā[578]katham
GSP28mimsvtku:2858_2: anarthaḥ ata āha -- uddeśād iti. ayam abhiprāyaḥ -- nātra śyenoddeśena phalaṃ vidhīyate,
GSP28mimsvtku:2859: phalatvena hiṃsāyā evoddeśāt. phalaṃ hy uddiśya sādhanaṃ vidhīyate,
GSP28mimsvtku:2860: na tu viparyayaḥ. nanūddeśyayor api deśakālayor vidhānam{1,
GSP28mimsvtku:2861: 192}iṣyata eva. satyam. anyatas tayor aprāpteḥ. phale tu rāgataḥ pravṛttaḥ puruṣo na vidhinā pravartyata ity uktam eveti || 265 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:2865_0: kathaṃ punas tryaṃśabhāvanāvidhāne vidheyāvidheyabhedaḥ śakyate[579]vaktum. ata eva
GSP28mimsvtku:2865_2: ayam abhiprāyaḥ -- vidhir hi haṃsa ivodakāt kṣīraṃ vivicya prāptaparihāreṇāprāptaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:2865_3: gṛhṇāti. tathā ca vakṣyati -- tadguṇās tu vidhīyerann avibhāgād vidhānārthe[581]na
GSP28mimsvtku:2866_0: iti. ato viśiṣṭabhāvanāvidhāv api sādhanetikartavyatāmātraparatvāt phalāṃśān nivartata
GSP28mimsvtku:2866_1: iti. ataḥ siddhaṃ na svarūpeṇa śyeno dharmaḥ. nāpy adharmaḥ. phalasyaiva tv anarthānubandhitvāt
GSP28mimsvtku:2866_2: taddvāreṇānartha ity upacaryata ity upasaṃharati -- ata iti || 266 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:2872_0: nanu ca vidhīnāṃ puruṣārthaphalatvāt śyenasya ca vidhiviṣayatvāt tadbalenārthātmakam
GSP28mimsvtku:2872_1: eva phalāntaraṃ viśvajidādivat kiṃ na kalpyate. ataḥ svarūpeṇa dharmo bhaviṣyatīty
GSP28mimsvtku:2872_2: āha -- nirākāṅkṣasyeti. ayam arthaḥ -- bhrātṛvyavadhenaikena svargād api priyatareṇa
GSP28mimsvtku:2872_3: nirākāṅkṣasya śyenasya na phalāntarakalpanā sambhavati. bhāvanākāṅkṣā hi tatkalpanābījam.
GSP28mimsvtku:2872_4: ekā ca bhāvanaikenaiva bhāvyena nirākāṅkṣeti na bhāvyāntarasambandhaṃ labhate. tathā
GSP28mimsvtku:2874: 193}anarthaphalasya taddvāreṇānarthatvam ity āha -- tasmād iti. kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇaṃ,
GSP28mimsvtku:2875: phalānarthānubandhitvāt śyeno na dharma ity ata āha -- phalata iti. īdṛśe karmāṇi loke dharmaśabdaḥ prasiddha iti[582]|| 268 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:2879: atra codayati -- nanu ceti. ayam abhiprāyaḥ -- kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇaṃ svato na dharmatvaṃ śyenādeḥ,
GSP28mimsvtku:2880_0: nāpy adharmateti. iṣṭābhyupāyo hi codanālakṣaṇo dharmaḥ. tathā śyenaḥ phalasyānarthānubandhitve
GSP28mimsvtku:2880_1: 'pi. ato dharma ity evāyaṃ vaktavya iti. atrobhayarūparahitaḥ śyena ity abhipretya
GSP28mimsvtku:2880_2: sampradhāraṇām avatārayati -- phalam iti. sthitaṃ tāvat śyenaphalaṃ hiṃsā. hiṃsā
GSP28mimsvtku:2880_3: ca na dharma iti. śyenādisvarūpam idānīṃ lokaprasiddhyanusāreṇāvadhārayāmaḥ dharmo
GSP28mimsvtku:2881_0: tatrānyataranirdhāraṇāya pakṣadvayam upanyasyati -- yadīti dvayena. lokaprasiddhir
GSP28mimsvtku:2881_1: hi naḥ sarvaśabdārthāvadhāraṇe mūlam. tad asāv eva nirūpaṇīyā. tatra yady aniṣṭānubandharahiteṣṭābhyupāyaś
GSP28mimsvtku:2883: paramparayānarthānubandhitvāt. yadi tv anādṛtya paramparayānarthānubandhitvam āhatya prītiphalaṃ laukikā dharmaśabdenopacaranti codanāsamadhigamyaṃ,
GSP28mimsvtku:2884: tathā sati śyeno 'pi tādṛśatvād dharmo bhavet. kāryākāryānapekṣayeti. yad eva hi prītimātrānubandhi tat kāryam iti vivekino budhyante,
GSP28mimsvtku:2885_0: viparītam akāryam iti bhāvaḥ. prasiddhivibhāgakathanenaiva cātra nirdhāraṇam uktam.
GSP28mimsvtku:2885_1: yathāprasiddhi tāvad dharmaśabdo 'bhyupagantavya iti sthitam. prasiddhiś cāniṣṭānanubandhīṣṭasādhanaviṣayaiva
GSP28mimsvtku:2887: 194} nanv evam adharma evāniṣṭānubandhitvāt śyenaḥ phaladvāreṇa,
GSP28mimsvtku:2888_0: ata āha -- yadīti. ayam abhiprāyaḥ -- adharmapadaprayogo 'pi laukikānāṃ sampradhāraṇīyaḥ
GSP28mimsvtku:2888_1: kiṃviṣaya iti. tad yadi codanārtho 'pi sākṣād vyavadhānena vāprītihetur adharma iti prasiddhaḥ,
GSP28mimsvtku:2889: tataḥ śyeno 'py adharmaḥ. atha vedavihite nādharmaśabdam aprītikare 'pi paramparayā lokaḥ prayuṅkte,
GSP28mimsvtku:2890: tato nādharmaḥ. na ca vedavihitagocaro 'dharmaśabdaprayogo laukikānāṃ dṛṣṭa iti nādharmaḥ svarūpeṇa śyenādaya iti bhāvaḥ || 272 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:2891_0: yas tu vadati -- vihitā nāmāṃśadvayagāminī hiṃsā. tathāpi pratibaddhaliṅgadarśanena
GSP28mimsvtku:2891_1: tasyānarthahetutvam anumāsyāmahe. tathā hi hiṃsātvam anarthatvena pratibaddhaṃ bāhyahiṃsāsv avagataṃ,
GSP28mimsvtku:2892: tad dhi vihitāsv api dṛśyamānam anarthatvam anumāpayayatīti. tad etad upanyasya dūṣayati -- yas tv iti. ayaṃ cāgamabādho 'numāne prapañcayiṣyata iti || 273 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:2893: āgamānādare tv anavasthā bhavatīty āha -- tam iti || 274 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:2894_0: nanv āgamānusāreṇa kratugatānām api hiṃsānām adharmatvam avagamyate. tathā hi --
GSP28mimsvtku:2894_1: santi hi kecana mantrārthavāde[583]tihāsādayaḥ ye kratuvartinīm api hiṃsāṃ nindanti.[584]yathā japastutau
GSP28mimsvtku:2900: iti hiṃsā[585]ṅgatvenaiva vidhiyajñanindā smaryate. ata āha -- gīteti. asyārthaḥ -- pratyakṣo 'tra śrutibādhaḥ. kratau vidhānadarśantāt anyatra tīrthebhyaḥ iti ca śruteḥ.[586]
GSP28mimsvtku:2905: {1,195} yajñārthaṃ paśavaḥ sṛṣṭāḥ svayam eva svayambhuvā |
GSP28mimsvtku:2906: yajñā hi bhūtyai lokasya tasmād yajñe vadho 'vadhaḥ ||
GSP28mimsvtku:2907: iti[587]ca. anyaparatayārthavādo vyākhyeyaḥ. yathā vakṣyati -- na hi nindā nindyaṃ nindituṃ,
GSP28mimsvtku:2912: atrāparaṃ bhāṣyaṃ - nanv aśaktam idaṃ sūtram imāv arthāv abhivadituṃ codanālakṣaṇo dharmaḥ nendriyādilakṣaṇaḥ,
GSP28mimsvtku:2913_0: arthaś ca dharmo nānartha iti. bhidyeta hi tadā vākyam iti. evaṃ vākyabhedaparicodanāṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:2913_1: kṛtvā parihārabhāṣyam -- ucyate. yatra vākyād evārtho 'vagamyate tatraivam. tat tu
GSP28mimsvtku:2913_2: vaidikeṣu na sūtreṣu. anyato 'vagate 'rthe sūtram evam artham ity avagantavyam iti.
GSP28mimsvtku:2913_3: tadākṣipati -- śiṣyān iti. asyārthaḥ -- anyatoviditavedārthebhyo jijñāsubhyaḥ sūtrāṇi
GSP28mimsvtku:2913_4: jaimininā na praṇītāni. atas tāni teṣāṃ vedavākyatulyāni ubhayaṃ ca vedasūtrātmakaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:2913_5: vākyabhedādidoṣād asamartham. na cāśaktam arthapratyāyane pramāṇam. ato na vedasūtrayoḥ
GSP28mimsvtku:2913_6: kaścid viśeṣa iti na sūtreṣv iti bhāṣyoktam anuttaram iti || 276 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:2914: atra parihāram āha -- prāgukteti. asyārthaḥ -- satyam. vākyabhedādinā sūtrāṇām apy aśaktiḥ śiṣyāṃś ca pratyaviśeṣaḥ. kin tu yā pūrvaṃ sati sambhava iti parisaṃkhyoktā,
GSP28mimsvtku:2915_0: tasyāḥ phalam etad bhāṣyakāreṇa pratipādyate. evaṃ hi nyāyābhāsabhrāntāḥ śiṣyā bhāṣyakāreṇa
GSP28mimsvtku:2915_1: śikṣitāḥ yad vivakṣitāsambhave vākyabhedādibhir api sūtrāṇi gamayitavyānīti. tad
GSP28mimsvtku:2915_2: ihaiva tāvac codanāsūtre pradarśyate yad vākyabhedenāpi codanāsūtrārtho bodhyata
GSP28mimsvtku:2915_3: iti. anayeti. bhāṣyoktayā pramāṇāntarapratipannārthaviṣayatayā yuktyety arthaḥ. eṣety
GSP28mimsvtku:2915_4: api ca bhāṣyoktaiva vākyabhedagatiḥ pratyavamṛśyate. yathāha -- bhinnayor eva vākyayor{1,
GSP28mimsvtku:2916_0: 196}imāv ekadeśāv iti. tad anena śiṣyān pratyaviśeṣe 'pi vyākhyātṝṇām eva vyākhyāprakāro
GSP28mimsvtku:2916_1: bhāṣyakāreṇokta iti darśitam. vyākhyākārā hi ciraparicitanyāyasāmastyasmaraṇakṣamā
GSP28mimsvtku:2916_2: nyāyabalena vākyabhedādibhir api sūtrāṇi vyācakṣata iti || 277 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:2917: yataś ca pramāṇāntarānusāreṇa vākyabhedādibhir api sūtreṣv avagatiḥ sambhavati,
GSP28mimsvtku:2918_0: tasmād āvṛttyā vā tantreṇa vedaṃ sūtraṃ vyākhyeyam ity āha -- tasmād iti. āvṛttau
GSP28mimsvtku:2918_1: tāvat sakalam eva sūtraṃ dviḥ paṭhitavyam. tatraikasya codanālakṣaṇo dharma ity atra
GSP28mimsvtku:2918_2: tātparyam. aparasya cārtho dharma ity atra. anyaparatve 'nyatarasambandho 'nuvādaḥ.
GSP28mimsvtku:2918_3: sūtrabhedena cobhayavidhānāt tatsiddher ubhayānuvādopapattiḥ. tantraṃ codanālakṣaṇādīnāṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:2918_4: trayāṇām anyatamam. tadupariṣṭād vakṣyate. tasmin pakṣe na vākyabhedaḥ. tathā hi
GSP28mimsvtku:2918_5: -- tripadam idaṃ sūtram. padatrayasyāpi cetaretarasambaddho 'rtho vākyārthaḥ. tad
GSP28mimsvtku:2918_6: yad eva trayāṇām ubhayasandhānārtham[588]āvartyate tad eva vākyaṃ bhinatti. tantreṇa
GSP28mimsvtku:2918_7: tūbhayasambandhe na vākyabhedaḥ. sakṛdvacanāt. sakṛduktasyaiva yogyatayobhayasambandhe
GSP28mimsvtku:2918_8: śaktibhedāt. tad iha dharmapadaṃ vā tantroccaritam ubhābhyāṃ sambadhyate. sidhyati
GSP28mimsvtku:2918_9: cobhayaṃ codanālakṣaṇo dharmo 'rtho dharma iti ca. madhyapadaṃ vādyantābhyām. evam
GSP28mimsvtku:2918_10: api ceṣṭaṃ sidhyati artho dharmaḥ sa codanālakṣaṇa iti. ādyam eva vottarābhyām. codanālakṣaṇo
GSP28mimsvtku:2918_11: 'rthaḥ sa eva ca dharma iti. idam ekam eva vākyaṃ trayāṇām anyatamasya tantreṇobhayasambandhād
GSP28mimsvtku:2928: bhāṣyakāreṇa bhinnayor eva vākyayor imāv ekadeśāv iti vadatā sūtradvayam{1,
GSP28mimsvtku:2929: 197}evedaṃ darśitam. tad upanyasyati -- ekadeśeti. artho dharma ity ekaṃ sūtram,
GSP28mimsvtku:2930_1: niṣpadyate codanālakṣaṇo dharma iti. tad idam uktam -- ekadeśānumānād iti. nanv artho
GSP28mimsvtku:2930_2: dharma iti codanālakṣaṇācodanālakṣaṇayor anyatarasyā[590]nupādānāt tadapekṣāyām acodanālakṣaṇo
GSP28mimsvtku:2930_3: 'py upatiṣṭhamānaḥ kena vāryate. evaṃ codanālakṣaṇo dharma ity atrāpy anarthaprasaṅgo
GSP28mimsvtku:2930_4: darśayitavyaḥ. ata āha -- itaretareti. etāv eva codanālakṣaṇārthaśabdāv itaretarasamīpyāt
GSP28mimsvtku:2930_5: parasparaṃ sūtradvaye 'pi viśeṣaṇatvena vākyaśeṣatayā kalpyete. ato nācodanālakṣaṇānarthāvayavakalpaneti.
GSP28mimsvtku:2930_6: anuvādatvena cātra codanālakṣaṇārthāvayavasambandho bhinnayoḥ sūtrayor darśayitavyaḥ,
GSP28mimsvtku:2931: yadartho dharma ity ekasūtreṇoktaṃ taccodanālakṣaṇa iti,
GSP28mimsvtku:2932: yaccodanālakṣaṇo dharma ity atroktaṃ tadartha iti || 279 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:2936_0: aparam api athavā arthasya sataś codanālakṣaṇasya dharmatvam ity ekārtham eveti bhāṣyam.
GSP28mimsvtku:2936_2: darśitam. evam api viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyobhayaparatvena vākyaṃ bhidyata[591]eva,
GSP28mimsvtku:2937: yathaikatvaviśiṣṭagrahānuvādena sammārgavidhau. ataḥ kena viśeṣeṇā[592]thaveti parihārāntaram uktam iti. yataś cāyam aparihāraḥ,
GSP28mimsvtku:2938: tasmāt pūrvoktam eva padatrayatantratvaṃ vākyabhedaparicodanāyām uttaram ity āha -- itīty arthaśabdayorantena.

GSP28mimsvtku:2949_0: atra codayati -- dharma iti. ayam abhiprāyaḥ -- dve kilātra vacanavyaktī. codanālakṣaṇānuvādena
GSP28mimsvtku:2949_1: dharmavidhānaṃ viparītaṃ vā. tatrādye tāvat pakṣe codanālakṣaṇatvasyārthatvavyabhicārād
GSP28mimsvtku:2949_2: yuktam eva viśeṣaṇam. yadā tu sāmānyataḥ siddhadharmānuvādena pramāṇam anena kathyate,
