GSP28mimsvtku:2952_0: tadviśeṣeṣv eva vivādaḥ. mīmāṃsakā hīṣṭāpūrtayor dharmatvam icchanti. saṅghaṭṭavandanādau
GSP28mimsvtku:2952_1: saugatāḥ. sāmānyaṃ tu prītisādhanaṃ dharmasvarūpaṃ sarvavādinām avivādasiddham eva.[596]eṣaiva
GSP28mimsvtku:2952_2: ca prāg api sāmānyasiddhir uktā. ata eva ca viśeṣa[597]siddhijijñāsāyāṃ pramāṇaviśeṣavidhānaṃ,
GSP28mimsvtku:2953_0: tata eva tatsiddheḥ. vedāgame hi pramāṇe yāgādayo dharmāḥ. buddhāgame tu caity avandanādayaḥ.
GSP28mimsvtku:2953_1: ko dharma ity atrāpi viśeṣajijñāsayaiva praśnaḥ. vakṣyati ca viśeṣasya ca jijñāseti.
GSP28mimsvtku:2953_2: tasmād eṣaivātra vacanavyaktir mukhyā. ata evādye prathamam uktvā satsūtreṇa ca pratyakṣādinirākaraṇād
GSP28mimsvtku:2953_3: eṣaiva vacanavyaktiḥ sūtrakārābhimatā lakṣyate. yo dharmaḥ sa codanālakṣaṇaḥ iti
GSP28mimsvtku:2954: nānyathā. tasmād eṣaivātra vacanavyaktiḥ. asyāṃ cārthāvyabhicārād arthaviśeṣaṇam anarthakam iti || 282 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:2959: pariharati -- codaneti. ayam abhiprāyaḥ -- satyam. eṣaiva cātra vacanavyaktiḥ. iyam eva tu nāsatyarthaviśeṣaṇe sidhyatīti phalavadarthagrahaṇam.{1,
GSP28mimsvtku:2960: 199}asati hi tasmin vacanavyaktyantarasandeho bahvet. evaṃ hi tadā sambhāvyate,
GSP28mimsvtku:2961: yaś codanālakṣaṇaḥ sa dharma iti. atra tu vakṣyamāṇo doṣaḥ. nityānuvādabhūte tv[598]arthagrahaṇe naivaṃ vacanavyaktiḥ sambhavati,
GSP28mimsvtku:2962_0: arthagrahaṇasya vidhyanuvādayor asambhavāt. vidhau tāvad vākyabhedād asambhavaḥ.
GSP28mimsvtku:2962_1: anuvādasya cāprāpteḥ. na hi codanālakṣaṇam arthasambandhaṃ na vyabhicarati anarthasyāpi
GSP28mimsvtku:2962_2: tallakṣitatvāt. ato nānuvādaḥ. na caitat parityāgena vākyārthatvam anarthakatvād
GSP28mimsvtku:2963_0: tataraḥ pakṣo 'vadhāryeta. dharmānuvādena pramāṇavidhau sambhavati nityānuvādabhūto
GSP28mimsvtku:2963_1: 'rthaśabda iti sa eva pakṣo niścīyate. ato vidhyanuvādasūcanārtha evārthaśabdo na
GSP28mimsvtku:2963_2: viśeṣaṇam. viśeṣaṇād vinā caitad iti ca spaṣṭam eva sūtrārtha iti darśayiṣyati || 283 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:2968_0: ata āha -- tatheti. codanālakṣaṇānuvādena dharmavidhāvadharmāṇām api niṣedhacodanayānarthasādhanatvena
GSP28mimsvtku:2968_1: lakṣitānāṃ brahmahatyādīnāṃ codanālakṣaṇatvād dharmatvaṃ bhavet. na caitad iṣṭam.
GSP28mimsvtku:2968_2: ato na vidheyārtham api vidhiphalam arthavad[600]arthapadagrahaṇam. ato neyaṃ vacanavyaktiḥ
GSP28mimsvtku:2974: yasyām arthaś ca dharmatayā na tyajyate,
GSP28mimsvtku:2975: ekaś ca vākyārtho bhavati. sā ca dharmānuvādena pramāṇavidhiḥ,
GSP28mimsvtku:2976: tasyāṃ hi dharmasyārthatvāvyabhicārād artho na tyajyate. eka eva vākyārtho bhavati,
GSP28mimsvtku:2977: sāmarthyalakṣyatvād arthasya. iyaṃ cārthānuvādād eva sidhyati,
GSP28mimsvtku:2985: kathaṃ tarhi bhāṣyakāraḥ ubhayam ihetyādigranthenārthapadasya viśeṣaṇatāṃ darśayati. vispaṣṭaṃ hi tatroktaṃ tatrānartho dharma ukto mā bhūd ity evam artham arthagrahaṇam iti,
GSP28mimsvtku:2986: yad api cedam athavetyādi bhāṣyam ākṣiptaṃ tasyāpy adyayāvan na kiñcit samādhānam upalabhāmahe,
GSP28mimsvtku:2987_0: ata āha -- viśeṣaṇād iti. anena bhāṣyadvayam api samāhitam. yat tāvadubhayam ihety
GSP28mimsvtku:2987_1: uktaṃ tadarthaviśeṣaṇād vinaivārthasāmarthyakāritam eva bhāṣyakāreṇa kathitam. kim
GSP28mimsvtku:2987_2: idam arthasāmarthyakāritam iti. etad uktaṃ bhavati -- yad dharmānuvādena pramāṇavidhānād[603]evānarthānāṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:2988_0: pramāṇānuvādena ca dharmavidhau teṣām api dharmatāpadyeta. tad ihānartho dharma ukto
GSP28mimsvtku:2988_1: mā bhūd ityevamartham arthagrahaṇam iti vadatā vacanavyaktiviśeṣaparigrahārtho 'rthaśabda
GSP28mimsvtku:2988_2: iti darśitam. ākṣiptabhāṣyasamādhāne 'py ayam eva grantho vyākhyeyaḥ. nedam athaveti
GSP28mimsvtku:2988_3: śabdasāmarthyakāritaṃ bhāṣyakārīyam uttaram. tathā hi vākyabhedo bhavati. iha tu
GSP28mimsvtku:2988_4: vinaiva viśeṣaṇād arthasāmarthyakāritam evedam ucyate. tac ca vacanavyaktiviśeṣāśrayaṇena
GSP28mimsvtku:2988_5: darśitam. na cārthād āpadyamāno vākyabhedam āpādayati. aśabdapramāṇakatvād,
GSP28mimsvtku:2989_0: vākyabhedasya ca śabdadoṣatvāt. ato 'thavetyādinā dharmoddeśena pramāṇavidhānam atra
GSP28mimsvtku:2989_1: bhāṣyakṛtā darśitam. tatra cārthaśabdasyānuvādatvād[604]vākyabhedaḥ suparihara eva.
GSP28mimsvtku:2990: idaṃ dharmānuvādena pramāṇavidhānavacanavyakter evārthasāmarthyakāritaṃ phalaṃ bhāṣyakāreṇa kathyata ity artha iti || 286 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:2999: 201} tasya nimittaparīṣṭir iti sūtram. tasyāyam arthaḥ -- tasya dharmasya yannimittaṃ pramāṇaṃ codanābhidhānaṃ,
GSP28mimsvtku:3000_0: tatparīṣṭiḥ kartavyeti. pākṣikī ca parīṣṭipadarūpasiddhiḥ. tathā hi iṣu gatau ity
GSP28mimsvtku:3000_1: asmād dhātoḥ iṣer anicchārthasya iti yuci vihite parer vā iti ktinyucor vikalpaḥ
GSP28mimsvtku:3000_2: smaryate. tena yujvidhau paryeṣaṇeti bhavati. ktini tu parīṣṭir iti. atra vadanti
GSP28mimsvtku:3000_3: -- kim idam anavasara eva parīkṣāpratijñānam. codanālakṣaṇo 'rtho dharma iti hi pratijñātam.
GSP28mimsvtku:3000_4: atas tadupapādanasamarthahetuvacanāvasare kim aparaṃ nimittaparīkṣā pratijñāyate.
GSP28mimsvtku:3000_5: na hi naiyāyikāḥ śabdo 'nitya iti pratijñāya tad etat parīkṣāmahe iti parīkṣām avatārayanti,
GSP28mimsvtku:3001_0: api tarhi sahasaiva kṛtakatvād iti hetum abhidadhati. tad ihāpi codanāsūtrapratijñātāvadhāraṇadvayopapādanāya
GSP28mimsvtku:3001_1: sadautpattikasūtrābhyāṃ hetuvacanam ucitam. kim antarā parīkṣāpratijñānena. yadi
GSP28mimsvtku:3001_2: mataṃ - parārthapratijñāsvayaṃ nyāyaḥ yat pratijñānantaram eva hetvabhidhānaṃ,
GSP28mimsvtku:3002: svapratipattau tu na hetudharmā yojayitavyā iti. tan na. na hi jaiminer api svapratipattaye śāstranirmāṇam,
GSP28mimsvtku:3003: anyato viditavedārthaḥ śiṣyahitārthāya sūtrāṇi praṇītavān. ato 'trāpi parārthaiva pratijñā. atho[605]cyate -- dvedhā hi paraḥ,
GSP28mimsvtku:3004_0: vyutthitāvyutthitabhedāt. tatra vyutthitapratipādane pratijñānantaram eva hetur abhidhīyata
GSP28mimsvtku:3004_1: iti nyāyyam.[606]uttare tu parīkṣāpurassaram eva hetvabhidhānena pratipādyanta iti.
GSP28mimsvtku:3004_2: tan na. lakṣaṇāntareṣv api prasaṅgāt. bhedādilakṣaṇeṣv api yathāsvam arthaṃ pratijñāya
GSP28mimsvtku:3004_3: parīkṣāpratijñānam āpadyate. na ca tathā dṛśyate. kaś caiṣa nyāyaḥ yad vipratipannāya
GSP28mimsvtku:3004_4: pratijñānantaram eva hetur ucyate na śiṣyebhya iti. pratyuta tān eva prati lāghavāya
GSP28mimsvtku:3005_0: kim antarā vyākṣepakarī pratijñā nikṣipyata iti yatkiñcid etat. tasmād ayam atra
GSP28mimsvtku:3005_1: samādhiḥ -- ihādyena sūtreṇa śāstrasya prayojanaṃ pratijñātam. dvitīyena ca samastavakṣyamāṇatantrārthasaṃkṣepapratijñānam.
GSP28mimsvtku:3005_2: anena tu sukhagrahaṇārtham ādyādhyāyārthapratijñānam. athātaḥ śeṣalakṣaṇam.[607](3.1.1)
GSP28mimsvtku:3008_0: 202}etad uktaṃ bhavati -- ihādhyāye dharmapramāṇaṃ parīkṣiṣyāmaha iti. yady api codanāsūtreṇāpi
GSP28mimsvtku:3008_1: samastatantrārthasaṃkṣepe kriyamāṇe pramāṇalakṣaṇārtho 'pi codanaiva pramāṇam eveti pratijñātḥ,
GSP28mimsvtku:3010_0: punar anena niṣkṛṣyādyādhyāyārthaḥ pratijñāyate. aniṣkṛṣyamāṇe hi pratijñāsaṅkareṇa[608]na
GSP28mimsvtku:3010_1: jñāyate kasya pratijñābhāgasya sadautpattikasūtrābhyāṃ hetur abhidhīyata iti. bahv
GSP28mimsvtku:3010_2: eva hi tatra pratijñātaṃ dharmasvarūpādi. atas tatrāpi hetvabhidhānam idam iti kaścid
GSP28mimsvtku:3010_3: bhrāmyet. atas tadbhramāpanuttaye svayam eva nirdhāraṇaṃ darśayati. yo 'yaṃ tantrārthaḥ
GSP28mimsvtku:3011_0: tasmin vyākhyāsyamāne nimittaparīkṣaiva tāvad ihādhyāye vartiṣyate pramāṇapurassaratvāt
GSP28mimsvtku:3011_1: prameyasiddheḥ. tad iha tāvac caturvidhā parīkṣā vartiṣyate -- kiṃ codanaiva utānyad eveti niyamaḥ,
GSP28mimsvtku:3014: na cobhayam ity ubhayāpalāpaḥ. āha ca --
GSP28mimsvtku:3022: codanaivānyad eveti yad vānyac codanāpi vā ||
GSP28mimsvtku:3023: athavā codanānyac ca na cānyan nāpi codanā |
GSP28mimsvtku:3024_0: iti. tad ete niyamavikalpasamuccayobhayāpalāpaiś catvāraḥ pakṣā bhavanti. bhavati
GSP28mimsvtku:3024_1: ca pramāṇavikalpaḥ. yathārād avasthitam agniṃ kadācil liṅgād avaiti. kadācid āptopadeśāt.
GSP28mimsvtku:3025_0: īśvaramaharṣayo hi pratyakṣeṇa dharmam avayanti āgamenetara iti pramātṛbhedād ubhayopapattiḥ.
GSP28mimsvtku:3025_1: bhāṣyakāreṇa tu pradarśanārthaṃ kiṃ codanaiva utānyad apīti darśitam. parīkṣamāṇasya
GSP28mimsvtku:3025_2: hi caturdhaiva pratibhā jāyate. tad iha pratyakṣasūtre tāvat pratyakṣādiniṣedhena
GSP28mimsvtku:3025_4: nirasiṣyate tat pramāṇam anapekṣatvād iti. tad ayaṃ nimittaparīkṣāsaṃkṣepo bhavati
GSP28mimsvtku:3032: nāmadheyapādena codbhidādināmnāṃ guṇaparāṇām eva nāmadheyatayaiva kriyopayogakathanam iti kṛtsna evādhyāye dharmasya nimittaparīkṣeti sūktaṃ tasya nimittaparīṣṭir iti.
GSP28mimsvtku:3033: atra bhāṣyam uktīmadam asmābhiś codanā nimittaṃ dharmajñāne iti tat pratijñāmātreṇoktam ityādi. tad ayuktam,
GSP28mimsvtku:3034: sopapattikapratijñābhidhānāt. tathā hi -- codanā hi bhūtam ityādinā codanāprāmāṇyopapattir uktaiva,

GSP28mimsvtku:3037: tathāpi na sūtrakāreṇa kācid upapattir ukteti tanmatānusāreṇa pratijñāmātrābhidhānam iti || 1 ||

GSP28mimsvtku:3045_1: satsamprayoge puruṣasyendriyāṇāṃ buddhijanma tat pratyakṣam animittaṃ vidhyamānopalambhanatvād
GSP28mimsvtku:3045_2: iti. tad idaṃ vṛttyantare 'nimittād avacchidya tat pratyakṣam ityevamantaṃ lakṣaṇaparaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:3045_3: vyākhyātam. tad etad upanyasya dūṣayati -- varṇyata iti. asyārthaḥ -- dharmasya nimittaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:3045_4: parīkṣitavyamiti hi pratijñātam. anantaraṃ ca pratyakṣasya lakṣaṇam ucyamānaṃ na
GSP28mimsvtku:3047_0: anupayogo 'pīty āha -- laṣaṇasyeti. lokaprasiddhapramāṇavyavahāriṇo hi mīmāṃsakasya
GSP28mimsvtku:3047_1: kiṃ tallakṣaṇakaraṇeneti bhāvaḥ. dvyaṃśā hi pūrvapratijñā codanaiva pramāṇaṃ pramāṇam
GSP28mimsvtku:3047_2: eva codaneti tantrārthasaṃkṣepapratijñānam. punaś ca parīṣṭisūtreṇa niṣkṛṣyādyalakṣaṇaviṣayatayā.
GSP28mimsvtku:3047_3: na cānyatarāṃśaprasādhanenāpi lakṣaṇābhidhānam upayujyata iti. yadi tu naiyāyikādiprasthānam
GSP28mimsvtku:3048: tadvad eva hi tatpūrvakaṃ trividham anumānam ityādivadanumānāder api lakṣaṇapraṇayanam āpatitam ity āha -- kimartham iti || 2 ||

GSP28mimsvtku:3519_2: nimīlitanayanasyāpi vikalpaḥ pratyakṣo bhavet. yac ca nāmāvikalpakaṃ pratyakṣaṃ na

GSP28mimsvtku:3565_1: ity āha -- tadabhāva iti. vyabhicāram eva prapañcayati -- sevādhyayanatulyatva iti || 102 ||

GSP28mimsvtku:3580_0: etad eva prapañcayati -- kin nv iti. na kevalaṃ dharmādharmaphalaviveko na sidhyati.

GSP28mimsvtku:3596: atra kaścid apiśabdam asahamānaḥ pratyavatiṣṭhate. evaṃ hi manyate -- sarva eva savikalpakaḥ pratyayaḥ,

GSP28mimsvtku:3648_6: tadvad viśeṣavaśaprabhāvitam eva dravyasya bhinnaṃ rūpaṃ tadgrahaṇasamakālaṃ cānubhūyata
GSP28mimsvtku:3648_7: iti tannirapekṣagrahaṇaprasaṅgo 'pi na codanīyaḥ. sarvaṃ caitat saṃcidbalād evāsmābhir
GSP28mimsvtku:3648_8: abhidhīyate. na punar alaukikaṃ kiñcid upakalpyate. etad evābhipretya bhinnarūpopalambhanāt
GSP28mimsvtku:3648_9: ity uktam. kim uktaṃ bhavati. rūpam eva tad yad etad bhinnam. ato yuktaṃ yadanyavyavacchedādibodhanirapekṣeṇa
GSP28mimsvtku:3648_10: pratyakṣeṇāvasīyata iti. āha -- tat tarhi rūpaṃ vyākriyatām idaṃ nāmeti,
GSP28mimsvtku:3649: ata āha -- na hīti. ayam abhiprāyaḥ -- nopākhyā{1,
GSP28mimsvtku:3651: prakhyā. asti cātra nirvikalpakadaśāyām api vilakṣaṇavastusaṃvid bhinnarūpaviṣayā sā iti ca darśitam.
GSP28mimsvtku:3652: tac ca nirvikalpakapratibhātaṃ rūpaṃ paścāt tu dvitrādibhir viśeṣaiḥ parasmā apy adūrāntareṇa darśayituṃ śakyam eveti || 117 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:3654: nety āha -- nirvikalpaketi grahaṇamantena. sāmānyaviśeṣātmano 'pi vastuno grahaṇam ity arthaḥ. tathā hi -- yadāyam ekadā nānātmano gopiṇḍānupalabhate,
GSP28mimsvtku:3655: tadāsya sahasaivāvikalpakena dvyākārā matir āvirasti. ekavyaktibodhe 'pi cāsāvākāro 'vabhāsata eva. rūpaṃ hi tad vyakteḥ,
GSP28mimsvtku:3656: kathaṃ tasyāṃ prakāśamānāyāṃ na prakāśeta. tathā dṛṣṭaikavyakter aparadarśane sa evāyaṃ gaur iti pratyabhijñānam udeti. na ca tadadṛṣṭapūrve sambhavati. āha ca --
GSP28mimsvtku:3662_0: iti. nanu na viśeṣaḥ na sāmānyaṃ nirvikalpakenānubhūyata ity uktam. katham idānīṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:3662_1: dvyātmakasyāpi grahaṇam ity ucyata ity ata āha -- lakṣaṇākhyeyam iti. ayam arthaḥ
GSP28mimsvtku:3662_2: -- lakṣaṇākhyeyam idaṃ nirvikalpakasya rūpaṃ sāmānyaviśeṣātmakaṃ vastu nirvikalpakena
GSP28mimsvtku:3662_3: viṣayīkriyata iti. tac ca nirvikalpakalakṣaṇakārair eva parīkṣakair ākhyāyate. pramātā
GSP28mimsvtku:3662_4: tu sāmānyam idaṃ viśeṣo 'yam iti ca vivekavidhuram idam iti saṃmugdharūpam eva vastūpalabhate.
GSP28mimsvtku:3662_5: śuddham iti. anuvṛttivyāvṛttiparāmarśarahitaṃ gṛhyata ity arthaḥ. śuddhavastujam
GSP28mimsvtku:3663: śuddhaṃ gṛhyata ity etad eva prapañcayati na [676]hīti. ayam abhiprāyaḥ -- svarūpamātreṇa sāmānyaviśeṣau nirvikalpakena gṛhyete. nāsādhāraṇatayā.{1,
GSP28mimsvtku:3664_0: 254}sāmānyatayā ca vyāvṛttyanugamavikalpābhāvāt. nanu kiṃ tadanyad vyāvṛtter anugamāc
GSP28mimsvtku:3664_1: ca viśeṣasya sāmānyasya ca svarūpaṃ yad gṛhyata ity ucyate. sa eva tayor ātmā. kathaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:3664_2: tadagrahe tayor agrahaṇam upapatsyate. aho vivekakauśalaṃ tatrabhavatām. anugamavyāvṛttidharmāṇau
GSP28mimsvtku:3664_3: sāmānyaviśeṣau na punaranugativyāvṛttī eveti yat kiñcid etat || 119 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:3668_0: evaṃ nirvikalpakaṃ vyākhyāyedānīṃ tadbalabhāvinaḥ savikalpakasya pratyakṣatvapramāṇatve
GSP28mimsvtku:3668_1: darśayiṣyan pratyakṣatāṃ tāvad āha -- tataḥ param iti. asyāyam arthaḥ -- tato nirvikalpakāt
GSP28mimsvtku:3668_2: paraṃ jātiguṇakarmanām abhiryayā buddhyā vikalpya vastu gṛhyate yathā gaur ayaṃ śuklo
GSP28mimsvtku:3670_0: nanūktam indriyārthasāmarthyamātrajaṃ hi jñānaṃ pratyakṣam iti smṛtyākṛṣṭasamastanāmajātyādibalabhuvaś
GSP28mimsvtku:3670_1: ca vikalpāḥ. na cendriyāṇām arthasya ca smaraṇasāmarthyam ity apratyakṣaṃ savikalpakam
GSP28mimsvtku:3670_2: ity ata āha -- karaṇaṃ ceti. ayam arthaḥ -- yadīndriyāṇi smṛtvārthaṃ vikalpayantīty asmābhir ucyeta,
GSP28mimsvtku:3671: tad evam upālabhyemahi yat tāni smartuṃ na śaknuvantīti. na tv etad evam,
GSP28mimsvtku:3672: indriyāṇāṃ karaṇatvāt. kartari cātmani smaraṇasamavāyāt. atas[677]tatsmṛtyādyaśaktir adoṣa eveti || 121 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:3676_0: kim āśritaṃ tarhi jñānam ata āha -- ātmany eveti. ātmā hi cetayate. sa ca prāgbhavīyadharmopārjitendriyopanītam
GSP28mimsvtku:3676_1: arthaṃ budhyate smaraty anusandhatte ceti na kiñcid anupapannam iti || 122 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:3678: 255} nanv evam indriyasamprayogasya śabdādismaraṇena vyavahitatvād apratyakṣam āpadyetety uktam,
GSP28mimsvtku:3679_0: ata āha -- teneti. ayam abhiprāyaḥ -- nātrendriyārthasambandho vicchinnaḥ. vidyamāne
GSP28mimsvtku:3679_1: ca tasmin śabdādi smarann api yenaiva jātyādinā vastu vikalpya gṛhṇāti tatra pratyakṣavān
GSP28mimsvtku:3679_2: naro bhavaty eva. smaraṇenendriyāṇām adūṣitatvād iti bhāvaḥ || 123 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:3680_0: nanv indriyamātraprabhāvitaṃ pratyakṣam ity ucyate. tatra śabdādismaraṇasahitānīndriyāṇi
GSP28mimsvtku:3680_1: kāraṇam iti kathaṃ pratyakṣaśabdavācyatvam ata āha -- tac caitad iti. indriyādhīnaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:3680_2: jñānaṃ pratyakṣam ākhyāyate. gaur ayam ity aparokṣābhāsaṃ jñānam anuparatendriyavyāpārasya
GSP28mimsvtku:3680_3: jāyamānam indriyādhīnam eveti tair indriyair vyapadiśyata eva,
GSP28mimsvtku:3681_0: smṛtisahāyānām api teṣām eva kāraṇatvād iti bhāvaḥ. ye tv anapekṣitākṣavyāpārā eva
GSP28mimsvtku:3681_1: gaur ayam ityādismaraṇavikalpāḥ te 'smābhir api smṛtimātrahetutvān na pratyakṣatayeṣyanta
GSP28mimsvtku:3682: indriyasambandhānusāriṇas tu bhūyāṃso vikalpāḥ pratyakṣaśabdavācyā evety āha -- punar iti || 125 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:3683: yat tūktaṃ - yadīndriyāṇi vikalpodaye kāraṇaṃ kiṃ na sahasaiva janayantīti,
GSP28mimsvtku:3686: kaṃ jñānam astīty ucyate, tad atrāpi samānam ity āha -- yatheti || 127 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:3687: yat tūktaṃ - kiñcid dṛṣṭavato nimīlitanetrasyāpi vikalpaḥ indriyavyāpārāsattimātreṇa pratyakṣo bhaved iti,
GSP28mimsvtku:3688: tan na. anabhyupagamād evety āha -- yadi tv iti. ayam abhiprāyaḥ -- nendriyavyāpārāsattiraindri(?ya/yi)
GSP28mimsvtku:3691: indriyavyāpārānuparati. ata indriyasambandhānusārābhāvāt tatra pratyakṣatā na syād iti || 128 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:3693_0: kathaṃ tadakṣeṇaiva vyapadiśyate ata āha -- asambandheti. ayam arthaḥ -- asādhāraṇaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:3693_1: hi śabdapravṛttau kāraṇam. ātmādi ca kāraṇam indriyāsambandhārtheṣu[678]vikalapeṣu
GSP28mimsvtku:3693_3: 'sādhāraṇakāraṇam iti tenaiva vyapadiśyate. kalpana iti savikalpakajñāna ity arthaḥ.
GSP28mimsvtku:3699: nirvikalpakapratyakṣavādinām apīdaṃ codyaṃ samānam ity āha -- nirvikalpaketi. yadi tv indriyajanmano hi nirvikalpakasyānantaraṃ sambhavad etat savikalpakaṃ tatkāraṇa[681]kam eva,
GSP28mimsvtku:3700: indriyaṃ tu nirvikalpakotpattāv evopakṣīṇavyāpāram ity ucyate,
GSP28mimsvtku:3701_0: tathāpi paramparayākṣakāraṇatvena pratyakṣaṃ vyapadekṣyate. yathā kusumaṃ paṅkajam
GSP28mimsvtku:3701_1: iti. na hi tat paṅkāj jāyate. kiṃ tarhi paṅkabhuvaḥ kandāt kevalam. idaṃ paramparayākṣajatvam
GSP28mimsvtku:3701_2: aviśiṣṭam anumānādīnām iti teṣāṃ pratyakṣaśabdavācyatānirākaraṇārthaṃ rūḍhim apy
GSP28mimsvtku:3701_3: eṣiṣyāmaḥ. yathā paṅkaja[682]śabda eva vyavahitasya yogasya saugandhikādisādhāraṇyān
GSP28mimsvtku:3701_4: niyāmikā rūḍhir iṣyate. seyaṃ yogarūḍhir iti vārttikakārīyair ākhyāyate. tad etad
GSP28mimsvtku:3701_5: āha -- tatpāramparyeti. idaṃ tv iha vacanīyam -- rūḍhiś ced āśritā kiṃ yogābhyupagamena.
GSP28mimsvtku:3701_6: samudāyaśaktyaiva hi tadāśvakarṇādivat kvacid eva śabdo vartiṣyate kvacic ca neti kiṃ{1,
GSP28mimsvtku:3703: pratītaṃ tu yogaṃ na hātuṃ kṣamāmahe avaghāta iva dṛṣṭam. yathā tatraiva niyamānyathānupapattyā dṛṣṭakalpanā,
GSP28mimsvtku:3704_1: evānyatrāprayogo bhaviṣyatīti. kim idam aprayogād aprayoga iti. yadi pūrvapūrveṣāṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:3704_2: prayoktṝṇām aprayogād uttarottareṣām aprayoga iti. tad ayuktam. aprayogābhāvāt. prayogamātre hi pravṛttihetutā,
GSP28mimsvtku:3705_0: avayavayoḥ svārthe prayogo dṛśyata eva. samudāyas tu nānyaḥ kaścid yasyāprayoga iti
GSP28mimsvtku:3705_1: śakyate vaktum. samudāyaśakter anabhyupagamāt prayogamātrād eva paṅkajādiśabdapravṛtteḥ.
GSP28mimsvtku:3705_2: prayukto hi paṅkaśabdaḥ paṅke. janiḥ prādurbhāve. tadatiriktaṃ vastu samudāyo nāsty
GSP28mimsvtku:3705_3: eva. kasyāprayoga iti vaktavyam. arthānvayo hi tathā pravṛttau hetuḥ. sa ca saugandhikādiṣv
GSP28mimsvtku:3705_4: api samāna iti teṣv api paṅkajaśabdapravṛttiḥ. ato 'vaśyam anyatrāprayogārthaṃ rūḍhir
GSP28mimsvtku:3705_5: āśrayitavyā. yad uktam anyatrāprayogas tu rūḍhim āpādayatīti,
GSP28mimsvtku:3706_0: tad iṣyata eva. yogo 'pi dṛṣṭo na hātuṃ śakyata ity uktam. aśvakarṇādau tv avayavānugamābhāvāt
GSP28mimsvtku:3706_1: kvacid eva rūḍhir ātmānaṃ labhate. ato neyaṃ rūḍhir eva kevalā nāpi kevalayogaḥ.
GSP28mimsvtku:3713: atha vyavadhānād akāraṇaṃ yoga iti manyase,
GSP28mimsvtku:3714: tathāpi rūḍhyaiva kevalayā pratyakṣaśabdaḥ savikalpake vartiṣyate. bhūmnā hi tatraiva laukikāḥ pratyakṣaśabdam upacaranti. alpaṃ nirvikalpaka ty āha -- animittaiveti || 131 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:3715_0: yadi tūcyate satyaṃ vṛddhāḥ prayuñjate. lakṣaṇakārās tu nirvikalpakam eva pratyakṣam
GSP28mimsvtku:3715_1: ātiṣṭhante. yathāhuḥ -- kalpanāpoḍham abhrāntaṃ pratyakṣam iti. ata āha -- vṛddhaprayogeti
GSP28mimsvtku:3715_2: dvayena. ayam abhiprāyaḥ -- laukiko hi śabdārtha{1,
GSP28mimsvtku:3716: 258}sambandhaḥ. tena parīkṣakair api yathālokam eva vartitavyam. anyathākaraṇe teṣāṃ lokabādha eveti || 133 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:3717: api ca kalpanāpoḍhavādinām api kalpanājñānaṃ svasaṃvedane pratyakṣam iṣṭam eva. yad evam āhuḥ --
GSP28mimsvtku:3719: iti. evaṃ hi manyante -- na kalpanā svasaṃvittir ātmānaṃ vikalpayati,
GSP28mimsvtku:3720: bahirarthavikalpāvabhāsitvāt. asādhāraṇasya ca kalpanātmano 'pi kalpanāspadatvāt. atrāpy āhuḥ -- nainam iyam abhilāpena saṃsṛjati tathā vṛtter ātmani virodhāt iti.
GSP28mimsvtku:3722: iti ca. tad idaṃ kalpanāsvasaṃvedanaṃ pratyakṣaṃ nopapadyeta. tad api hi nirvikalpakapratyayāntaritākṣavyāpāram eva. atha tatra rūḍhyā pratyakṣaśabdo vartata ity ucyate,
GSP28mimsvtku:3724_0: na paraṃ svasaṃvittāv ity abhiprāyeṇāha -- kalpaneti. yadi matam asti tatrendriyajaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:3724_1: nirvikalpakajñānaṃ samanantarapratyayaḥ. tad eva mana ity ācakṣate. yathāhuḥ -- tac
GSP28mimsvtku:3725_0: m indriyajaṃ samanantarapratyayodbhavaṃ mānasam iti. mano 'pi cendriyam iti manodhīnatayā
GSP28mimsvtku:3725_1: pratyakṣaṃ bhaviṣyatīti. tad gotvādibodhe 'pi samānam. tadbodhe 'pi vayaṃ manovyāpāram
GSP28mimsvtku:3725_2: ātiṣṭhāmaha eva. manaḥsvarūpe tu vivadāmaḥ. tat tāvad anyad evety āha -- mana iti || 134 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:3726: nanv āntaraṃ manaḥ kathaṃ bahirviṣayabodhe vartiṣyata iti,
GSP28mimsvtku:3727: tat tāvad āśaṅkate -- svasaṃvittāv iti. pariharati -- loka iti. ayam abhiprāyaḥ -{1,
GSP28mimsvtku:3728_0: 259}satyam iṣṭaṃ kalpanājñānaṃ svasaṃvedane pratyakṣam iti bhavadbhiḥ. laukikās tu
GSP28mimsvtku:3728_1: viparītaṃ manyante. ayaṃ gaur iti pararūpanirūpaṇaṃ savikalpakaṃ laukikā manyante
GSP28mimsvtku:3728_2: na punar ahaṃ gaur ity ātmanirūpaṇam. yad api bāhyeṣu mano na vartata iti. satyam.
GSP28mimsvtku:3728_3: bahirindriyānapekṣaṃ na pravartate. gotvādayas tu saṃyuktasamavāyena cakṣuṣā sannikṛṣyanta
GSP28mimsvtku:3728_4: ity asti teṣu manovyāpāra iti tannibaddham akṣavyapadeśaṃ labhata iti bhāvaḥ. ato
GSP28mimsvtku:3728_5: 'vaśyaṃ svasaṃvedane kalpanāpratyayaṃ pratyakṣam ācakṣāṇair mano vā akṣam abhyupagantavyaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:3728_6: rūḍhir vā paribhāṣā vā. sarvathā vayam api pratyavasthātuṃ śaktā ity abhiprāyeṇāha
GSP28mimsvtku:3729: sukhādisvasaṃvedane 'pi mana evākṣam āśritaṃ bhavadbhiḥ. tadvad ihāpi jātivikalpo bhaviṣyatīty āha -- manasas tv iti ||136 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:3730_0: atha samāne 'pi manodhīnatve svakīyakalpanāpoḍhalakṣaṇānusāreṇa kiñcid eva pratyakṣam
GSP28mimsvtku:3730_1: āśrīyate. tathā satīcchānusāreṇa vyavasthāyām iṣyamāṇāyāṃ vayam api yathāśayaṃ kiñcid
GSP28mimsvtku:3730_2: eva pratyakṣaṃ vakṣyāma ity āha -- tadadhīnatveti || 137 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:3731: pāriśeṣyād api pratyakṣāntarbhāva evāsyāḥ savikalpakadhiyo yukta ity āha -- liṅgādīti. nanu sati prāmāṇye pāriśeṣyaṃ bhavati,
GSP28mimsvtku:3732: na tv iyaṃ pramāṇam ata āha -- bādhaketi || 138 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:3733: idaṃ tv iha vaktavyam -- satyaṃ neyam apramāṇaṃ,
GSP28mimsvtku:3734_0: mṛgatṛṣṇādijñānavad vyavahārāvirodhāt. na ca pramāṇam asadarthagocaratvāt. nirvikalpapariplāvitasvalakṣaṇaprāpakatayā
GSP28mimsvtku:3734_1: smṛtir ity ākhyāyate. na ca smaraṇaṃ pramāṇam ata āha -- na ceti. pūrvadṛṣṭārthaviṣayaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:3734_2: smaraṇaṃ bhavati. na ca nirvikalpakena sāmānyadarśanam{1,
GSP28mimsvtku:3736: apratyakṣaviṣayatvāt tasya bhavatsiddhānte. asmākam api svalakṣaṇāntarasambhedaḥ pūrvam adṛṣṭa eva. na cāsadarthatvaṃ,
GSP28mimsvtku:3737: vakṣyamāṇanyāyena jātyādīnāṃ sthāsyamānatvāt. ato nāgṛhītagrahaṇād aprāmāṇyaṃ nāsadarthatayā veti,
GSP28mimsvtku:3738_0: ataḥ pramāṇaṃ sat pāriśeṣyāt pratyakṣe 'ntarbhavatīty upasaṃharati -- tasmād iti.
GSP28mimsvtku:3738_1: bhavanto 'pi vāṅmanasavisaṃvādenaivāsyāḥ buddher aprāmāṇyam ācakṣate. sarvavyavahārāṇāṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:3739_0: nanu kim idaṃ nāprāmāṇyaṃ ca yujyata iti. viśiṣṭāvagāhino hi vikalpāḥ. bhinnaṃ ca
GSP28mimsvtku:3739_1: viśeṣyād viśeṣaṇam. abhede viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyānupapatteḥ. ato 'rthāntarabhūtair jātyādibhir
GSP28mimsvtku:3739_2: viśiṣṭe vastuni gṛhyamāṇe atasmiṃs tadgrahaṇād bhrāntir eva savikalpakajñānam ity
GSP28mimsvtku:3740: pariharati -- naitad iti. kāraṇam āha -- sthitam iti. pararūpeṇa hi parasmin nirūpyamāṇe bhrāntir bhavati. na ca jātyādīnāṃ pārarūpyaṃ,
GSP28mimsvtku:3743: ata āha -- yadi hīti. na viśeṣaṇam ekāntato jātyādi viśeṣyād bhidyate,
GSP28mimsvtku:3745: nanv atyantabhinnam eva lākṣādirūpaṃ sphaṭikādi svākāreṇa viśiṣṭaṃ bodhayad dṛṣṭaṃ,
GSP28mimsvtku:3746: tadvad eva hi jātyādiviśiṣṭabodho 'pi bhavan mithyā syād iti,
GSP28mimsvtku:3747: ata āha -- sphaṭikādāv iti. ayam abhiprāyaḥ -- uktam asmābhiḥ{1,
GSP28mimsvtku:3748_0: 261}sadaiva jātyādiviśiṣṭaṃ vastu gṛhyate. kasyacit kadācid vivekānavagamāt. ataḥ
GSP28mimsvtku:3748_1: kathaṃ mithyā bhaviṣyati. lākṣopahitaṃ tu sphaṭikaṃ kaścid evāvyutpanno 'jātaviveko
GSP28mimsvtku:3748_2: 'ruṇam iti budhyate. atas tajjñānaṃ bhrāntir bhavati. tadaiva hītare dṛṣṭavivekā
GSP28mimsvtku:3748_3: jānanti nedam aruṇam aupādhiko 'yam aruṇabhrama iti. avyutpanno 'pi copādhivigame
GSP28mimsvtku:3748_4: jānāty eva yathā nedam aruṇam iti. ato yuktaṃ bhrāntitvaṃ bādhotpādād iti || 143 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:3749_0: jātyāditadvatāṃ tu parasparaviveko na dṛṣṭapūrvaḥ. ato na bhrāntitvaṃ yuktam ity
GSP28mimsvtku:3749_1: āha -- na hīti. nanu bhavatv evaṃ jātau. na hi tayā nirmuktaṃ vastu kadācid upalabhyate.
GSP28mimsvtku:3749_2: guṇakarmabhyāṃ tu viyuktavastubodho dṛṣṭa eva. dhriyamāṇa eva hi dravye kutaścit
GSP28mimsvtku:3749_3: kāraṇāt pūrvaguṇavināśo guṇāntarotpādaś ca dṛśyate. evaṃ karmaṇy api darśayitavyam.
GSP28mimsvtku:3750: ata āha - tadvimokeneti. ayam abhiprāyaḥ -- yady api tadvimuktaṃ vastu dṛśyate,
GSP28mimsvtku:3751_0: tāni tu tadvimuktāni na jātu dṛśyante. yac ca nāma yato bhinnaṃ tat tato vimuktam
GSP28mimsvtku:3751_1: api kadācid upalabdhaṃ maṇer ivaupādhiko 'ruṇimā. na ceha tathā. ato vyāpakanivṛttyā
GSP28mimsvtku:3751_2: vyāpyasyātyantabhedasya nivṛttiḥ. katham idānīṃ pūrvāparayor guṇakarmaṇor nāśotpādau.
GSP28mimsvtku:3751_3: pratyabhijñāyate hi tad evedam iti dravyaṃ,
GSP28mimsvtku:3752: guṇakarmaṇī ca vinaṣṭe. tad idam abhede nopapadyate. na nopapadyate,
GSP28mimsvtku:3753: sthityutpattivināśātmakam eva no vastv iti rucakādyudāharaṇe vakṣyāmaḥ. tad iha vastv api guṇakarmanāśe naśyaty eva. rūpaṃ hi tad vastunaḥ,
GSP28mimsvtku:3754: kathaṃ tadvināśe na naśatīti śakyate vaktum. tayor api nātyantiko vināśaḥ,
GSP28mimsvtku:3755_0: vastvātmanā vidyamānatvāt. jātāv api caiṣaiva gatiḥ. tatrāpi hi sthityupattivināśā
GSP28mimsvtku:3755_1: dṛśyanta eva. viyuktabodho 'pi dṛśayate. dṛśyate hi vinaṣṭapiṇḍaviyuktā puṇḍāntare
GSP28mimsvtku:3755_2: jātiḥ. sā kathaṃ tato bhinnā bhaviṣyati. atha tatra kathañcid bhedam āśritya samādhir{1,
GSP28mimsvtku:3757: śakyo 'sau guṇakarmaṇor api vaktum iti kena viśeṣeṇa jātāv abhedam āśritya guṇakarmaṇor bhedaṃ varṇayāñ cakruḥ. ato yadā jātyādayo dṛśyante,
GSP28mimsvtku:3758: tadā[684]piṇḍād abhedenaivāvagamyanta ity abhedo 'pi teṣām. yaiva tu kācid anupapattir āpādyate sānekāntavādināṃ nāsajyata ity astu tāvad idam iti || 144 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:3762: yadi tu jātyādibodhavidhānuvidhāyinaḥ sphaṭikādāv api cāruṇādibodhā bhaveyuḥ,
GSP28mimsvtku:3763: kas teṣām api prāmāṇyaṃ vārayed ity āha -[685]tatrāpīti || 145 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:3767_0: evaṃ jātyādīnām abhedaṃ pratipādyedānīm aikāntikabhedavādinaḥ kāṇādān pratyāha --
GSP28mimsvtku:3767_1: na cāpīti. evaṃ hi manyante -- bhinnayor eva jātyāditadvatoḥ samavāyalakṣaṇaḥ sambandha
GSP28mimsvtku:3767_2: iti. tathā ca paṭhanti -- ayutasiddhānām ādhārādheyabhūtānām ihapratyayahetur yaḥ
GSP28mimsvtku:3767_3: sambandhaḥ sa samavāyaḥ iti. tadayutasiddhayoḥ sambandhitvāsambhavād anupapannam
GSP28mimsvtku:3767_4: iti. kathaṃ punar ayutasiddhānāṃ sambandhitvam[686]anupapannaṃ bhavatīty ata āha
GSP28mimsvtku:3767_5: -- nāniṣpannasya sambandha iti. ayam abhiprāyaḥ -- keyam ayutasiddhaḥ. kiṃ[687]yutasiddhyabhāvamātram,
GSP28mimsvtku:3769: kasya kena sambandha iti siddhayor hi sambandhinoḥ sambandho bhavati,
GSP28mimsvtku:3771: tatrāpy etad evottaraṃ nāniṣpannasya sambandha iti. apṛthaṅniṣpannayos tādātmyād iti bhāvaḥ. athaitaddoṣaparihārārthaṃ pṛthaṅniṣpattir iṣyate,
GSP28mimsvtku:3772: tathā sati yutasiddhir evāpadyata ity āha -- niṣpattāv iti || 146 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:3778: kiṃ punar[689]aniṣṭam āpāditam. nanv iṣyata eva jātitadvator asambaddhayor eva kiyān api kālabhedaḥ. tāṃ ca tayor avasthāṃ yoginaḥ paśanti nānye. na{1,
GSP28mimsvtku:3779_0: 263}tāvatā rajjughaṭayor iva tayor yutasiddhayor eva sambandhaḥ saṃyogaḥ syād iti
GSP28mimsvtku:3779_1: vācyam. na hi naḥ pṛthaksiddhir yutasiddhilakṣaṇam. api tarhi. bhinnāśrayatvaṃ pṛthaggatimattvaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:3779_2: ca. dvayor anyatarasya vā yutasiddhiḥ tadabhāvo 'yutasiddhiḥ. ca na jātes tadubhayam
GSP28mimsvtku:3779_3: astīty ayutasiddhayoḥ samavāya eva sambandho bhaviṣyati,
GSP28mimsvtku:3780_0: ata āha -- tathā ca satīti. ayam abhiprāyaḥ -- na tāvat pṛthaksiddhe jātivyaktī vayam
GSP28mimsvtku:3780_1: upalabhāmahe. yogigamyaś ca jātyādirahitaḥ kṣaṇo dussādha eva. upetyāpi brūmaḥ. hetvabhāvāt
GSP28mimsvtku:3780_2: sambandho na syād iti. na hi rajjughaṭayor iva pṛthaksiddhayor devadattādijātivyaktyoḥ
GSP28mimsvtku:3780_3: saṃyojako dṛśyate. samavāyas tu na tāvat sambandhahetuḥ,
GSP28mimsvtku:3782: naivam api yutasiddhau sambadhnāti. nanūktaṃ yutasiddhir eva jāter nāstīti bhinnāśrayasamavāyābhāvād apṛthaggatimattvāc ceti. na,
GSP28mimsvtku:3784: nañā tadabhāvamātram ayutasiddhir ākhyāyate. sā cet pṛthaksiddhir asti katham ayutasiddhir bhaviṣyati. athāpi pāribhāṣiko 'yutasiddhiśabdaḥ,
GSP28mimsvtku:3785_0: tathāpi vyakteḥ svāvayavasamavāyitvāj jāteś ca vyaktyāśrayatvād bhinnāśrayāśrayitvam
GSP28mimsvtku:3785_1: astīti yutasiddhiprasaṅgaḥ. na ca yutasiddhisambandhe samavāyo hetuḥ. na ca hetvantaram
GSP28mimsvtku:3785_2: apy astīti sūktaṃ na sambandhe hetuḥ kaścid iti. sambandhahetvabhāvāc ca ṣaḍ api
GSP28mimsvtku:3785_3: dravyādayaḥ padārthāḥ asambandhā bhaveyur ity āha - ṣaṇṇām iti || 147 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:3790: ayaṃ samavāyaḥ sambadhya vā samavāyinau sambandhāti asambadhya vā. na tāvad asambadhya,
GSP28mimsvtku:3791: asambaddhasya sambandhahetor adṛṣṭatvāt. sambandhas tu sambandhahetvantaram antareṇa na sambhavati,
GSP28mimsvtku:3792_0: na ca tad upalabhyate. ataḥ samavāyibhyaḥ samavāyasya viyogād viśleṣāt samavāyinām
GSP28mimsvtku:3792_1: api parasparaviśleṣaḥ syād ity āha -- samavāyeti. sambandhahetvantarakalpanāyāṃ tv
GSP28mimsvtku:3792_2: avyavasthā syād ity āha -- tatkḷptāv iti || 148 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:3794: 264} yadi tu samavāyinor ātmarūpaṃ svarūpam eva samavāyaḥ nāsāv anyena sambandhanīya ity ucyate,
GSP28mimsvtku:3795: evaṃ tarhy aṅgīkṛto 'bhedavāda iti dharmadharmiṇor eva svarūpaṃ samavāyo 'stu yady avaśyaṃ samavāyanāmnā prayojanaṃ,
GSP28mimsvtku:3797_0: atra kāraṇam āha -- na hīti. uktam idaṃ vyatiriktasya sambandhahetvantarābhyupagame
GSP28mimsvtku:3797_1: 'navasthā. abhede tu param ubhayavādisiddhayor dharmadharmiṇor evābhedo 'bhyupagantavyaḥ.
GSP28mimsvtku:3799: dharmy eva tu bhinno nopalabhyate yaḥ savikalpakajñānair viṣayīkriyate,
GSP28mimsvtku:3800_0: tat tāvad upanyasyati -- nanv iti. evaṃ hi manyante -- nāyaṃ dharmī dharmebhyo 'tirikto
GSP28mimsvtku:3800_1: 'ṅgulībhya ivāṅguṣṭho dṛśyate. na cāsya vyavasthāpane pratyakṣaṃ prakramate. tasyendriyajatvādindriyāṇāṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:3800_2: pañcānāṃ pañcasu rūpādiṣūpakṣīṇatvāt. ṣaṣṭhasya ca manasaḥ svātantryeṇa bahirviṣayavyavasthāpane
GSP28mimsvtku:3802: na ṣaṣṭham indriyaṃ tasya grāhakaṃ vidyate bahiḥ ||
GSP28mimsvtku:3803: iti. ato rūpādisaṅghātamātram evedaṃ bahir upalabhyate na tattvāntaraṃ vṛkṣasaṅghāta iva vanabuddhir iti || 151 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:3804: atra parihāram āha -- āvirbhāveti dharmyantena. ayam abhiprāyaḥ -- pratīmo hi vayaṃ viṣphāritākṣā rūpādivad ekaṃ dravyaṃ na ca viparyeti tat{1,
GSP28mimsvtku:3805: 265}katham anyathā bhaviṣyatīti. yattvabhedena nopalabhyata iti. satyam,
GSP28mimsvtku:3806_0: kena vā dharmebhyo 'tyantabhedo dharmiṇa upeyate. grāhakābhāvas tu rūpādivadanvayavyatirekābhyāṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:3806_1: darśanasparśanayor eva sāmarthyapradarśanena parihartavyaḥ. api ca yadi dharmātirikto
GSP28mimsvtku:3806_2: dharmī na syāt ko 'yam āvirbhāvatirobhāvadharmakeṣu rūpādiṣv anugataḥ pratyabhijñāyate.
GSP28mimsvtku:3806_3: pratyabhijānīmo hi vayam agnisaṃyogapracyāvitaprācyarūpam upajātarūpāntaraṃ so[690]'yaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:3806_4: ghaṭa iti ghaṭam. na ca tadatyantābhede ghaṭate sthityutpattivināśānām ekatrāpātāt.
GSP28mimsvtku:3807_0: dharmirūpaṃ yadvaśād evaṃ vibhāga iti. api cātyantābhedapakṣe dharmagrahaṇam antareṇa
GSP28mimsvtku:3807_1: dharmī na jñāyetaiva. dṛśyate ca dharmagrahaṇāt prāg eva santam asādau dharmijñānam
GSP28mimsvtku:3807_2: ity āha -- yatra veti. ataḥ siddham asti dharmi dharmāś ca tadanatirekiṇo jātyādaya iti || 152 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:3811: tadviśiṣṭabodhe pararūpanirūpaṇābhāvān nāprāmāṇyaṃ savikalpakajñānām ity āha -- ata iti || 153 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:3813: tathāpi na mithyety āha -- yasyāpīti dvayena. ayam abhiprāyaḥ -- nānyarūpasaṃvedyatāmātreṇa mithyātvaṃ,
GSP28mimsvtku:3814: kin tu punar anyathāsaṃvedanena. bādhakapratyayeneti yāvat. iha ca sarveṣāṃ sarvadā ca tadrūpā buddhir iti bhāvanāyā iva dhātvarthaviśiṣṭabodho na mithyeti || 155 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:3815: nanv evaṃ kāyacakṣur gocaro dharmī bhidyate grāhakabhedād rūpādivat. tāni vā tadvad eva saty api grāhakabhede na bhidyeran anekendriyagrāhyam ekaṃ[691]sad{1,
GSP28mimsvtku:3817_1: api. ekam eva hi tadendriyaṃ nānāviṣayān paricchetsyatīti kim indriyabhedena. tad uktaṃ -
GSP28mimsvtku:3821: naikaṃ rūpādyabhedo vā dṛṣṭaṃ cen nendriyeṇa tat |
GSP28mimsvtku:3822: akṣānekatvavaiyarthyaṃ svārthe bhinne 'pi śaktimat || PS 1.21c-22d (cf. NR 131,27-28)
GSP28mimsvtku:3824: atrāha -- na cāneketi. yat tāvad uktaṃ grāhakabhedād bheda iti. tad ayuktaṃ,
GSP28mimsvtku:3826: yadi tu cakṣuṣṭvenaikatvād indriyabheda eva tatra nāstīty ucyate,
GSP28mimsvtku:3827_0: tad ihāpīndriyatvena samānam. ato buddhibhedanibandhana eva bhedo na grāhakabhedanibandhana
GSP28mimsvtku:3827_1: ity abhiprāyeṇāha -- jātyabhedād iti. ata eva bhinnendriyagrāhyāpi sattā ekabuddhiviṣayatayā
GSP28mimsvtku:3827_2: na bhidyata ity āha -- tulyeti. sarvendriyair hi sattāguṇatvayor jñānam iti bhāvaḥ || 157 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:3828_0: rūpādyabhedo veti yad uktaṃ tatrāha -- buddhibhedād iti. siddhasādhanatvaṃ vā dvayor
GSP28mimsvtku:3828_1: api prayogayor ity āha -- eketi. sadrūpeṇa rūpādīnām ekatvaṃ rūpādirūpeṇa ca dharmiṇo
GSP28mimsvtku:3829_0: akṣānekatvavaiyarthye parihāram āha -- kvacic ceti. na kvacid dharmiṇi tvakcakṣuṣoḥ
GSP28mimsvtku:3829_1: saṅkaro dṛṣṭa ity ekam evākṣaṃ yuktam ity arthaḥ. atra kāraṇam āha -- dārḍhyeti.
GSP28mimsvtku:3830: taddārḍhyadaurbalyabhedena vyavasthā nopapadyeta. dṛḍhe hi cakṣuṣi durbale ca śrotre rūpam upalabhyate. evaṃ balavati{1,
GSP28mimsvtku:3831: 267}śrotre durbale ca cakṣuṣy api śabdaḥ śrūyate. seyaṃ cakṣuś śrotrayor viṣayavyavasthā nākṣaikatve ghaṭata iti || 159 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:3833: sarvatraiva prasaṅgāt. yadi hīndriyāntaram indriyāntaraviṣaye na pravartate,
GSP28mimsvtku:3834_0: kvacid api na pravarteta. pravṛttau vāvyavasthayā sarvatraiva pravarteta atikramadarśanād
GSP28mimsvtku:3834_1: ata āha -- yathā hīti dvayena. nedam adṛṣṭāntaṃ pakṣīkriyate yat kvacid vyavasthā
GSP28mimsvtku:3834_2: kvacit saṅkara iti. saṅkīryate hi manaścakṣurādibhiḥ rūpādibodhe. sukhādisaṃvedane
GSP28mimsvtku:3834_3: ca vyavatiṣṭhate. ataḥ kāryadarśanānusāriṇau vyavasthāsaṅkarau nānupapannau. na tv
GSP28mimsvtku:3834_4: ekatra vyavasthādarśanāt sarvatraiva saṅkaro nirvartate. kvacid vā dṛṣṭa iti sarvatraiva
GSP28mimsvtku:3835: kiṃ punar anayor vyavasthāsaṅkarayor manasaḥ kāraṇam ata āha -- śrotrāder iti. upahataśrotrādir api śabdādi smarati ity ata āntare smṛtisukhādāv anyanirapekṣaṃ,
GSP28mimsvtku:3836: vartamānaṃ ca rūpādi na jānāti. atas tatra bahiḥkāraṇāpekṣaṃ manaḥ.[692]ataḥ kvacit saṅkaraḥ kvacic cāsaṅkara iti vyavasthā sidhyatīti || 162 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:3840: evaṃ kāryavyavasthayā vyavasthāsaṅkarau pratipādyedānīm akṣaikatve doṣam āha -- ekam iti. nanv ekatve 'pi śaktibhedād vyavasthā setsyati,
GSP28mimsvtku:3841: ata ekam eva sarvaśarīravyāpi tvagindriyaṃ kalpyatāṃ,
GSP28mimsvtku:3842: śaktayas tasya dehabhāgeṣu bhinnā bhavantu kim indriyabhedenāta āha -- kalpyata iti. śaktibhedo vā kalpyate indriyabhedo vā. ko viśeṣaḥ. nanv indriyakalpanāyāṃ{1,
GSP28mimsvtku:3843: 268}śaktimadbhedo 'py aparaḥ kalpanīya iti gauravam. astu vā pramāṇavanty adṛṣṭāni kalpyāni subahūny api,
GSP28mimsvtku:3844_0: santi deheṣu pṛthivyādibhūtabhāgāḥ kḷptagandhādiprakāśanaśaktayaś ceti varṇitam.
GSP28mimsvtku:3844_1: yat tu sakalaśarīravyāpina ekasyaiva vāyavīyasya tvagindriyasya rūpādiprakāśanaśaktikalpanaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:3844_2: tadatyantāparidṛṣṭam apramāṇakam iti bhāvaḥ. indriyaṃ bhaved iti. indriyasthāne śaktiḥ
GSP28mimsvtku:3845: evaṃ dārḍhyadaurbalyabhedena kāryavyavasthāṃ pratipādyākṣānekatvaṃ samarthitam. idānīṃ vyavasthānāśrayaṇe doṣam āha -- śṛṇuyād iti. yadi nendriyāṇi vyavasthitaviṣayāṇi bhaveyuḥ,
GSP28mimsvtku:3846_0: badhiro 'pi cakṣuṣmān śabdaṃ śṛṇuyāt. cakṣuṣo 'pi tadviṣayavyāpārāt. ato naikatra
GSP28mimsvtku:3846_1: saṅkaradarśanena sarvatra tatkalpanā kāryā. tad idaṃ dārḍhyadaurbalyabhedenety asyaiva
GSP28mimsvtku:3846_2: vyatirekapradarśanam. vyavasthā tāvad dṛśyate. yadi tu sarvatraiva saṅkaraḥ syād
GSP28mimsvtku:3846_3: ayaṃ doṣaḥ syād iti. manasa idānīṃ yathā hi manasa ity anena nidarśitayor[693]vyavasthāsaṅkarayor
GSP28mimsvtku:3846_4: uktayor vyatireke doṣaṃ darśayiṣyan saṅkaravyatireke tāvad āha -- manaso veti. ayam
GSP28mimsvtku:3846_5: arthaḥ -- yadi mano bahirviṣayavedane svatantraṃ bhavet,
GSP28mimsvtku:3847_0: tatrāpy ayam eva doṣaḥ badhiraḥ śabdaṃ śṛṇuyād iti. tasyāpi manaso bhāvāt. ayaṃ ca
GSP28mimsvtku:3847_1: vartamānasya cājñānād ity anena yo bahirviṣayavedane manasaḥ saṅkaro darśitaḥ tasya
GSP28mimsvtku:3851: antarviṣayavedane ca yanmanasaḥ svātantryam uktaṃ tadvyatireke doṣam āha -- na smared iti. yadi hy āntare 'pi bahirviṣayavedanavanmano bāhyāpekṣaṃ bhaved,
GSP28mimsvtku:3852: badhiraḥ śabdaṃ na smaret śrotrābhāvāt. athāsaty api kāraṇe{1,
GSP28mimsvtku:3854: evam eva vartamānopalabdhir api bhavet. ayaṃ ca śrotrāder upaghāte 'pīty anenoktāyā āntareṣu manaso vyavasthāyā vyatireka iti || 165 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:3855_0: paratantraṃ bahirviṣayavedane mana ity uktam. kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇaṃ bāhyabodhe mano vyāpriyata
GSP28mimsvtku:3855_1: iti. santi cakṣurādīny eva tatra kāraṇāni ata āha -- smṛtiś ceti velāyāmantena. ayam
GSP28mimsvtku:3855_2: abhiprāyaḥ -- evaṃvādinā[694]mana evākṣipyate. tatra caitad eva tāvad vaktavyam.
GSP28mimsvtku:3855_3: ātmendriyārthasannikarṣe jñānasyābhāvo bhāvaś[695]ca manaso liṅgam iti. asti khalv
GSP28mimsvtku:3855_4: ātmā. sannikṛṣyate ca nānārthair nāyanaṃ tejaḥ. kiñcid eva tu jñāyate na sarvam.
GSP28mimsvtku:3855_5: tat kasya hetoḥ kāraṇavaikalyena kāryapratibandho dṛṣṭaḥ yathā satsu tantuṣu paṭo
GSP28mimsvtku:3855_6: notpadyate tantusaṃyogānām abhāvāt. evam ihāpy asti tadanyad jñānakāraṇaṃ yasminn
GSP28mimsvtku:3855_7: avyāpriyamāṇe na jñānam utpadyate vyāpriyamāṇe ca bhavati. tac ca mana ity ucyate.
GSP28mimsvtku:3855_8: api ca śrotrādibhiḥ śabdādyupalabdhikāle yadi mano na vyāpriyate,
GSP28mimsvtku:3856: katham uttarakālaṃ smaraṇam upapadyeta. mano hi smṛtyutpattau kāraṇam. tad yadi śabdādyupalabdhivelāyāṃ mano vyāpṛtaṃ bhavati,
GSP28mimsvtku:3857_0: tataḥ pūrvam asāv artho manasā prakāśita iti parastād api smaryata ity upapannaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:3857_1: bhavati. bāhyendriyamātrakāraṇake tu pūrvajñāne teṣāṃ smṛtisamavāye vyāpārābhāvāt
GSP28mimsvtku:3857_2: smṛtir na syāt. na hy akāraṇikā jñānotpattiḥ sambhavati. ato 'sti bahirviṣayabodhe
GSP28mimsvtku:3857_3: manovyāpāraḥ. sukhādisaṃvedanaṃ cāsattve manaso nopapadyeteti. api cāsattve manaso
GSP28mimsvtku:3857_4: yad idaṃ pūrvānubhūtānāṃ sarveṣām asmaraṇaṃ tannopapadyate. kiñcid eva tu kadācit
GSP28mimsvtku:3857_5: kaścit smaratīti dṛśyate. tad evam upapadyate yady asti kiñcid antaḥkaraṇaṃ,
GSP28mimsvtku:3858_0: tadātmasaṃyogaviśeṣeṇa hi tadā smṛtir vyavatiṣṭhate. na ca saṃskārodbodhānudbodhakṛtā
GSP28mimsvtku:3858_1: vyavasthā. anugrāhako hi karaṇānāṃ saṃskāraḥ na svatantraḥ karaṇam. itarathā tu sa
GSP28mimsvtku:3863: āha -- setsyaty ayaṃ bāhyāntaḥkaraṇavivekaḥ. karaṇasadbhāva eva tu kiṃ kāraṇaṃ,
GSP28mimsvtku:3864: bodhasvabhāvo hi puruṣaḥ. tadayam anyanirapekṣa eva śabdādīn{1,
GSP28mimsvtku:3866: ata āha -- bodheti. yadi hy ayaṃ bodha[696]svabhāvo 'nyanirapekṣo budhyate,
GSP28mimsvtku:3867: yugapad eva viśvaṃ jānīyāt. ato 'vaśyamasya niyāmakāni kāraṇāny abhyupagantavyānīti || 167 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:3871_1: -- tasmād iti. kāryadvāreṇa hi grāhyagrāhakaśaktayaḥ. tābhyo vyavasthāsaṅkarasiddhir iti || 168 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:3877_0: ata āha -- cakṣūrūpādīti. nānāvidham api hi rūpaṃ viṣphāritākṣā budhyanta ity avāntarabhedam
GSP28mimsvtku:3877_1: anādṛtya rūpamātraprakāśakam eva cakṣur iti niścīyate. evaṃ śrotre 'pi darśayitavyam.
GSP28mimsvtku:3877_2: ato nendriyānantyam. cakṣūrūpādīti. cakṣurādibhedo rūpādibhedavaśeneti. ādiśabdasya
GSP28mimsvtku:3878: sukhagrahaṇārtham idānīṃ vyavasthāsaṅkarau saṃkṣipya darśayati -- tasmād iti. sparśavaddravyaparimāṇaṃ mūrtiḥ. asarvagatadravyaparimāṇaṃ vā,
GSP28mimsvtku:3879_0: tadviśiṣṭāni bhūmyaptejāṃsi dravyāṇi dvābhyāṃ darśanasparśanābhyām upalabhyante.
GSP28mimsvtku:3879_1: rūpādipañcakaṃ vaikaikaśaś cakṣurādibhiḥ. evaṃ dravyāntaraguṇāntarakarmaṇāṃ jāteś
GSP28mimsvtku:3881_0: 271} evaṃ tāvad asti dharmī grāhakabhede cābhinnaḥ. jātyādayaś ca tadanatirekiṇo
GSP28mimsvtku:3881_1: dharmā iti pararūpanirūpaṇābhāvān na savikalpakajñānānāṃ mithyātvam ity uktam. idānīm
GSP28mimsvtku:3881_2: aśabdarūpāṇām eva bhāvānāṃ savikalpakajñāneṣu śabdākāreṇa nirūpyamāṇatvād asti pārarūpyam iti ye vadanti,
GSP28mimsvtku:3882: teṣāṃ matam upanyasyati -- nanv iti. ayam arthaḥ -- yady api jātyādirūpo dharmī,
GSP28mimsvtku:3883_0: tathāpi teṣām eva śabdātiriktānām abhāvāt tadrūpeṇa vastuni nirūpyamāṇe śabdātmanaiva
GSP28mimsvtku:3883_1: nirūpaṇam āpadyate. tataś cāśabdātmanāṃ śabdātmanā nirūpaṇe punar api pārarūpyam
GSP28mimsvtku:3883_2: āpannam iti mṛgatṛṣṇādijñānavad eva pañca vikalpā mithyā syur iti || 171 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:3884: pariharati -- na śabdeti. kāraṇam āha -- prāg iti. buddhir evātra śabdākārā nāstīti bhāvaḥ || 172 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:3885_0: atra codayati -- nanv iti dvayena. ayam arthaḥ -- kim idaṃ prāg śabdād yādṛśī buddhir
GSP28mimsvtku:3885_1: ity ucyate. na hi śabdārthasambandhajñānāt prāg gotvaśuklatvādirūpeṇa gavākārādibhāvaviṣayā
GSP28mimsvtku:3885_2: buddhayo bhavanti. śabdasambandhottarakālam eva tadrūpā buddhir utpadyate. tad yadi
GSP28mimsvtku:3885_3: śabdātirekiṇo jātyādayaḥ santi teṣāṃ ca tadrūpatvaṃ,
GSP28mimsvtku:3886: tataḥ prāg api śabdasambandhād aśabdajño 'pi tadrūpaṃ lakṣayet. na ca lakṣayati. ataḥ śabdānvayavyatirekānuvidhānāc chabdasyaiva tadrūpatvam iti niścīyata iti || 174 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:3888: 272} pariharati -- yatheti. yathaiva hi rūparasagandhasparśaśabdā evākṣajāyāṃ buddhau vibhaktā bhāsante vināpi śabdam,
GSP28mimsvtku:3889_0: evaṃ gotvādijātayo gamanādīni karmāṇi prāg api śabdān nirvikalpakenāpi vilakṣaṇena
GSP28mimsvtku:3889_1: rūpeṇa pratīyanta eva. sambandhagrahaṇottarakālaṃ tu kevalaṃ saṃjñāsaṃjñisambandhagrahaṇam
GSP28mimsvtku:3889_2: evādhikaṃ nāparaṃ kiñcit. yadi tu śabdādayo na santīty ucyate,
GSP28mimsvtku:3891: sidhyaty api śabdātmakatā yadi śabdasambhedāt prāg gotvādayo na pratīyanta eva. na tv etad asti,
GSP28mimsvtku:3892: agṛhītasambandhasyāpi tadbodhotpādād ity āha -- na ceti || 176 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:3893: parastād api nābhedopacāro 'stīty āha -- śrutīti. kāraṇam āha -- vivekād iti. dvābhyām[698]indriyābhyāṃ dvāv arthaśabdau gamyete ity arthaḥ || 177 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:3897: anyataradharmaniṣkarṣamātre tu śabdasya vyāpāraḥ, na svarūpāropa ity āha -- ananteti || 178 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:3898: syād etat -- upāyaḥ śabdo 'rthabodhe. upāyadharmāś copeye 'dhyāropyamāṇā dṛṣṭā darpaṇādidharmā iva mukhādau,
GSP28mimsvtku:3899: ata āha -- na ceti. anaikāntiko hetur iti bhāvaḥ || 179 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:3901_0: 273} atrāpare vadanti -- na vayaṃ jātyādīn apalapāmaḥ. kiṃ tarhi. gaur ayam iti sāmānādhikaraṇyena
GSP28mimsvtku:3901_1: śabdarūpānuviddhabodhād rūpasamāropam ācakṣmahe iti. tān pratyāha -- nityam iti.
GSP28mimsvtku:3901_2: ayam abhiprāyaḥ -- yadi śabdarūpānuviddha eva sarvadā gotvādibodhaḥ rūpāntaraṃ tu
GSP28mimsvtku:3903: asati bhede kutra kim adhyastyata iti || 180 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:3904_0: abhedābhyupagame ca pārarūpyābhāvān na savikalpakajñānānāṃ mithyātvam ity āha --
GSP28mimsvtku:3904_1: yady abheda iti. pāramārthike tu svarūpabhedābhyupagame 'dhyāropavācoyuktir anarthikā.
GSP28mimsvtku:3904_2: na hy asaṅkīrṇasvabhāvaṃ vastu vastvantarātmanā bhrāntivarjitair āropayituṃ śakyate.
GSP28mimsvtku:3904_3: na ca sarvadā sarveṣāṃ bhrāntiḥ sambhavati,
GSP28mimsvtku:3905: tad etad āha -- bhedaś ced iti. ato bhrāntyaiveyam adhyāsakalpanā tadvādinām ity āha -- bhrāntyeti || 181 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:3906_0: bhrāntau bījam āha -- śabdeneti. gṛhīto hy artho na śabdam antareṇa nirdeṣṭuṃ śakyata
GSP28mimsvtku:3906_1: iti bhāvaḥ. tathāpi kim ata āha -- gaur iti. trayāṇām api vācyavācakajñānānāṃ samāno
GSP28mimsvtku:3906_2: nirdeśaḥ gaur[699]iti śabdo gaur ity artho gaur iti jñānam iti. vācyaṃ ca sa ca buddhiś
GSP28mimsvtku:3906_3: ca vācyatadbuddhayaḥ. tadvādināṃ puruṣāṇāṃ gaur iti samāno nirdeśaḥ pratīyata ity arthaḥ || 182 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:3910: tathāpi kiṃ jātam ata āha -- nirdeśeti. ayam arthaḥ -- evaṃ hi śrotā vikalpayati yato 'yaṃ vaktā triṣv api samānaṃ śabdaṃ prayuṅkte,
GSP28mimsvtku:3912_0: 274}'syānubhavas triṣv api samāna eva. tadvac ca svayam api savikalpakajñānaprameyam
GSP28mimsvtku:3912_1: arthaṃ budhyamānas trigocarasya jñānasya vaktṛsvarūpatām adhyavasyati. yādṛśaṃ vaktrā
GSP28mimsvtku:3912_2: pratipannaṃ tādṛg eva pratipadyata iti yāvat. evaṃ pūrvapūrvavaktranusāreṇottarottareṣāṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:3914_0: arthādhyāsa eva kiṃ na śabdabuddhyoḥ pratipādyate. samānaṃ hi bhrāntibījam ata āha
GSP28mimsvtku:3914_1: -- bhrāntīti. upāyo hy arthasya jaḍātmanaḥ svayam aprakāśasya matiśrutī. upāyapūrvikā
GSP28mimsvtku:3914_2: copeyasthitir iti tatpūrvam arthaṃ budhyamānās tadadhyāsaṃ manyante. śrutiś ca śrūyata
GSP28mimsvtku:3914_3: iti śabdo 'bhidhīyate. matyadhyāsaś ca pūrvam anupakṣipto 'pi kaiścid āśritaḥ. sa
GSP28mimsvtku:3914_4: ca śabdādhyāsanirākaraṇenaiva tulyanyāyatayā nirākṛto bhaviṣyatīty upanyastaḥ. evaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:3915_0: ato jñānākāra evārtha iti. tad api jñānāt prāg evārtharūpopalambhāt taddvāreṇaiva
GSP28mimsvtku:3915_1: jñānāvadhāraṇān nirākṛtaṃ veditavyam. vikalpaparihāras tv ākṛtigranthe vakṣyate.
GSP28mimsvtku:3920: nipuṇaṃ tu cintayatāṃ triṣv api vilakṣaṇā buddhir upajāyata ity āha -- gotva iti. ubhayor jñānam anākāram anumīyata ity arthaḥ || 185 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:3921_0: ayam aparaḥ śabdādhyāse doṣa ity āha -- yadi ceti. śabdena sahābhedarūpeṇety arthaḥ.
GSP28mimsvtku:3921_1: akṣādau śabde 'dhyasyamāne śabdaikatvāt tadrūpatvāc cārthasya devanāder ekatvaṃ prasajyata iti || 186 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:3923: 275} nanv asty evānakṣanivṛttyā triṣv apy ekatvaṃ,
GSP28mimsvtku:3924_0: na. śabdāt prāganavagateḥ. agṛhītasambandhasya ca śabdasyāpratyāyakatvāt. tad etad
GSP28mimsvtku:3924_1: āśaṅkayā sahāha -- syād iti. adhyāsavādī svābhiprāyeṇa codayati -- gavādiṣv iti.
GSP28mimsvtku:3924_2: itaraś ca[702]svamatatvenottaram āha -- neti. kāraṇam āha -- eketi. dṛśyate hi prāg
GSP28mimsvtku:3924_3: eva śabdān nirvikalpakenāpy ekaṃ rūpam anugatam iti prāg evoktam iti || 187 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:3928: vibhītakādiṣu naikarūpānugamo 'stīty āha -- traya iti. śabda evātra sādhāraṇo gavādijātiśabdavilakṣaṇo nārtha iti || 188 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:3929_0: kiṃ punar atrāpy ekaśabdavācyatayā śābaleyādivadekadharmānvayo neṣyate. ata āha --
GSP28mimsvtku:3929_1: paraspareti. ayaṃ ca viviktākṛtibodho 'dhyāsapakṣe na yuktaḥ. śabdarūpasyāvibhāgād
GSP28mimsvtku:3930_0: nanu na varṇaḥ śabdaḥ. kiṃ tarhi. sphoṭaḥ. tad iha bhinnārthapratyayāvaseya eva bhinnaḥ
GSP28mimsvtku:3930_1: sphoṭa ity āśaṅkate -- bhinnāḥ syur iti. tatra parihāram āha -- neti. kāraṇam āha
GSP28mimsvtku:3930_2: -- artha iti. saṃśayo hy artha uccarite śabde bhavati. sa śabdabhede na bhaved iti
GSP28mimsvtku:3930_3: bhāvaḥ. yadi saṃśayaḥ tataḥ kim ata āha -- na sāmānyād iti. sāmānyadarśananibandhano
GSP28mimsvtku:3930_4: hi saṃśayaḥ. sa śabdabhede 'nupapanna iti. śabdasādṛśyāt tarhi saṃśayo bhaviṣyatīty
GSP28mimsvtku:3930_5: ata āha -- rūpābheda iti. ayam abhiprāyaḥ -- na varṇātiriktaḥ padasphoṭo 'stīti vakṣyāmaḥ. varṇā eva hi padaṃ,
GSP28mimsvtku:3932: {1,276} durbhaṇaḥ śabdabheda iti dūṣaṇāntaram āha -- bhavatyādāv iti || 191 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:3933_0: ayaṃ cāparo doṣa ity āha -- śabdeti kathamantena. abhinnā hi śabdasya niṣpannarūpatā
GSP28mimsvtku:3933_1: nāmākhyātayor iti. idaṃ ca nopapadyata ity āha -- kathaṃ ceti. kaḥ punar mūrto 'rthaḥ.
GSP28mimsvtku:3933_2: na tāvaj jātiḥ amūrtatvāt. vyaktis tv adhyāsavādibhir api nāpalapitaiva. sā ca mūrtaiveti.
GSP28mimsvtku:3933_3: ko doṣaḥ. satyam. idaṃ tu pariṇāmavivartavādinaḥ pratyuktam. pariṇāmavādino hi vāg
GSP28mimsvtku:3934_0: ta upālabhyante. katham amūrtasya mūrtaḥ pariṇāmaḥ. mūrtānāṃ hi mṛdādīnāṃ mūrto ghaṭādipariṇāmo
GSP28mimsvtku:3934_1: bhavatīti yuktam. evaṃ vivartavāde 'pi vācyam. mūrtaṃ hi mukham ādarśe vivṛttaṃ yuktaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:3934_2: yad mūrtam upalabhyate. amūrtavivarte tu kathaṃ mūrtanirbhāsā buddhir iti || 192 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:3935: tathā yac cedaṃ gavāśvādayo jātiśabdāḥ śuklādayo guṇaśabdā iti vibhajyante,
GSP28mimsvtku:3936: tad api vācyarūpānapekṣaṇe nopapadyata ity āha -- gavāśveti ||
GSP28mimsvtku:3937: viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvo 'pi bāhyārthānapekṣayā na vyavatiṣṭhata ity āha -- vṛkṣaplakṣādīti || 194 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:3938: sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ ca nīlotpalādiṣu śabdabuddhyor ivārthabuddhyor api nādhyāsa upapanna ity āha -- sāmānādhikaraṇyam iti. api ca{1,
GSP28mimsvtku:3939: 277}ekatropasaṃhṛte buddhī samānādhikaraṇe bhavataḥ. tad ihādhyāsavādināṃ kutraikatropasaṃhāro vācyaḥ. na tāvad asādhāraṇe,
GSP28mimsvtku:3940: tasyāpi kalpanīyatvād ity āha -- ekatreti. asmanmate tu vācyabhāgānupraveśadvāreṇāsty ekatropasaṃhāra iti vivecanīyam iti || 195 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:3941: yadi tv asādhāraṇa eva vastutvasāmānyagocara upasaṃhāra iṣyate,
GSP28mimsvtku:3942_0: tataḥ sarveṣām eva gavāśvādiśabdānāṃ vastugocaratvāviśeṣāt sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ prāpnotīty
GSP28mimsvtku:3942_1: āha -- vastumātra iti. iha vastutvābhyupagamam anāpādyaiva vārttikakṛtā doṣabāhulyād
GSP28mimsvtku:3943: abhyupagamyāpy asādhāraṇopasaṃhāraṃ vyaktyānantyān nīlopalapadaprayogo na syāt,
GSP28mimsvtku:3944: dṛśyate cāsāv iti dūṣaṇāntaram āha -- na ceti || 197 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:3945: na cānekanīlotpalavyaktisādhāraṇī nīlotpalatvajātir bhavadbhir iṣyate yatra śabdo vartetety āha -- na ceti. na kevalaṃ neṣyate,
GSP28mimsvtku:3946_0: yuktiś ca tadabhyupagame na bhavatīty āha -- śabdārthayor iti. dvau hy atra nīlotpalaśabdāv
GSP28mimsvtku:3946_1: adhyasyete. ataḥ śrutaśabdabhāgānugatau dvāv eva śabdādhyāsarūpāv arthau gamyete.
GSP28mimsvtku:3948: sa tarhi paryāyaśabdayor api kadācid avyutpannabodhārthe prayogo dṛṣṭa iti tayor api sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ syād ity āha -- śabdadvayasyeti || 199 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:3950_0: 278} api ca nānavagatasambandhaṃ padaṃ pratyāyayati. na cānavagate 'rthe sambandho
GSP28mimsvtku:3950_1: 'nubhavituṃ śakyate. tad ihādhyāsavāde sambandhānubhavavelāyāṃ kīdṛśo 'rthaḥ pratyetavya
GSP28mimsvtku:3950_2: iti vācyam ity āha -- na ceti. na kenacid rūpeṇa pratyetuṃ śakyata iti bhāvaḥ || 200 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:3952_0: ata āha -- tadānīm iti. śabdarūpo hy arthaḥ. na cāvyutpannas tādrūpyāvadhāraṇe samarthaḥ.
GSP28mimsvtku:3952_1: tad ihādhyāsāt sambandhabuddhiḥ tataś cādhyāsa iti tatretaretarāśrayam iti bhāvaḥ.
GSP28mimsvtku:3954: tad idānīṃ sambandhānapekṣasyaiva śabdasyātmādhyāsaśaktatvaṃ balād āpatitaṃ,
GSP28mimsvtku:3955: tatra ca prathamaśrāviṇo 'pi tadrūpārthabodhaprasaṅga ity āha -- tatreti ||
GSP28mimsvtku:3956: na ca vākyaṃ tavāpi śabdo nityam arthena sambaddhaḥ tat kimarthe smaraṇaṃ nādadhātīti. mama hy asti vācyaṃ vyatiriktaṃ tad,
GSP28mimsvtku:3957_0: yena vācyavācakasambandho 'vagataḥ sa śabdadarśanād arthaṃ smarati. yas tv asyedaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:3957_1: vācyam iti na jānāti na tasyārthasmaraṇam iti nānupapannaṃ kiñcid ity āha -- mameti.
GSP28mimsvtku:3957_2: bhavatas tu vācakarūpātiriktavācyarūpābhāvāt prathamaśravaṇe 'py adhyastarūpatā syād
GSP28mimsvtku:3957_3: iti pūrveṇa sambandha ity āha -- bhavata iti || 203 ||

GSP28mimsvtku:4505_1: tadanālambanam iti naḥ siddhāntaḥ. tathā ca dvicandrādijñānam. tato 'nālambanam ity
GSP28mimsvtku:4508_0: nanv evaṃ saṃvedanānapahnave yathāvabhāsam arthasya sattvāt sadasadviveko na syād
GSP28mimsvtku:4508_1: ata āha -- sarvatreti. asyārthaḥ -- idaṃ sad grāhyam idam asad grāhyam iti nāyam
GSP28mimsvtku:4508_2: artha idam arthaṃ prakāśayati idaṃ neti. kin tarhi. jāyamānāyām evārthagocarāyāṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:4508_3: saṃvittāv indriyārthasaṃyogasadasattvato 'yaṃ vibhāgaḥ. yad indriyasamprayuktam arthaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:4508_4: prakāśayati tat sad grāhyam. viparītam anyat. na ca yathāvabhāsam arthasya sattvam.
GSP28mimsvtku:4508_5: bādhakadarśanāt. ato yad deśāntarastham indriyāprāptam arthaṃ gṛhṇāti tad asad grāhyam.
GSP28mimsvtku:4508_6: tasyārtho nāstīty ucyate. kvacid dhi kiñcit pratiṣidhyate. na svarūpeṇaiva kiñcit.
GSP28mimsvtku:4509: 50} rajataṃ nāstīti. asti hi tad deśāntarādiṣu. kin tu iha nāstīti yatrendriyeṇa na prāpyate,
GSP28mimsvtku:4510: idam astīty api yad eva yatrendriyeṇa prāpyate tad ucyate. iha ghaṭo 'stīti pratītiḥ na punar ghaṭo 'stīti || 55 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:4511: na caiṣa vibhāgo bauddhasya sambhavatīty āha -- bhavata iti. na ca bauddhasyendriyādīni santi yat prāptyaprāptinibandhanaṃ bhāvālambanālambanapratiṣedhau yujyete iti || 56 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:4512: dūṣaṇāntaram āha -- bahirbhāveti sādhyatentena. na hy anālambanajñānavādināṃ bahirbhāvo nāma kaścit siddhaḥ,
GSP28mimsvtku:4513: yena viśiṣṭam anālambanatvaṃ buddheḥ sādhyata iti. kim iti na sādhyate,
GSP28mimsvtku:4514: ata āha -- naiṣa iti. pakṣaprajñāpanārthaṃ hi sādhanavacanaṃ,
GSP28mimsvtku:4516: kiṃ punaḥ pakṣo na jñāyate. ajñāte viśeṣaṇaviśeṣye ca viśiṣṭo na jñāyate. tac cobhayam api prasiddham eveti kiṃ viśeṣaṇaviśeṣaṇāprasiddhyā,
GSP28mimsvtku:4517: ata āha -- yatheti. viśeṣaṇāprasiddhāv eva kim. na tāvat pakṣasiddhiḥ,
GSP28mimsvtku:4518: tathāvidham anyo bodhayituṃ na śakyata iti cet,
GSP28mimsvtku:4519: samānam idaṃ tadviśeṣaṇāprasiddhāv apīti tadviśeṣaṇāprasiddhau pakṣo na jñāyata iti sūktam iti || 58 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:4520: etad eva prapañcayati -- nāprasiddha iti. pratijñāvākyārtho hi{2,
GSP28mimsvtku:4522: sa ca padārthapūrvakaḥ. ato bāhyādipadārthāsiddhau pakṣo na sidhyatīti || 59 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:4525: iti hi dvāv arthau sambhavataḥ paryudāsapratiṣedhābhyām. paryudāse hi nāmayogānnaño 'vyatiriktālambanaḥ pratyaya ity artho bhavati. niṣedhe tu ākhyātayo(gād)
GSP28mimsvtku:4526_0: vyatiriktaṃ nālambata iti. ubhayathā hi siddhasādhanam. prameyatvādinā hi jagato
GSP28mimsvtku:4526_1: na bhedam ātiṣṭhāmahe. ataḥ stambhādijñānāt prameyatvādināvyatiriktaṃ bhavati. ata
GSP28mimsvtku:4526_2: evābhedād vyatiriktaṃ ca na bhavatīti siddhasādhanam iti || 60 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:4528: idam api cātra vikalpanīyaṃ kim atyantabhinnena stambhādinā nirālambanatvaṃ sādhyate,
GSP28mimsvtku:4529_0: kathañcid bhinnena vā. pūrvasmin kalpe tāvat siddhasādhanam evety āha -- yadīti.
GSP28mimsvtku:4529_1: siddhasādhanam ity atītena sambandha iti. kathañcid bhinnena tu nirālambanatve sādhyamāne
GSP28mimsvtku:4529_2: prāk kalpitena pakṣavirodhaḥ. iṣyate hi kathañcit kalpanāmātrakalpitaṃ bhavadbhir
GSP28mimsvtku:4529_3: api bāhyālambanam. atas tanniṣedhe bhavati prākkalpitena pakṣabādhaḥ. tad etad āha
GSP28mimsvtku:4530: anyathā siddhasādhanaṃ darśayati -- vastv iti. buddhir hi vastvādyākāreṇa jaḍarūpā na kiñcidālambata iti siddham eva. asādhāraṇena tu prakāśātmanā{2,
GSP28mimsvtku:4531: 52}bāhyam ālambate. tatrāviśeṣitopādāne śakyaṃ siddhasādhanaṃ darśayitum iti. nanu grāhakād grāhyam abhinnam itīdam atra naḥ sādhyaṃ,
GSP28mimsvtku:4532_0: tatra kiṃ nānāvikalpaiḥ. ata āha -- grāhakād iti. na tāvannirālambanāḥ pratyayā ity
GSP28mimsvtku:4532_1: ayam arthaḥ grāhakād grāhyam abhinnam iti. evaṃ saty api yad dviśaktikatvaṃ jñānasyeṣṭaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:4533: grāhyāpalāpāt. yady api na bauddhair āśrayātirekiṇī śaktir iṣyate,
GSP28mimsvtku:4534: tathāpi śaktibhedadvāreṇa dvyātmakatvam eva darśayatīti draṣṭavyam iti || 62 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:4535: yadi tu sarvaprakārāsambhavān nirālambanabuddhyutpattimātram eva prasādhyate,
GSP28mimsvtku:4536: tatrāpi ca siddhasādhanam eva. utpadyate hi nirālambanāḥ pratyayā ity ukte nirālambanatvabuddhiḥ. na tv iyam arthakriyāyai samarthā,
GSP28mimsvtku:4538_0: nacānarthakatvam evāsyā na siddham iti vācyam. tatsatyatve hetor anaikāntikatvaprasaṅgāt.
GSP28mimsvtku:4538_1: ato mṛgatṛṣṇādijñānavad evātmāṃśaparyavasāyinī buddhir iyam abhyupagantavyā. asmākam
GSP28mimsvtku:4538_2: api sarvamithyātvagrāhipratyayamithyātvaṃ siddham evety āvayor avivādāt siddham anālambanabuddher
GSP28mimsvtku:4539: evaṃ cotpannāyām apy arthaśūnyāyām ātmāṃśaparyavasāyinyāmanālambanabuddhau caitrādipratyayānāṃ pakṣīkṛtānāṃ dharmatayā nirālambanatā na gṛhītā sādhanotthitayā dhiyeti,
GSP28mimsvtku:4541: 53}satī caitrādisvarūpaparyālocanayālambanaprāptiḥ kena vārayituṃ śakyā. sa mānaviṣayopanipātinor hi viruddhārthagocarayoḥ pratyayayor bādhyabādhakabhāvo bhavati,
GSP28mimsvtku:4542: yathedaṃ rajataṃ nedaṃ rajatam iti cānayoḥ. na ceha tathā. caitrādipratyayā hi svaviṣayaṃ sthāpayanti. na ca tannirālambanabuddhiḥ pratikṣipati,
GSP28mimsvtku:4543_0: arthābhāvāt. svāṃśagocarā hi sā. ato 'syāḥ svāṃśo viṣayaḥ. caitrādipratyayānāṃ ca
GSP28mimsvtku:4543_1: caitrādaya iti spaṣṭo viṣayabheda iti kiṃ kena bādhyata ity ucyate. tad etad āha
GSP28mimsvtku:4544: kiñca yat tat pūrvam uktaṃ kartṛtve karaṇatve vā pratyayatve śabdo 'pi pratyayaśabdavācya iti,
GSP28mimsvtku:4545: tad yadi tathaiva pratyayaśabdo 'py atra pratītikartṛkaraṇatvātmanā pratyayatvenopādīyate,
GSP28mimsvtku:4547: caitrādayaḥ pratyayaśabdasaṃvittyālambanā na bhavantīti. tatas tasyācetanatvena tatsaṃvittyālambanatvaṃ caitrādīnāṃ nāsti aṃśe siddhasādhanam evety āha -- yadīti || 67 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:4548: atha tu buddhyutpādanaśaktivirahastasyānālambanatvam ity ucyate pratyayaśabdo nirālambana iti,
GSP28mimsvtku:4549_0: kim uktaṃ bhavati. na kiñcidviṣayāṃ buddhim utpādayituṃ śakyata iti. tatas tenāśaktena
GSP28mimsvtku:4549_1: pakṣo na bodhita iti sādhyaṃ na sidhyatīty āha -- buddhyutpādaneti. sādhyāsiddhau
GSP28mimsvtku:4551_0: 54} pūrvābhyupagamaviruddho 'py ayaṃ pakṣa ity āha -- na ceti trayeṇa. na tāvadanabhidhāyakeṣu
GSP28mimsvtku:4551_1: padeṣu sādhanavākyaṃ prayogam arhati. na cābhidhānam arthasambandhādṛte padānāṃ sambhavati.
GSP28mimsvtku:4551_2: na ca sambandho bhedam antareṇa. na ca bhedaḥ śabdārthagatabhedaṃ bodhayantyā dhiyā vinā (?na)
GSP28mimsvtku:4552_0: sambhavati. tad atra sādhanaṃ prayuñjānena bhinnau śabdārthāv abhyupagantavyau. tathā
GSP28mimsvtku:4552_1: sati prāśnikāḥ sabhyā gṛhṇanti ca sāvayavaṃ sādhanavākyaṃ pṛthak ca pakṣahetudṛṣṭāntān
GSP28mimsvtku:4552_2: vādiprativādinau ceti. yāvad idaṃ nāvasthāpyate na tāvad vyutthita pratipādanāya
GSP28mimsvtku:4552_3: sādhanasya prayogo bhavati. etac ca sarvam abhyupetya nirālambanatve sādhyamāne bhavati
GSP28mimsvtku:4553: āptatamatvābhimatabuddhābhiprāyaviruddho 'py ayaṃ pakṣa ity āha -- dharmeti bhedontena. yāvad dhi dharmādharmau bhinnau paramārthau na sidhyataḥ śiṣyaś copadeśyaḥ ātmā copadeṣṭā,
GSP28mimsvtku:4554_0: tāvan na dharmādharmopadeśo ghaṭata iti. upadiṣṭāś ca caityavandanādayaḥ śiṣyebhyo
GSP28mimsvtku:4554_1: dharmatvena buddhaiḥ. ataś ceṣṭādarśanena sarvam anumataṃ buddhānām iti teṣām āśaya
GSP28mimsvtku:4555: 55}iti. api ca kvacit sūtraviśeṣe sphuṭam eva tair bāhyārtho 'bhimataḥ yadāśritya sautrāntikena bāhyārthasadbhāvo 'saṅgīkṛtaḥ,
GSP28mimsvtku:4556: atas tadīyāgamaviruddho 'py ayaṃ pakṣa ity āha -- sphuṭam iti || 72 -- 73 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:4557_1: api ca sarvajñānānām anālambanatve kṛtsnasādhanajñānamithyātvāt sarvasādhanābhāvo
GSP28mimsvtku:4557_2: vā yatheṣṭaṃ pakṣādinyūnatvaṃ vā śakyam āpādayitum ity āha -- kṛtsneti. yadi tu na
GSP28mimsvtku:4558: tataḥ pakṣādipratyayair eva hetor anaikāntikatvam ity āha -- teṣām iti || 74 -- 75 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:4559: yadi pakṣādigrāhivyatiriktā eva pratyayā nirālambanatvena pratijñāyante,
GSP28mimsvtku:4560_0: tatas tadvyatireka[709]grāhiṇaḥ pratyayasya pakṣādyaviṣayatvān mṛṣātvam āpadyata
GSP28mimsvtku:4560_1: ity āha -- tadanyasyeti. abhyupagame doṣam āha -- tanmithyeti. tadanyapratyayamithyātve
GSP28mimsvtku:4560_2: hi yat tena pakṣādipratyayavyatirekagrāhiṇā gṛhītaṃ tanmithyeti sarvamithyātvam āpadyata iti || 76 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:4564_0: kathaṃ na sidhyaty ata āha -- stambheti. vyatirekagrāhipratyayamithyātve hi na stambhādijñānebhyaḥ
GSP28mimsvtku:4564_1: sādhanajñānasya kaścid viśeṣaḥ. tadvad eva tu sādhanajñānam api mithyā bhaved iti.
GSP28mimsvtku:4567_0: punar api tadanyaviśeṣaṇe 'navasthā. yatraiva tu paraḥ kvacid avatiṣṭhate tanmithyātvāt
GSP28mimsvtku:4567_1: pūrvapūrvābhāvo darśayitavya ity āha -- yāvad iti. kiñcādyapakṣāt prabhṛti ya ete
GSP28mimsvtku:4568: teṣu sarveṣu viruddhāvyabhicāritvam anumānavirodho vety āha -- viruddheti || 77 -- 78 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:4569_0: katham etad ubhayam ity āha -- ittham iti. itthaṃ vakṣyamāṇaprakāreṇa. atra pratisādhanaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:4569_1: vaktavyam iti. tad eva pratisādhanaṃ darśayati -- bāhyeti. bāhyārthālambanā buddhir
GSP28mimsvtku:4569_2: iti dhīr dharmiṇī. samyag iti sādhyo dharmaḥ,
GSP28mimsvtku:4571: svapnajñānādibādhabuddhivat. idaṃ ca prasiddhāvayavatvena nirālambanānumānād balavad iti tasyānumānabādho bhavati. yadi tulyabalatvam eva manyate,
GSP28mimsvtku:4572: tato viruddhāvyabhicāritvam iti viveko darśayitavyaḥ. (svārthikas tv iti?)
GSP28mimsvtku:4573: yadi tu svapnādibādhabuddhir api mithyeti brūyāt,
GSP28mimsvtku:4574: tatas teṣām abādhitatvād asatyatve dṛṣṭāntābhāva ity āha -- sāpīti || 79 -- 80 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:4575: kiñca bhinnaṃ jñānamātraṃ kṣaṇikam iti yā buddhayaḥ tāḥ samyaṅ mithyā vā,
GSP28mimsvtku:4576: satyatve tāvadanaikāntikatvam ity āha -- vijñāneti. tanmithyātvābhyupagame{2,
GSP28mimsvtku:4578_0: evaṃ cāsati jñāne śūnyatāpramāṇārtha iti ko baddhaḥ ko vā mukto bhavet. tad etad
GSP28mimsvtku:4578_1: āha -- tatheti. mokṣayanto 'pi pravrajyādir evaṃ sati viphalas tapasvinām ity āha
GSP28mimsvtku:4579: yadi tūcyate -- savikalpakena jñānamātrapakṣo vyavasthāpyate sarvavikalpānāṃ mithyātvād,
GSP28mimsvtku:4580_0: nirvikalpakena tvātmānaṃ labhata iti. tad ayuktam. na hi jñānamātraṃ viśvaṃ kṣaṇikā
GSP28mimsvtku:4580_1: bhāvā ity ādi nirvikalpakena kasyacit pratibhāti. anumānena ty evañjātīyakā arthāḥ
GSP28mimsvtku:4580_2: sādhyante. tac ca savikalpalatvān mithyaiveti jñānāstitvādipakṣo durlabhaḥ. ato yuktaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:4580_3: mokṣayatnasya vaiphalyam ity āha -- vikalpeti sārthena. atra ca nirvikalpakasatyatve
GSP28mimsvtku:4580_4: stambhādidhiyām api tathāvidhānāṃ satyatvāpatter na bāhyārthābhāvaḥ sidhyatīti vaktavyam.
GSP28mimsvtku:4581_0: api ca yogibhyo 'rvācām asmadādīnāṃ sarvam eva jñānaṃ kalpanāspadam iti mithyājñānam
GSP28mimsvtku:4581_1: eva. na hi pradhānaṃ jagatkāraṇaṃ pañcaviṃśatitattvam ityādijñānebhyo jñānamātraṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:4581_2: jagat kṣaṇikāḥ sarve bhāvā ityādipratyayānāṃ kaścidviśeṣo dṛśyate.{2,
GSP28mimsvtku:4582: 58}sarvasya savikalpakatvena mithyābhyupagamāt. ato gṛhyamāṇaviśeṣeṣu tīrthakarapravādeṣu yo 'yaṃ sāṅkhyādisiddhāntaparivarjanena bauddhasiddhānta ekasmin pakṣapātaḥ,
GSP28mimsvtku:4583_0: tatra na kaściddhetur upalabhyate. na ca kalpanāspadatvā[710]viśeṣe 'pi arthasadasadbhāvakṛtam
GSP28mimsvtku:4583_1: indriyasānnidhyaviprakṛṣṭakṛtaṃ vā samyaṅmithyātvaṃ sambhavati. sarvakalpanānām asadarthatvāt.
GSP28mimsvtku:4583_2: sarvabāhyāpalāpe cāsya vibhāgasya durlabhatvāt. tad etad āha -- sarvaṃ ceti dvayena || 86 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:4587_0: api ca buddhīnāṃ mithyātvaṃ mṛgatṛṣṇādijñāneṣu bādhakena vyāptam upalabdham. na ca
GSP28mimsvtku:4587_1: jāgradbuddhayo bādhyante. ato vyāpakanivṛttyā vyāpyanivṛttir ity abhiprāyeṇāha --

GSP28mimsvtku:4588_1: -- bādhād iti. api ca samyaṅ mithyeti ca pratiyogisāpekṣam. kiñcid dhi samyagapekṣyetaranmithyā bhavati,
GSP28mimsvtku:4589_0: mithyā ca kiñcid apekṣya paraṃ satyam. tava tu sarvamithyātvābhyupagame kiṃkṛtaḥ
GSP28mimsvtku:4589_1: samyaṅmithyātvavibhāgaḥ. asmākaṃ tu jāgrajjñānam eva satyaṃ pratiyogy apekṣya svapnādijñānaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:4591: na kevalaṃ svapnādijñānānāṃ pratiyogyabhāvān mithyātvaṃ na sidhyati,
GSP28mimsvtku:4592: jāgrajjñānānām api śobhanābhidhānasatyapratiyogyabhāvān mithyātvaṃ na sidhyatīty āha -- na ceti || 89 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:4594_0: 59} jāgrajjñānapratiyogyapekṣayā svamate svapnādidhiyāṃ mithyātvam uktam. tatraivopapattim
GSP28mimsvtku:4594_1: āha -- svapneti. svapnādipratyayavidharmāṇo hi jāgratpratyayāḥ. sarvalokaprasiddhā
GSP28mimsvtku:4594_2: hi te. svapnas tu kasyacid eva nidrākrāntāntaḥkaraṇasya bhavati. ato yathā tadbādhake
GSP28mimsvtku:4594_3: pratyaye sārvalaukike svapnādipratiyogitvam evam anyeṣām api jāgratstambhādijñānānāṃ tatpratiyogitvaṃ,
GSP28mimsvtku:4596: atra codayati -- yoginām iti. satyaṃ pratiyogisāpekṣaṃ mithyātvaṃ,
GSP28mimsvtku:4597_1: satyā hi sā vigalitanikhilakalmaṣasya sphuṭāvikalpaprakāśā jāyate. ato yuktaṃ tadapekṣayā
GSP28mimsvtku:4598_0: nanu kasyacid eva bhāvanāprakarṣakāṣṭhāprāptasya yogino jāgradbuddhiparipanthinī
GSP28mimsvtku:4598_1: buddhir āvirbhavati. tās tu sarvalokaprasiddhā evety uktam. ataḥ katham ekadeśabhuvā
GSP28mimsvtku:4599: ata āha -- prāptānām iti. ayam abhiprāyaḥ -- tāvad eva hi saṃsāriṇo na bādhaṃ manyante,
GSP28mimsvtku:4600_0: yāvan na buddhabhūmim adhirohanti. prāptatadbhūmayas tu sarva eva prāṇabhṛto bādhaṃ

GSP28mimsvtku:4784: katham asau hetuḥ vaidharmyadṛṣṭāntas tv asau nityatvasya. na hi tato 'nyaḥ sādhyavipakṣabhāga{2,
GSP28mimsvtku:4786: tadvipakṣo 'nityatā. tad yuktaṃ sarvaṃ vaidharmyadṛṣṭānta eveti. tad atredam ākūtaṃ - yannityaṃ na bhavati tat sarvaṃ,
GSP28mimsvtku:4787: nāyaṃ sarvamato 'sarvatvān nityaḥ śabda iti. asarvatvaṃ hetuḥ,
GSP28mimsvtku:4788_0: ataḥ sarvasyānityatvam ahetur iti na hetusādhyayor virodha iti. punaś coktaṃ - vaidharmyavacanam
GSP28mimsvtku:4788_1: api nedaṃ samañjasamabhāvaniyamasya viparītatvāt hetvabhāve hy atra sarvatve sādhyābhāvasyānityatvasya
GSP28mimsvtku:4788_2: pradarśanaṃ kṛtam. sādhyābhāve tu vaidharmyadṛṣṭānte hetvabhāvo darśayitavyaḥ. vyāptiviparyayasyānumāne
GSP28mimsvtku:4788_3: vakṣyamāṇatvāt. tad ihānityatvasya sarvatvād iti vaktavye sarvasyānityatvād iti vacanaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:4789: hetāv asmin vivakṣite 'kṣapādena hetusādhyayor virodho 'bhihitaḥ. yattvapakṣadharmatvān na hetur iti,
GSP28mimsvtku:4790: tad dūṣaṇāntaraṃ bhaviṣyati. asarvatvaṃ vā kathaṃ hetuḥ,
GSP28mimsvtku:4791_0: tad apīha sarvāntargater asiddham eva. ataḥ kṛtvācintāmātreṇedaṃ naiyāyikair uktaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:4791_1: hetāv asmin vivakṣite hetupratijñayor virodha iti. mā bhūd vā tadudāharaṇam. iha
GSP28mimsvtku:4792: yam etam adṛṣṭvā parair bauddhair uktaṃ na pratijñāhetur virodho dūṣaṇam iti. kilaśabdo 'rucau. atrodāharaṇaṃ vispaṣṭatvād virodhasyeti || 154 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:4793_0: atra codayati -- nanv iti. saṃsārāvasthāyām anumānānumeyavyavahāraḥ. atra ca hetvādayo
GSP28mimsvtku:4793_1: lokaprasiddhā eva. loka iti laukikasaṃvṛtisatyam apadiśati. ataḥ saṃvṛtisatyasiddhena
GSP28mimsvtku:4794: paramārthāvasthāyāṃ tu sarvābhāvam ācakṣmaha ity avasthābhedād adoṣa iti ||
GSP28mimsvtku:4795: pariharati -- yo 'dhuneti. yadi hi tadbādhakabalena nāstīty ucyate,
GSP28mimsvtku:4796: prāg api nāsīd eva. bādhakena tatprāg api pratikṣiptaṃ rajatam iva śuktāv avagatikṣaṇād ārabhya. ataḥ prāg apy asataḥ kathaṃ sādhanatvam iti || 156 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:4798: 79} prāk sādhanatvābhyupagame vā paramārthāstitvam āpadyata ity āha -- sādhaneti. kāraṇam āha -- siddhir iti || 159 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:4800: ata āha -- na dṛṣṭeti. nātyantam asataḥ sādhanatvaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ śaśaviṣāṇavad ity anumānam antarṇītaṃ,
GSP28mimsvtku:4801: kvacid dṛṣṭasyāpi rūpasyānyatropacaritasya paramārthopāyatā nāsti. kim utātyantāsato hetvāder ity āha -- bāṣpādineti || 158 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:4803: nanu varṇātmanā asatyānām api rekhādīnāṃ paramārthavarṇopāyatā dṛṣṭā,
GSP28mimsvtku:4804: ato naikāntiko 'satyatvaṃ hetur ata āha -- ye 'pīti. vipakṣavṛttir hi hetur anaikāntiko bhavati. na ca paramārthopāyeṣu rekhādiṣv asatyatvam asti,
GSP28mimsvtku:4805: svarūpasatyatvāt. tena ca rūpeṇa varṇabodhopāyatvāt. taddarśino hi smṛtasaṅketasya varṇā buddhau bhavantīti || 160 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:4806: nanu bhavantu svarūpasantaḥ. varṇātmanā tāvadasatyā eva,
GSP28mimsvtku:4807: ata āha -- varṇeti. sarve hi bhāvāḥ svarūpeṇa santaḥ pararūpeṇāsantaḥ. kenacid viśeṣeṇa rekhodāharaṇam iti || 161 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:4809_0: 80} na caiṣa prakāro 'tyantāsatāṃ hetvādīnāṃ sambhavatīty āha -- svarūpa iti. asatyam
GSP28mimsvtku:4809_1: api kenacid rūpeṇa sad eva rūpāntareṇa bhavati. na hi nissvabhāvam iti nāpy asatyatety uktam iti || 162 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:4810: etad eva sphuṭayati -- hetvādīnām iti. atra ca bāṣpādīnām ivāgnyādāv upāyatvaṃ hetvādīnāṃ,
GSP28mimsvtku:4811: na paramārthena tu lekhyavad ity āha -- teneti. hetutvābhāvapratipādanaparam idam iti || 163 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:4812: atra codayati -- upāyānām iti. kim idaṃ nissvabhāvatvam upāyānām āpadyate. saṃvṛtyātmakā hi te. tena ca rūpeṇa santa eveti || 164 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:4813: pariharati -- saṃvṛtyeti. sāṃvṛtaṃ hi rūpaṃ vāṅmātranirmitaṃ, na paramārthopāyo bhavatīti || 165 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:4815: paramārthāl lokasya saṃvṛtisatyasya bhede na hetur asti,
GSP28mimsvtku:4816: tadbhedagrāhiṇo 'pi jñānasya mithyātvād ity āha -- paramārtheti. api ca yadi paramārtho 'pi laukikopāyagamyaḥ,
GSP28mimsvtku:4818_0: laukikopāyagamyatvād bāṣpādivāgnir avagamyamāna ity āha -- laukiketi. pūrvaṃ ca satyabhedo
GSP28mimsvtku:4818_1: nirākṛtaḥ. idānīṃ sāṃvṛtasya paramārthopāyateti vivekaḥ. nanv asata eva śrutyādiprapañcāt
GSP28mimsvtku:4818_2: prapañcavilayātmano brahmaṇo nirūpaṇaṃ vedāntavidbhir iṣyate. yathāhuḥ --
GSP28mimsvtku:4821: vidyāṃ cāvidyāṃ ca yas tadvedobhayaṃ saha |
GSP28mimsvtku:4823: iti. kim uktam. vidyārūpaṃ ca brahma,
GSP28mimsvtku:4824_0: avidyārūpaṃ ca śrutyādi. tadubhayam api yaḥ saha veda so 'vidyopalakṣitaṃ mṛtyuṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:4824_1: tīrtvā vidyārūpeṇopalakṣitaṃ brahmānandaṃ pratipadyata iti. tad evam avidyāta eva
GSP28mimsvtku:4824_2: vidyāprāptir iṣyate iti. kim aparāddham evaṃ bruvāṇair asmābhiḥ. naiṣa naḥ siddhāntaḥ
GSP28mimsvtku:4824_3: yad asann eva śrutyādiprapañco brahmaṇi pramāṇam iti. teṣām api pratyakṣādipramāṇasiddhānām
GSP28mimsvtku:4824_4: aśakyāpahnavatvāt. yathā hi so 'yam iti pratyakṣasiddhaḥ pratyagātmā,
GSP28mimsvtku:4825: evaṃ teṣv iti tadvad eva samyañco bhavitum arhanti. tasya ca pūrvottarakarmanirodhānutpādābhyāṃ vigalitabhogabhogāyatanasya kaivalyaṃ mokṣam ācakṣmahe,
GSP28mimsvtku:4826_0: na prapañcavilayam. ekam evādvitīyam ityādivedāntās tv arthavādāntaravad viṣayavairāgyapratipādanaparatayā
GSP28mimsvtku:4826_1: kathañcid gamayitavyāḥ. sa eṣa neti netītikaraṇena spaṣṭam eva bahirviṣayasadbhāvam
GSP28mimsvtku:4826_2: upadarśayati. eṣa ity aparokṣanirdiṣṭasya brahmaṇo viṣayavivekamātraṃ kathayati na
GSP28mimsvtku:4826_3: tadabhāvam. śrutyādiṣu cāvidyāvādo brahmaṇaḥ praśaṃsārthaḥ. apaśavo 'nye gośvebhyaḥ
GSP28mimsvtku:4826_4: itivat paśvantareṣv apaśuvādaḥ. ato na kvacidaparamārthasya paramārthopāyatā. astu
GSP28mimsvtku:4826_5: vā nityanirdoṣavedāntasiddham aprapañcaṃ brahma. na tu kṣaṇikasaṃvedanapravāhātmakaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:4826_6: dvaitaṃ kutaścit pramāṇād avagacchāma ity alambanenāpi || 166 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:4827: pratyavasthānāntaram idānīṃ bauddhasyopanyasyati -- nanv iti. evaṃ hi manyante -- yady api bāhyo hetvādir artho nāsti,
GSP28mimsvtku:4828_1: hi hetvādivikalpavibhāgā bhavanti hetur ayaṃ dṛṣṭānto 'yam ityādayaḥ. vikalpa iti
GSP28mimsvtku:4828_2: savikalpikāṃ buddhim ācakṣmahe. ato vāsanābhedād buddhibhedaḥ,
GSP28mimsvtku:4829: tadbhedād dhetvādibheda ity uktaṃ bhavati. avaśyābhyupagama(?niyama/nīya)
GSP28mimsvtku:4830: ś cāyaṃ bhavadbhir api. buddhinibandhano dharmyādibhedaḥ. na hy anityaḥ śabdaḥ kṛtakatvād iti{2,
GSP28mimsvtku:4831_0: 82}parasparaṃ dharmiṇo vā bhinnayor hetusādhyayor avagatir asti. ato jñānabhedanibandhana
GSP28mimsvtku:4831_1: evātra bhinnatvavyavahāraḥ. sarvatraiva ca jñānam eva bhedanibandhanam. sudūram api
GSP28mimsvtku:4831_2: gatvā yuktibhir anusaṃhito bhedo jñāna eva paryavasyati. ato 'stu tannibandhana eva
GSP28mimsvtku:4831_3: sarvatra bhedaḥ. deśādibhedād api hi bhedaṃ bruvāṇas tadbhedaṃ paryanuyukto jñānabhedam
GSP28mimsvtku:4831_4: evālambate. tāvatāpi vyavahārasiddhau kiṃ prakārāntareṇa bhedo 'nusriyata iti. atrāpy
GSP28mimsvtku:4831_5: agnidhūmādau kṛtakānityatvavilakṣaṇaḥ sphuṭo bhedāvagraho bhavati. tatrāpi na jātibhedo
GSP28mimsvtku:4831_6: nibandhanam iti vācyam. so 'pi cāgnidhūmaśabdanirmita eva. na hi saṃvṛtikalpanād
GSP28mimsvtku:4831_7: anyena prakāreṇa jātibhedam upalabhāmahe. ataḥ śabdabhede 'rthavikalpavilāsitā evāgnitvādaya
GSP28mimsvtku:4831_8: iti. idaṃ ca bāhyanirākaraṇaparatayānāsthayoktam. na śabdabhedo 'pi vijñānabhedād
GSP28mimsvtku:4831_9: vinā sambhavati. so 'pi jñānamātraprabhāvita evābhyupetya bāhyahetvādivikalpavibhāgārtham ukta iti || 167 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:4832_0: ayam evāsmadīyatantrakārāṇāṃ siddhānta ity āha -- nyāyavidbhir iti. nyāyavidbhir
GSP28mimsvtku:4832_1: hi diṅnāgācāryair idam uktaṃ sarva evāyam anumānānumeyavyavahāro buddhyārūḍhena dharmadharminyāyena
GSP28mimsvtku:4833_0: etad api dūṣayati -- astīti. nāsataḥ śaśaviṣāṇādeḥ śabdanibandhanaḥ tajjanitabuddhinibandhano
GSP28mimsvtku:4833_1: vā bhedo dṛṣṭa iti duruktam idam apareṣāṃ buddhyārūḍhenānumānānumeyavyavahāra iti || 169 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:4835: tayor eva tu katham akasmād udbhavaḥ. na hy akāraṇikā kāryotpattiḥ sambhavati. na ca śūnye jagati{2,
GSP28mimsvtku:4836: 83}tayoḥ kāraṇam utprekṣitum api śakyata ity āha -- nirvastuka iti. yaś cāyaṃ śabdabhedo hetvādibhedahetutayopavarṇitaḥ,
GSP28mimsvtku:4837: so 'pi tadabhāvād anupapanna ity āha -- śabdeti || 170 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:4838: kiñ ca yady avidyamāna eva buddhimātrakalpitaḥ sādhyādibhedo 'numānavyavahārāya kalpyate,
GSP28mimsvtku:4839: tato dūṣaṇavyavahāro 'pi tadvad eva syāt. utpadyate khalv asmin sādhane hetvādinyūnatoktimātrād eva dūṣaṇabuddhir ity āha -- yadi veti dvayena || 172 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:4840: śakyate ca vaditum evam api sarva evāyaṃ dūṣyadūṣaṇavyavahāro buddhyārūḍhena dūṣyadūṣaṇanyāyena,
GSP28mimsvtku:4841: na bahiḥ sadasattvam apekṣata ity āha -- yaś ceti || 173 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:4842: nanv evam apy āvayor aviśeṣa eva,
GSP28mimsvtku:4843_0: yathā hi no dūṣaṇajñānam utpannam evaṃ bhavato 'pi sādhanajñānam. ataḥ kathaṃ vijayase
GSP28mimsvtku:4843_1: ata āha -- buddhīti. ayam āvayor viśeṣaḥ buddhimātravyavahāriṇo bhavato maduktadūṣaṇaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:4843_2: siddham iti na te pakṣaḥ sidhyati. tvaduktaṃ tu sādhanam asmākam asiddham iti na
GSP28mimsvtku:4844: kathaṃ sādhanam asiddham ata āha -- bāhyeti. bāhyārthavyavahāriṇo hi vayaṃ,
GSP28mimsvtku:4845: na tvam iva jñānaikaśaraṇāḥ. tatra katham asati bāhye budhyāmaha iti || 175 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:4847: 84} punar api paraś codayati -- nanv iti. yathā hi me sādhanam asiddham,
GSP28mimsvtku:4848: evaṃ dūṣaṇam apīti na duṣṭaṃ sādhanam iti || 176 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:4849: mīmāṃsakas tu pāśupato 'yam evaṃvādī yad vihāya sādhanam abhāvād dūṣaṇasyāpy aduṣṭatvam ātiṣṭhata iti sāpahāsam āha -- nedānīm iti || 177 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:4851: so 'pi tadbhedanimittābhāvād anupapanna ity āha -- na ceti. nanu jñānabhedād eva vāsanābhedo bhaviṣyati,
GSP28mimsvtku:4854: vāsanānibandhane tu tadbhede 'nyonyāśrayatvam ity āśaṅkayā sahāha -- jñāneti. nanu svabhāvabhinnam eva jñānaṃ vāsanābhedanibandhanaṃ bhaviṣyati,
GSP28mimsvtku:4855_0: katham anyonyāśrayatvam ata āha -- svacchasyeti. svacchasya hi jñānātmanaḥ svayam
GSP28mimsvtku:4857_0: nanv anāditvād eva bījāgkuravad itaretarāśrayaparihāro bhaviṣyaty ata āha -- pramāṇam
GSP28mimsvtku:4857_1: iti. prasiddhātmanor hi bījāṅkurayor anāditvād bhavati doṣaparihāraḥ. vāsanā tv asti
GSP28mimsvtku:4857_2: bhinnā ceti na kiñcit pramāṇaṃ kramate. yo hi{2,
GSP28mimsvtku:4859_0: sa kathaṃ vāsanām anujānāti. tadanujñāne vā kim aparāddhaṃ bhāvāntarair iti. api
GSP28mimsvtku:4859_1: ca pūrvānubhavaprabhāvitaṃ smaraṇahetusaṃskāram eva vāsanām ācakṣmahe. tad asau saty
GSP28mimsvtku:4859_2: api grāhakaṃ jñānam eva vividham upakalpayati. yat tu vicitrā bahirbhāvā bhāsante
GSP28mimsvtku:4859_3: tat kasya hetor iti na jñāyata ity āha -- kuryād iti || 180 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:4860_0: na grāhyabhede vāsanā kāraṇam ity atropapattim āha -- saṃvittyeti. smṛtihetur hi
GSP28mimsvtku:4860_1: vāsanā. na cānubhūtāt smṛtir adhikaṃ mātrayāpi gocarayati. na ca bahiratyantāsanto
GSP28mimsvtku:4860_2: bhāvāḥ kvacid api gṛhītapūrvā iti na tān vāsanā smārayituṃ prabhavatīti. kiñ ca,
GSP28mimsvtku:4861: ataś ca vāsanā nopapadyate yat kāraṇaṃ kṣaṇikāni jñānāni niranvayavināśīni parasparam asahitāni cety āha -- kṣaṇikeṣv iti. yathā tāvat kṣaṇikānāṃ niranvayavināśināṃ ca na vāsanā,
GSP28mimsvtku:4863_0: asāhityān na vāsanety uktārtham eva prapañcayati -- pūrveti. sāhityābhyupagame 'pi
GSP28mimsvtku:4863_1: samavāyādyanyatamalakṣaṇasambandhābhāvād vāsanā nopapadyate. na hy asambandhaḥ kālāgarudhūmo
GSP28mimsvtku:4865_0: atra kāraṇam āha -- kṣaṇikatvād iti. vyāpāranibandhano hi vāsyavāsakabhāvaḥ kārakaviśeṣatvāt
GSP28mimsvtku:4865_1: tasya. na ca kṣaṇikaṃ pūrvam uttaraṃ vā tayor eva vyāpriyata iti sambhavati. nanu janmaiva buddher{2,
GSP28mimsvtku:4869: va buddhir arthaṃ paricchindantī. na hy asau kṣaṇam apy udāste. na cārthaparicchedād anyatra vyāpriyata iti yuktam. janmanaiva vyāpāreṇa kārakatvaṃ,
GSP28mimsvtku:4870_0: na jñānāntaraṃ vāsayantī jāyamānā buddhir dṛśyata iti kathaṃ vāsanāyāṃ janmanā kāraṇatvam.
GSP28mimsvtku:4870_1: na ca janmāpi kiñcid bauddhā manyante yannibandhanaḥ kāraṇabhāvo bhavet. asmākaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:4870_2: tu samavāyikāraṇadaśāviśeṣaḥ ko 'pi kāryasya janmeti matam. sa ca jāyamānānnātyantabhinna
GSP28mimsvtku:4871_0: bhāva iti. niranvayavināśitvān na vāsanety uktam. tatra kāraṇam āha -- vinaśyad iti.
GSP28mimsvtku:4871_1: yad dhi svalakṣaṇa eva niruddhaṃ na kenacidrūpeṇānveti na tat tadīyaṃ vā rūpaṃ vāsyata
GSP28mimsvtku:4871_2: iti sambhavati. tathā vāsakam api yanniranvayavinaṣṭaṃ tat kenātmanā paraṃ vāsayati.
GSP28mimsvtku:4871_3: avasthitā eva hi bhāvā gṛhādayo 'vasthitair evāgarudhūmādibhir vāsyanta iti dṛṣṭam.
GSP28mimsvtku:4872_0: atra codayati -- avasthita iti. avasthāntaropajananāpāyayos tadabhinnasyāvasthāvato
GSP28mimsvtku:4872_1: nāśotpādābhyām avasthitatvānupapattiḥ. avasthitatve vā pūrvāvasthāyām ivottaratrāpi
GSP28mimsvtku:4872_2: avāsanāprasaṅga iti. asmanmate tu bhaṅguram uttaraṃ pūrvaṃ ca jñānaṃ,
GSP28mimsvtku:4873_0: nāvasthitaḥ kaścid eko jñātāpracyutaprācyarūpaḥ. tad iha bhaṅgurapakṣe pūrvasādṛśyāt
GSP28mimsvtku:4873_1: tato bhinnasyottarasya yuktaiva vāsanā. eṣaiva tu vāsanā yat pūrvasārūpyam uttarasya.
GSP28mimsvtku:4873_2: yathā lākṣārasopasikte bījapūrakusume phalaṃ tadrūpaṃ jāyamānaṃ tattvānvitam ity
GSP28mimsvtku:4873_3: ucyate. yat tu vyāpāravirahād akārakatvam uktaṃ,
GSP28mimsvtku:4875: api tarhi pūrvabhāvāt. bhāvātirekiṇo vyāpārasyānupapatteḥ. yac cedaṃ pūrvasyottarakāraṇatvam idam eva vāsakatvaṃ pūrveṇottaraṃ{2,
GSP28mimsvtku:4876: 87}vāsyata iti. ko 'rthaḥ. svarūpaṃ janyata iti. ato bhaṅguravādinām eva vāsanopapattimatī na sthiravādinām ity āha -- bhaṅgura iti || 186 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:4877_0: tad iha svamatasādhanam upekṣyaiva tāvat paramatadūṣaṇam abhidhīyate. dūṣite hi tasmin
GSP28mimsvtku:4877_1: sukhena siddhānto 'bhidhīyate. tatra yat tāvaduktaṃ sadrūpajñānajanakatvam eva vāsaneti.

GSP28mimsvtku:5183_3: iti jñātvā śāmyatu bhavān.[726a]vyavahārasaṃvādāpekṣayā hi pramāṇaṃ tadvisaṃvādād

GSP28mimsvtku:5184_0: siddhāntam idānīm ārabhate -- neti. asyārthaḥ -- ekaṃ hi jñānaṃ grāhyagrāhakam iti
GSP28mimsvtku:5184_1: vaḥ siddhāntaḥ. na caikasyobhayātmakatve kaścid dṛṣṭānta iti. tat punar idaṃ pūrvāparayor
