GSP28mimsvtku:5186_0: iti. bauddhagandhimīmāṃsakair apy uktaṃ - saṃvittayaiva hi saṃvit saṃvedyate na tu
GSP28mimsvtku:5186_1: saṃvedyatayā nāsyāḥ karmabhāvo vidyate iti. dṛṣṭāntābhāvavacanam api cāsamartham.
GSP28mimsvtku:5187_0: yena dṛṣṭāntābhāvavacanenopālabhyate. nirālambanānumānasya pratyakṣabādha ukte samprati
GSP28mimsvtku:5187_1: pratyakṣaśaktiparīkṣayaiva pratyavasthitaṃ na jñānaṃ bahirarthe pravartituṃ śaktaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:5187_3: -- evaṃ hi manyate. avaśyam ayaṃ grāhyagrāhakabhāvaḥ saṃvido bauddhair abhyupagantavyaḥ,
GSP28mimsvtku:5188_0: katham anyathā saiva sidhyati. na hy agrahaṇakarmaṇaḥ kasyacit siddhir asti. nanu
GSP28mimsvtku:5188_1: svaprakāśaḥ prakāśaḥ kim asya prakāśāntareṇa. svaprakāśa iti ko 'rthaḥ. svayam eva
GSP28mimsvtku:5188_2: prakāśate na tu prakāśāntaram apekṣata iti. kiṃ punar idaṃ prakāśata iti prakāśād arthāntaravacanaṃ,
GSP28mimsvtku:5190_0: asti tarhi saṃvido 'py aparaḥ prakāśaḥ. anyathā prakāśata ity anadhikārtham avacanīyam
GSP28mimsvtku:5190_1: eva. svarūpaṃ hi saṃvitpadenaivopāttam. ataḥ pratītikarmataiva saṃvidaḥ prakāśatepadārtho
GSP28mimsvtku:5190_2: ghaṭaḥ prakāśata itivat. syād etat. kartṛpratinirdeśo 'yaṃ nātaḥ karmabhāvo 'vasīyata
GSP28mimsvtku:5190_3: iti. naivam. evam api prakāśatepadārthasya kartṛbhāvo vācyaḥ. nāsāv asati prakāśabhede sidhyati,
GSP28mimsvtku:5191_0: advitīyasya bhettum aśakyatvāt. ato nāprāptasya siddhir asti. na cāpi karmaṇaḥ prāptir
GSP28mimsvtku:5191_1: astīti satyāḥ saṃvido 'vaśyaṃ prāpyakarmatā bhāvāntaravad vaktavyā nānyā gatir asti. nanv arthaḥ karma,
GSP28mimsvtku:5194_0: tat kathaṃ karmety ucyate. na. phalasyāpy apratītikarmaṇaḥ siddhyasambhavāt. anyathā
GSP28mimsvtku:5194_1: mātṛmeyayor api svaprakāśāpātāt kiṃ tatsiddhyarthaṃ saṃvidabhyupagamena. na prayojanataḥ
GSP28mimsvtku:5195_0: api tu pratītitaḥ. pratīmo hi vayaṃ mātṛmeyagocarāṃ phalabhūtāṃ saṃvidam. na tato
GSP28mimsvtku:5195_1: 'pi bhinnām aparām iti tāvaty eva vyavatiṣṭhāmahe. maivam. nirākṛtam idaṃ nānākārā

GSP28mimsvtku:5199_0: ca - īdṛśaṃ vā prakāśatvaṃ tasyeti. ato 'vaśyābhyupagantavyaḥ saṃvitsiddhaye prakāśabhedaḥ.
GSP28mimsvtku:5199_1: kim idānīm asiddhaiva saṃvit saṃvedyaṃ sādhayati saṃvidantarasiddhā vā. na tāvat
GSP28mimsvtku:5199_2: pūrvaḥ kalpaḥ. aprasiddhā hy asatī na saṃvid vyavahārāya ghaṭata ity uktam. saṃvidantarādhīnāyāṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:5199_3: tu siddhāv avyavasthāpāta ity uktam. satyam. na saṃvidantarādhīnasiddhiḥ saṃvit saṃvedyaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:5199_4: sādhayati. svarūpasaty eva tu. katham adhīviṣayā satīti ced,
GSP28mimsvtku:5200_0: na dhīviṣayabhāvaḥ sattā. kin tu sāmānyam utpattyuttarakālabhāvi tadvatām. ato mṛtsalilapracchannabījādivadaviditasvarūpasāmarthyaiva
GSP28mimsvtku:5200_1: saṃvid viṣayaṃ vyavasthāpayati. sa ca vyavasthitaḥ satyāṃ jijñāsāyāṃ saṃvidaṃ saṃvidantarādhānena
GSP28mimsvtku:5200_2: sādhayati. nanv iyaṃ viṣayasāmarthyena saṃvitsiddhiḥ pratyuktā vastvantaraṃ prakalpyaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:5200_3: syāt ity atra yathā na pratyucyate tathānantaram eva vakṣyāmaḥ
GSP28mimsvtku:5202: iti. ata eva sahopalambhaniyamo 'pi parair ukto 'smān pratyasiddha eva. viṣayavittikāle saṃvido 'nupalambhāt. viṣayamātram eva hi idaṃ nīlam iti naś cakāsti,
GSP28mimsvtku:5203: nāhaṃ nīlam iti. saṃvitprakāśe ca tathā prakāśānupapattiḥ. na hi svagocarā saṃvit paranirūpaṇātmikā bhavati,
GSP28mimsvtku:5204_0: svaparavedyayor idam ahaṅkārayor aviśeṣāpatteḥ. ayaṃ svātmānam aham iti pratinirdiśati
GSP28mimsvtku:5204_1: param idam iti. na tv abhedenedaṅkāram ahaṅkāraṃ cobhayam ekatra prayuṅkte. ato nāstīdaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:5204_2: nīlam ity atra saṃvidupalambha ity asiddho hetuḥ. svaprakāśasaṃvidvādinām eva tv
GSP28mimsvtku:5205_0: syād etat. ajñāto jñāpakahetuḥ kathaṃ jñāpayatīti. nāyaṃ doṣaḥ. ajñātasyāpi cakṣuṣo
GSP28mimsvtku:5205_1: jñānajananopalabdheḥ. nanu cakṣur aṅkurasyeva bījaṃ jñānasya kārakam eveti yuktam
GSP28mimsvtku:5205_2: ajñātasyāpi janakatvam. maivam. jñānahetor eva jñāpakatvasamākhyānāt. api ca na jñānaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:5205_3: jñāpakahetuḥ jñānatvāt. jñānasya hi janakā dhūmādayo jñāpakāḥ na jñānam eveti katham
GSP28mimsvtku:5205_4: ajñāpakasya jñāpakadharmā āpādyante. svarūpasatyaiva saṃvidā viṣayaḥ sādhyate. sā
GSP28mimsvtku:5205_5: tu paścājjñānāntareṇa sādhyata iti. asati tu grāhyatve saṃvid eva na siddhyed ity
GSP28mimsvtku:5205_6: āpādya grāhyagrāhakatvam ekatve dūṣaṇam ucyate naikatrādvitīye tat sidhyatīti. yad
GSP28mimsvtku:5205_7: api ca saṃvedanam asatyabhede nīlasaṃvedanayor anupapannam iti. tad apy anenaiva nirākṛtam.{2,
GSP28mimsvtku:5208: svaprakāśatvaniṣedhāc ca. ekaṃ hi tattvam avibhāgaṃ nātmani vartitum arhati. svātmani kriyāvirodhāt,
GSP28mimsvtku:5209_0: na hy aṅgulyagram ātmanātmānaṃ spṛśati sūcyagraṃ vā vidhyati. karmakartāro hi taddharmabhedāśrayaṇenaivobhayathā
GSP28mimsvtku:5209_1: vivakṣyante kedārādayo lavanādau na tv ekāntam ekātmānaḥ. ātmano 'pi grāhyagrāhakabhāvam
GSP28mimsvtku:5209_2: anantaram eva samādhāsyatīti siddhaṃ naikasya grāhyagrāhakabhāva iti. yat tu bhede
GSP28mimsvtku:5209_3: grāhyalakṣaṇāyoga iti. tad yady utpattisārūpyābhiprāyeṇa tadanumanyāmaha eva uktadoṣatvād
GSP28mimsvtku:5209_4: evaṃvidhasya grāhyatvasya. yat tu jñānotpattau sañce(?dya /tya)
GSP28mimsvtku:5211: katham anātmabhūtam asambaddhaṃ sañcetyate. evaṃ hy ekam eva jñānaṃ viśvaṃ gocarayed,
GSP28mimsvtku:5212: asambandhāviśeṣāt. asti vā aikātmye nīlasaṃvedanayoḥ sambandhaḥ. nanv asau bhedādhiṣṭhānaḥ katham ekatrāvibhāga āspadaṃ labhate. syād etat. aikātmye 'pi kiṃ sambandhena,
GSP28mimsvtku:5213_0: sa hy ekātmā svaprakāśa eveti. maivam. ukto hi svātmani vṛttivirodhaḥ. tasmād bhinnam
GSP28mimsvtku:5213_1: eva saṃvedanān nīlaṃ grāhyalakṣaṇam upanipatatīti tadgrahe bhedam ātiṣṭhāmahe. abheda
GSP28mimsvtku:5213_2: eva tūktena prakāreṇa grāhyalakṣaṇāyogaḥ. yadā tu jñānārthayoḥ sārūpyanirākaraṇārthaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:5214: tāṃ vanopanyāsāvasare parihariṣyāmaḥ. sārūpyeṇa tu grāhyatām anātiṣṭhanto neha sthūlasiddhāv ādriyāmahe. tad ekaprakārābhihatam eva hetutrayam. katham idānīm asambaddhaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:5215_0: prakāśate. tatprakāśe vā nātiprasaṅgaḥ. nāsambaddhaṃ prakāśate. indriyāṇi hi prakāśakāni.
GSP28mimsvtku:5215_1: tāni ca prāpyakāritvād arthena sambaddhāny evārthaviṣayam ātmani jñānaṃ janayanti.
GSP28mimsvtku:5215_2: taiś cāsannihitam avartamānaṃ vā na prāpyata iti nātiprasaktiḥ. jñānaṃ tu na prakāśakaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:5215_3: prakāśatvāt. prakāśakaṃ ca nāsambaddhaṃ prakāśakaṃ pradīpavad iti tatprakārajuṣām
GSP28mimsvtku:5215_4: indriyāṇām iṣṭa eva sambandhaḥ. tat kim asambandha eva jñānārthayoḥ. yady evaṃ kathaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:5215_5: ghaṭasya jñānaṃ nāsambandhaḥ. viṣayaviṣayibhāvo 'pi sambandha eva. sa cāsti jñānārthayoḥ.
GSP28mimsvtku:5215_6: saṃyogas tu neṣyate samavāyo vā. ko 'yaṃ viṣayārthaḥ. yeyaṃ pratītikarmatā. pratītir
GSP28mimsvtku:5215_7: iti hi kriyā. asyām ātmā kartā. indriyāṇikaraṇam. arthaḥ karma. tad yeyam arthasya
GSP28mimsvtku:5215_8: pratītau karmakārakatā tad eva tasya viṣayatvaṃ tac ca rūpaṃ pratīteḥ prāgabhūtaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:5215_9: parastān niṣpadyata ity avaśyam āśrayaṇīyam. anyathā jñātājñātayor aviśeṣāpatteḥ.{2,
GSP28mimsvtku:5218_0: kathaṃ punas tadapratītāyāṃ pratītau pratīyate. jñānaviśiṣṭatā hi jñātatā. sā katham
GSP28mimsvtku:5218_1: ajñāte viśeṣaṇe jñāyate. ajñātā vā liṅgam anupapadyamānā vā na jñānaṃ gamayati. na
GSP28mimsvtku:5218_2: hy ajñātaṃ liṅgam anupapadyamānaṃ vā liṅginam upapādakaṃ vopasthāpayati. tad itaretarāśrayaṃ,

GSP28mimsvtku:5220_0: tiprasaṅgād ity uktam eva. bhaved evaṃ yadi jñānapratītau jñātaḥ pratīto bhavet tadutpattau
GSP28mimsvtku:5220_1: tu sa pratīta ity ucyate. ataḥ svayaṃ siddho jñānaṃ sādhayati. yat tu jñānaviśiṣṭatā
GSP28mimsvtku:5220_2: jñātateti. tan na. tatkarmatā hi sety uktam eva. tatkarmabhāvaś cārthasya na tatpratītau
GSP28mimsvtku:5220_3: sambhavati. kin tarhi. tadutpattau. tad ayam utpattyaiva jñānasyāprāptapūrvo viṣayaḥ
GSP28mimsvtku:5220_4: samprati prāpto jñānam upakalpayati. eṣa hi prāg jñānotpatteḥ susvāpādāvandha ivāsīt,
GSP28mimsvtku:5221_0: na kañcid viṣayam ajñāsīt. tat keyam ākasmikī viṣayāṇāṃ prāptir iti cintayati --
GSP28mimsvtku:5221_1: na hi kadācid bhuvām akasmād bhāvaḥ sambhavati. ahetusāpekṣasya gaganavannityabhāvāpatteḥ.
GSP28mimsvtku:5221_2: abhāvo vā tatkusumavad iti bhavitavyam asya kadācidbhavato 'rthasannikarṣasya kenāpi
GSP28mimsvtku:5221_3: kāraṇena. na hy asau tathāvidhaḥ svarūpeṇaiva,
GSP28mimsvtku:5222: nityatathātvāpatteḥ. nendriya vaśena. teṣv api satsu susvāpādāvadarśanād arthatathātvasya jāgarāyāṃ cāvyāpriyamāṇeṣu.
GSP28mimsvtku:5223: astu tarhi tadvyāpāra eva tathātve hetur arthasya. na,
GSP28mimsvtku:5224_0: saty apy abhāvāt. asti khalv asya nānārthaiḥ sannikṛṣyamāṇānām indriyāṇām asādhāraṇo
GSP28mimsvtku:5224_1: vyāpāraḥ. kiñcid eva tu kadācijjñātaṃ bhavati. evam evātmamanasor api sator arthatathātvādarśanād
GSP28mimsvtku:5224_2: ahetutvaṃ tathātvena. nanv avyabhicārī manaso yogas tadbhāve heturbhaviṣyatīti. kasya
GSP28mimsvtku:5224_3: indriyāṇām ātmano vā. tan na tāvadindriyāṇām. yad eva hi kiñcid bahirindriyaṃ cakṣurādi
GSP28mimsvtku:5224_4: kāryadarśanavaśān manasā saṃyuktam ity avagataṃ tad eva kiñcij jñāpayati. netarat
GSP28mimsvtku:5224_5: tadindriyamanoyogahetukatvena yujyate jñātatvasyeti tadyogo na hetutvena kalpyate.
GSP28mimsvtku:5224_6: ātmany api manoyukte kasya hetoḥ kiñcid eva jñātaṃ nāparam. yenendriyaṃ sannikṛṣyate
GSP28mimsvtku:5225: na. uktavyabhicāratvāt. cakṣussannikṛṣṭam api hi kiñcid eva kadācijjñātaṃ bhavati nāparaṃ,
GSP28mimsvtku:5227: api ca jñānakarmatā jñātatvaṃ cetanā jñānam iti cānarthāntaram iti lokasiddham. tad yady ātmamanoyogaś cetanā,

GSP28mimsvtku:5231_0: arthabhedenāparyāyatvād iti nātmamanassaṃyogo jñānam. ato na tatprabhāvitaṃ bhāvānāṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:5231_1: jñātatvam. so 'yam ahetukaḥ prāpyakarmabhāvo 'rthasya jñātatātmājanyo nāvakalpate.

GSP28mimsvtku:5231_6: guṇakāṇḍer pāṭhāt na tu kriyā. ataḥ kathaṃ tasyārthaḥ karmety ucyate. na hi vibhor

GSP28mimsvtku:5232_0: pañcānām api karmaṇāṃ spandātmakatvāt. na. dhātvarthamātrasya kriyātvāt. vakṣyati
GSP28mimsvtku:5232_1: ca -- kriyā dhātvarthamātraṃ syāt iti. budhyata ityādibhyaś ca śabdebhyaḥ kriyāpratyaya
GSP28mimsvtku:5232_2: evopajāyamāno dṛśyate pūrvāparībhāvāvagateḥ. ato yuktaiva jñānakarmatā viṣayāṇāṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:5232_3: jñānākāravādinām. api cāvaśyam aprāptapūrvasya nīlādeḥ prāptir vaktavyā. anyathā
GSP28mimsvtku:5232_4: prāgivottarakālam apy apratibhāsamāne viṣayākāre āndhyam eva jagato bhavet. bhāsate
GSP28mimsvtku:5232_5: viṣayākāro na kenacit prāpyata iti cet,

GSP28mimsvtku:5394_1: -- dṛṣṭāntā iti. ādiśabdād yogyāyogyabhedo 'pīti. svarūpabhedānuvidhāyy udbhavābhibhavādibhedo
GSP28mimsvtku:5395_0: nanu nāsti rūpādīnāṃ pāramārthiko bhedo mahān khalv ayaṃ kleśaḥ yad dravyād eva teṣāṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:5395_1: bhedo 'bhidhīyate. parasparabhedās tu kleśatareṇopapādyante. ata ekam eva dravyādirūpaṃ

GSP28mimsvtku:5396_1: na kaścid viśeṣaḥ. ata āha -- yadāpīti. ayam abhiprāyaḥ -- yadi tāvad asmatsiddhānto rūpādāv āśrīyate,

GSP28mimsvtku:5398_2: pariṇāmabhedair bhidyata ity āśrayaṇīyam. yat tu ekasyaiva dravyarūpasya grāhakabhedād bheda iti,

GSP28mimsvtku:5401_1: dṛśyate. ataḥ svabhāvād eva dravyāt parasparaṃ ca rūpādayo bhidyante ity etad eva

GSP28mimsvtku:5401_3: tadupekṣyaiva tāvat pariṇāmavādam abhidadhmahe naivam apy ekasyodbhavābhibhavāv iti || 98 ||

GSP28mimsvtku:5410_1: īdṛśī kṛtakatā kathaṃ śabdād abhinnety ucyate. anyo hi tadā śabdo gakārādyākāraḥ.

GSP28mimsvtku:5419_0: sarvasya sadādyātmanābhedāt. asti tu kenāpi rūpeṇa bheda iti tadāśrayaṇenaiva viruddhadharmasambandhaḥ
GSP28mimsvtku:5419_1: samādhīyate. na caitad bauddhasiddhānte jñānasya sambhavatīty abhiprāyeṇāha -- atyanteti || 105 ||

GSP28mimsvtku:5422_3: atas tadasaṃvittāvabhede 'pi śabdān na grahaṇaṃ kṛtakatvādīnām. atyantābhede tu grahaṇādivyavasthā

GSP28mimsvtku:5429_1: iti yuktam eva vaktum. anyo 'yaṃ grāhyo 'yaṃ grāhako 'yam iti śabdavikalpaḥ. anyac

GSP28mimsvtku:5436_3: catuṣṭayādibhir nirdeśo darśayitavyaḥ. tasmād uttarottarajñānaviśeṣād avagamyate

GSP28mimsvtku:5439_1: smṛtiḥ sambhavatīti pūrvānubhavapratibandhāt smaraṇād ānumānikī pūrvaṃ grāhakākārasaṃvittiḥ
GSP28mimsvtku:5440: tad eva prapañcayati -- ekākāram iti sārdhena. idaṃ ca prāg eva vyākhyātam iti. yadi tu grāhakākāro gṛhyate ity āśrīyate,

GSP28mimsvtku:5447_1: smaraṇāc cānumānikīty etad idānīṃ prapañcayati -- grāhyeti. idaṃ ca prāg eva vyākhyātam iti || 114 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:5448: ākārapracaye tāvat parihāram āha -- neti. ayam arthaḥ -- nottarottaravijñāneṣu pracayānvitā ākārā dṛśyante,

GSP28mimsvtku:5449_4: eva pratīteḥ. yadā tu jñānam eva jijñāsitaṃ bhavati tadārthasya jñātatāvaśena jñānam

GSP28mimsvtku:5459_1: avasthāpayantīti. atas tadbhedasiddhaye tatsamavetākārāntarābhyupagamo na yukta ity

GSP28mimsvtku:5627_1: bhinnaṃ tena sahaikarūpyeṇājñānāt. yad yena sahaikarūpyeṇa na jñāyate tat tato bhidyate

GSP28mimsvtku:5630: jñānotpatter iti hetuḥ. tad dhi samanantarapratyayād utpadyata iti bauddhā manyante. yad jñānād utpadyate na tat (?pā/svāṃ)
GSP28mimsvtku:5631: śaṃ gṛhṇāti. yathā jñānasya svaśaktiḥ. svaśaktir iti jñānaja(?nyād/nyāṃ)
GSP28mimsvtku:5633_0: evam eva grāhyatvapratiṣedhaprayogo darśayitavya ity āha -- grāhyeti. jñānaṃ svāṃśena
GSP28mimsvtku:5633_1: na gṛhyata iti darśayitavyam. tāv eva hetudṛṣṭāntāv iti. na ca sādhyavikalo dṛṣṭāntaḥ.
GSP28mimsvtku:5633_2: dvayahīnavāsanābhyupagamāt. bauddhānāṃ hi svāṃśaṃ na gṛhṇāti. na ca tena gṛhyate.
GSP28mimsvtku:5634_0: 164}sthitvoktam iti draṣṭavyam. na tūpādānāparanāmno viśiṣṭāt samanantarajñānād anyāṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:5634_1: kāñcid vāsanāmarvācīnā manyante. tannirāso 'pi cāsmābhir ukta eveti. anyathā grāhyagrāhakayor
GSP28mimsvtku:5634_2: bhedaṃ darśayati -- caitreti. caitrajñānaṃ dharmi. tac caitrodbhūto yo jñānāṃśo grāhyas
GSP28mimsvtku:5634_3: tasya bodhakaṃ na bhavatīti sādhyam. jñānatvāt. yad yad jñānaṃ na tat tadbodhanaṃ

GSP28mimsvtku:5648_0: 165}siddhatvād jñānasyākārakalpanā nyāyyeti yad uktaṃ tad api pratyākhyātam. yadi
GSP28mimsvtku:5648_1: hi vayam ākāraṃ dṛṣṭvā kasyāyam iti tadāśrayam anvicchema tadobhayasiddhatvād jñānākāro

GSP28mimsvtku:5649_1: iti. uktadoṣaparihāraprapañcam ataḥ paramārabhamāṇaḥ yat tāvad uktam upāyatvād jñānam
GSP28mimsvtku:5650: na ca tadākāram antareṇa pratīyata iti jñānākāra evāyam iti,

GSP28mimsvtku:5653: tat tair eva cakṣurādibhir anaikāntikam iti nopāyasya sato jñānasya pūrvānubhavaṃ sādhayitum alam iti || 179 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:5654: yat punar uktam -- utpannasya sato 'pratibaddhasya jñānasya nāgrahaṇakāraṇam asti ato grahītavyam iti,

GSP28mimsvtku:5663_0: pūrvam api tv apratibandhasya kasmād agrahaṇam ata āha -- na ceti. na hy apratibandham

GSP28mimsvtku:5728_0: nanv idam evāsmābhir jijñāsyate kim asya saṃvidāyattatvam iti. svarūpaṃ tāvat svakāraṇasāmagryāyattam
GSP28mimsvtku:5728_1: eva. prakāśo 'pi tasya saṃvid eva na tadāyattaḥ. tadavaśyam aprāptapūrvasya kācit

GSP28mimsvtku:5730: tam anubhāṣya pariharati -- artheti. ayam arthaḥ -- yo 'yaṃ dvicandrādibodheṣv arthākārāsambhava uktaḥ,

GSP28mimsvtku:5737_0: tad etad āha -- pratyakṣād iti. yat tāvallaiṅgikam atītādigocaraṃ jñānaṃ tat pratyutpannaliṅgādijanakam

GSP28mimsvtku:5745: tat kathaṃ tadākārāṃ dhiyam upajanayitum alaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:5747: iti vaḥ siddhāntaḥ. yadi tvayam api kāryakāraṇabhāvo neṣyate,
GSP28mimsvtku:5748: astu tarhi kādācitkam apy anapekṣam eva jñānam. kiṃ samanantarapratyayādhīnavyasanena. ato 'vaśyāśrayaṇīyā kācijjñānād bhinnā vāsanā,
GSP28mimsvtku:5749_0: yodbhūtā satī visadṛśasantānatirodhānena sadṛśam eva jñānam ārabhata iti bhavadbhir
GSP28mimsvtku:5749_1: apy āstheyam. na cātyantānanubhūteṣu sā sambhavatīti tulyatvam āvayoḥ. na cāpy anubhaviṣyata
GSP28mimsvtku:5750: na tu bhaviṣyato 'nubhavasya kaścid vāsanāyām upayoga iti || 203 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:5751: yadi tu anādṛtyaiva vāsanāṃ jñānotpattir āśrīyate,

GSP28mimsvtku:5755_0: kim ato yady evam ata āha -- evaṃ ceti. abhavanam abhāvaḥ. duḥsvapne 'nubhūyamānasya
GSP28mimsvtku:5755_1: saṃsargasya na kasyacid atyantābhāva iti. kiṃ punas tadbhāve pramāṇam ata āha --

GSP28mimsvtku:5755_3: kiñcid upalabhyate. svapne na ced vāsanāpi kāraṇaṃ na syād eva. na cāsau pūrvajñānam

GSP28mimsvtku:5758: te 'sambhavadvāsanāḥ katham avasīyante. atas tatra jñānā(kāra)
GSP28mimsvtku:5760: ata āha -- duṣṭatveneti. ayam abhiprāyaḥ -- yadā na kathañcit svasaṃvedanaṃ jñānam ity uktaṃ tadā ya evaite pṛthivyādayo 'rthā bahiravasthitā gṛhyante,

GSP28mimsvtku:5761_1: tu yathāvasthitam. na kvacid api jñānākārānubhavaḥ. tannibandhanam iti. pṛthivyādinibandhanam
GSP28mimsvtku:5761_2: ity arthaḥ. pṛthivyādisūkṣmāṇy eva hi sthūlārambhe kāraṇam. etena kalpanānibandhanatvaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:5761_3: pradhānanibandhanatvaṃ ca nirākaroti. na tāvat kalpanānibandhanatvam abādhitatvāt.

GSP28mimsvtku:5762: 175}iti tad eva dvyaṇukādikrameṇāśrīyate. śiraśchedaś cānyagocaro 'vagataḥ svasambandhitayāvagamyata ity anyathā vyavasthānam iti || 207 ||

GSP28mimsvtku:5763_1: yuktety āha -- tān iti. kāraṇam āha -- neti. pṛthivyādyupaṣṭambhaśūnyaṃ na kiñcijjñānam
GSP28mimsvtku:5767: api ca yadi sarvo 'yaṃ jñānam anubhāsamāna ākāro jñānasyaivānye ca pṛthivyādayo bhāvāḥ kalpitāḥ,

GSP28mimsvtku:5775_0: 176} evaṃ tāvad vāsanānibandhaneṣu svapnādivibhrameṣu arthākāro darśitaḥ. bādhakapratyayārthaś

GSP28mimsvtku:5777_0: vāstavānām eva strītvādīnāṃ sambhavāt. te hi strīpunnapuṃsakaliṅgebhyas tārakā tiṣyo

GSP28mimsvtku:5778_1: 'san bhavati. ato yeyaṃ śabdamātrād upajātā pratītis tayaiva strītvādayaḥ saṃviditā
GSP28mimsvtku:5778_2: iti pāramārthikā eveti. ayam api tu śabdaikapramāṇakatvapakṣo 'tituccha eva. na khalu
GSP28mimsvtku:5778_3: padatadbhāgānām agṛhītasambandhānāṃ pratipādakatvam asti. na ca pramāṇāntarāvedyena

GSP28mimsvtku:5779_1: iti. kiṃ punar dṛṣṭaṃ rūpaṃ yenātmanā strītvādīnīṣyante ata āha -- saṃstyānaprasavasthānair (iti.)
GSP28mimsvtku:5780: sattvarajastamasāṃ guṇānāṃ yathottaram upacayaḥ saṃstyānaprasavasthānāni. te ca guṇāḥ prāṇyaprāṇisadbhāvasādhāraṇā eva sarveṣu tadrūpapratyabhijñānāt.{2,

GSP28mimsvtku:5784_2: apy āpekṣikaḥ sattvādīnām upacayo darśayitavyaḥ. alpaprakāśanakṣatrāntarāpekṣayā
GSP28mimsvtku:5784_3: hi paṭuprakāśaḥ pumān iti tiṣyo lakṣyate. yadā tu tasyaiva rajasa udbhavo lakṣyate
GSP28mimsvtku:5784_4: tadā strītvena tāraketi. tamasas tūpacaye nakṣatram iti napuṃsakatvena. evam eva
GSP28mimsvtku:5784_5: taṭas taṭī taṭam ityādiṣv api guṇopacayāpacayātmā liṅgabhedo 'nusandhātavyaḥ. evañ

GSP28mimsvtku:5785: bhayatra yathoktam eva liṅgam upavarṇitam iti || 213 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:5786: evañ copapannaṃ liṅgatrayam apīty āha -- teneti. nanv astv evamātmako bhinnādhikaraṇo liṅgabhedaḥ,

GSP28mimsvtku:5787_1: vyapadiśyeta. ata āha -- apekṣeti. tattadbhāvabhedāpekṣayā hi tasya tasya guṇasyopacaye

GSP28mimsvtku:5790_0: stanavadanādisanniveśaviśeṣā darśayanti. na ca te aprāṇiṣv iti na liṅgabhedaṃ pratipadyāmahe.

GSP28mimsvtku:5790_3: iva jvalanavādaḥ. na hy asau bhrāntiḥ,

GSP28mimsvtku:5791_1: hy agniguṇā māṇavake vartamānā guṇavādahetavaḥ. na tv iha tathā prāṇiguṇāḥ kecid

GSP28mimsvtku:5794: tatsadbhāvamātrasya prakṛtaupayogikatvāt. yadi tu prayojanam abhidhīyate śrūyatām. ye tāvadaprāṇivācinaḥ strīliṅgatayā smaryante,

GSP28mimsvtku:5796_0: pratyayabhāgaḥ strītvam abhidhāya prakṛtyarthe tadasambhavād gauṇyā vṛttyā tatsamabhivyāhāraṃ

GSP28mimsvtku:5799_2: dyotyante iti nānujñāyate. pratyayopajanāpāyayor eva liṅgāvagateḥ sadasadbhāvadarśanāt.

GSP28mimsvtku:5800_2: 'bhihita iti veditavyam. na punar anyatra dṛṣṭāropeṇa bhrāntir uktā. ato bādhakābhāvo
GSP28mimsvtku:5800_3: 'pi na paricodanīyaḥ. gauṇe taddarśanāt. atas tārakādimatau tathā strītvād anyatra
GSP28mimsvtku:5800_4: dṛṣṭaṃ syād ity ayam eva parihāraḥ sādhīyān. parayos tu kathañcicchabdaparamatatvopanyāsābhyām

GSP28mimsvtku:5801_1: sadarthā bhaviṣyantīti. tat pariharati -- kuṇapādīti. asyārthaḥ -- nānākāraṃ vastu
GSP28mimsvtku:5801_2: nānākāram evānubhūyata iti nānupapannam. yas tu kaścid eva vyavasthayā kañcid ākāraṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:5802_0: tatra sahakārivāsanāsadasadbhāvo nibandhanam. parivrājakādīnāṃ hi kasyacid eva kācid
GSP28mimsvtku:5802_1: vāsanā kutaścid abhyāsād hṛdayam anuviṣṭodbhūtā satī kañcid evākāram ekasyām eva

GSP28mimsvtku:5802_3: mṛtaśarīravat kuṇapa ity evaṃ kāminīṃ cintayati. kāmukas tu kāmābhyāsāhitavāsanāsahāyo
GSP28mimsvtku:5802_4: dehātmanor vivekam apaśyan deha evāhaṅkṛtaḥ kāminīti. śvānas tu jātyanubandhipiśitāśanābhyāsātiśayāhitavāsanāsanāthāḥ
GSP28mimsvtku:5802_5: pṛthulanitambor usthalaprastanaśālinīṃ kabalayitum abhilaṣanti kāminīm iti vāsanāvyavasthānusāriṇī
GSP28mimsvtku:5803: āha -- kim aparāddham asmābhir vāsanānibandhanaṃ nīlādyākāropaplavaṃ vijñāne vadadbhiḥ. bhavadbhir api vāsanaivākāradarśanahetutayā varṇitā. ata āha -{2,
GSP28mimsvtku:5806: yasyaiva ca prācīnapratyayajanitasya saṃskārasya tenaiva pratyayenānukāraḥ sādṛśyaṃ sa eva vāsaneti caurikā manyante,
GSP28mimsvtku:5807_0: sa ca saṃskāro bahvākāre vastuny ekasyākārasyābhyastapūrvasya nirdhāraṇe kāraṇaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:5807_1: bhavati iti yuktam. na tv ananubhūtam evākāram asantaṃ vāsanā darśayatīti sāmpratam.
GSP28mimsvtku:5807_2: yathā bhavanto manyanta ity asti mahānāvayor viśeṣa iti || 216 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:5808_0: dīrghādipratyayo 'py ekagocaro 'pekṣābhedād eva parihartavya ity āha -- tatheti.
GSP28mimsvtku:5808_1: dīrghahrasvabodhe bhinnopādhyapekṣā. ghaṭapārthivādibhede tu kālādyapekṣā eko 'pi
GSP28mimsvtku:5808_2: hi kadācid ghaṭa iti tam artham buddhyate kadācit pārthivo 'yam iti. bhinnakālādyapekṣayā
GSP28mimsvtku:5810: iyam apūrvā yuktiḥ yat kilānekākārātmakaṃ bhāsate,
GSP28mimsvtku:5811: tasmād anākāram eva vastu jñānākāra evāyam iti. evaṃ hi pratītibhedadarśanād anekākārakalpanaivāśrayitum ucitā. na tv anākārakalpanety āha -- neti || 218 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:5812: syād etat. santv ekasminn apy aviruddhānekākārāḥ,
GSP28mimsvtku:5813_0: kathaṃ tu viruddhānām anekeṣāṃ sambhavo 'ta āha -- saṃvitter iti. idam anena virudhyata
GSP28mimsvtku:5813_1: iti saṃvitsākṣikaṃ tad yatraiva bhavato viruddhābhimānaḥ tatra saṃvidbalād avirodham

GSP28mimsvtku:5814: bhedāt tv avirodho darśita eveti. bhaved apy anekākāradarśanād ekasyānākārakalpanā yady ekam ekākāram ity atra{2,
GSP28mimsvtku:5815: 181}yuktir bhavet. tām antareṇa tv idam īśvarājñātulyam eva bhāṣitaṃ bhavet. tac cāyuktam ity abhiprāyeṇāha -- ekākāram iti || 219 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:5816_0: saṃvidekādhīnatā hi vastūnāṃ vyavasthitiḥ. ato yad eva yenātmanā saṃvidā vyavasthāpyate
GSP28mimsvtku:5816_1: tat tenaiva rūpeṇābhyupetavyam ity āha -- tathā hīti. kiñcaikatve 'pi vastuno nāsmākam
GSP28mimsvtku:5816_2: ekāntavādaḥ yenaivam upālabhyemahi katham ekam anekākāram iti. tad api hy ekānekātmakam
GSP28mimsvtku:5816_3: evānekāntavādinām asmākam ity āha -- na ceti || 220 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:5817_0: ataḥ siddhaṃ deśakālāvasthopādhisadbhāvanimittaiḥ pratyayair vidyamānā eva vastvākārā
GSP28mimsvtku:5817_1: udbhavābhibhavātmakāḥ pṛthag bhedena gṛhyanta ity upasaṃharati -- tasmād iti. deśādayaś
GSP28mimsvtku:5818: ye tarhi yugapad eva grahītṝṇāṃ ghaṭatvādyākārā nirbhāsante tatra katham. na hi ta āpekṣikāḥ,
GSP28mimsvtku:5819: svābhāvikatvābhyupagamāt. uktaṃ ca ghaṭatvapārthivadravyeti. tatra kaḥ parihāraḥ ata āha -- yugapad iti. yady apy atra naupādhikatvān na codbhavābhibhavau,
GSP28mimsvtku:5820: tathāpi nānākāre vastuni yo yasya vastu(?ni/naḥ)
GSP28mimsvtku:5823: sa taṃ vikalpyāmuko 'yam iti jānāti netara iti vyavasthāsiddhir iti || 222 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:5824: atraiva dṛṣṭāntam āha -- nityam iti. rūpādayo hi ghaṭe nityaṃ santa{2,
GSP28mimsvtku:5826: tathāpi na sarve sarvair anubhūyante grāhakāṇāṃ cakṣur ādīnāṃ viṣayavyavasthānād iti || 223 |
GSP28mimsvtku:5827: evaṃ dṛṣṭānte darśayitvā dārṣṭāntike yojayati -- evam iti || 224 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:5828: nanu bahir deśam arthaṃ tāvadindriyāṇi na prāpnuvanti aprāpyaprakāśe naivānavasthā. ato na bahissato 'rthasya kathañcid avagatir upapadyate,
GSP28mimsvtku:5829: ata āha -- tasmād iti. ayam abhiprāyaḥ -- siddhaṃ tāvat pratītibalād bāhyālambanaṃ jñānam iti,
GSP28mimsvtku:5830: sa bāhyo 'rthātmā prāpyaivendriyaiḥ prakāśyata ity uktam. prāpyakāritā copapāditā yadi kṛtaṃ na nirvahati kāmaṃ,
GSP28mimsvtku:5832: savidvirodhāt. aprāpyakāriṇām evendriyāṇāṃ kañcit kāryavaśonnīyamānam atiśayaṃ vakṣyāmaḥ,
GSP28mimsvtku:5834: na punaḥ svāṃśālambanaṃ jñānam iti kalpanā pramāṇavatīti || 225 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:5835: yad apy uktaṃ vaktāraś cāpi dṛśyante iti,

GSP28mimsvtku:5838: kathaṃ nāma vadanti ata āha -- grāhakatveneti. vidite khalu nīle 'nyenotthāpitāśaṅkaḥ svayaṃ vā jātavicikitsaḥ pramāṇatathātvaniścayapurassaram arthatathātvaṃ niścinoti,
GSP28mimsvtku:5839: nedam anyādṛśaṃ hi jñānaṃ no 'rthānāṃ grāhakaṃ tad yathārthaṃ samarpayati tathāsau tadupādhikatvāt tasya. iha ca prathamaṃ{2,
GSP28mimsvtku:5840_0: 183}tāvajjñānena nīlaṃ samarpitam. tathaiva cādyayāvadanuvartamānaṃ jñānam asti yannīlam
GSP28mimsvtku:5840_1: eva prakāśate. tasmān nīlam evedam ity upāyatayā paścād api jñātaṃ jñānaṃ purassarīkarotīti
GSP28mimsvtku:5840_2: nānena jñānasya pūrvagrahaṇam āpādayituṃ śakyata iti || 227 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:5841_0: evaṃ tāvat parīkṣitā pratyakṣaśaktiḥ. nirṇītaṃ ca yathā bāhya eva pravartituṃ śaktam
GSP28mimsvtku:5841_1: iti. evaṃ cānumānasya pratyakṣabādhe siddhe laiṅgikaṃ tāvad bāhyāsattvam aprāptaṃ

GSP28mimsvtku:5846_0: rayati -- na yādṛg iti. antarākāro yādṛg avagamyate na tādṛśo bāhyārthaḥ sa hy ayam
GSP28mimsvtku:5846_1: idam iti pararūpeṇa nirūpyata ity uktam. antarākārasya tv aham iti nirūpaṇaṃ bhaved
GSP28mimsvtku:5847: atra bhāṣyaṃ nanūtpadyamānaivāsau jñāyate jñāpayati cārthāntaraṃ pradīpavad iti yady ucyetety evamādi,

GSP28mimsvtku:5853_0: atrottaraṃ bhāṣyaṃ tan na. na hy ajñāte 'rthe kaścid buddhim upalabhate. jñāte tv

GSP28mimsvtku:5853_2: siddhāntavādī vadati. satyam utpattau buddher apratibandhaḥ,
GSP28mimsvtku:5855_0: tadabhāvaś ca tatkāraṇasya liṅgasya jñātatādipadāspadasyābhāvād iti. anyathotpadyamānaivetyādibhāṣyābhiprāyam
GSP28mimsvtku:5855_1: āha -- anyeti. anyatarkeṣu sthitvedaṃ bhāṣyakāreṇocyate utpadyamānaivetyādi. etad

GSP28mimsvtku:5857: tarkāntareṣv arthajñānakāla eva jñānam avagamyata itīṣyate. evaṃ hi manyante svaprakāśam eva vijñānam{2,
GSP28mimsvtku:5858_0: 185}ātmānaṃ viṣayaṃ ca vyavasthāpayatīti. etac cāsmābhiḥ prāg eva prapañcitam iti.
GSP28mimsvtku:5858_1: yady evaṃ kim asya nirākaraṇe prayojanam. evam api dvaitaṃ sidhyaty evāta āha --

GSP28mimsvtku:5859_0: tato buddher anākārāyā boddhum aśakyatvād ekākāropalambhāc ca ekam eva sākāraṃ bhavet
GSP28mimsvtku:5859_1: sahopalambhaniyamāc cābhedaḥ parokto nāpākartuṃ śakyate. tatrārthanāśa evāpadyeta.
GSP28mimsvtku:5859_2: na hy abhyupagamamātreṇārthaḥ sidhyatīty etan matanirākaraṇaṃ bhāṣyakāreṇopadiśyata iti || 233 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:5860: aparam api -- nanūtpannāyām eva buddhāv artho jñāta ity ucyate nānutpannāyām. ataḥ pūrvaṃ buddhir utpadyate paścād jñāto 'rtha iti bhāṣyaṃ,
GSP28mimsvtku:5861_0: tadākṣipati -- nanv itīti. paricodanā hi nāmāniṣṭāpādanena bhavati. na cedam aniṣṭaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:5861_1: mīmāṃsakasya yad utpannāyāṃ buddhāv artho jñāta iti. tasmād anupapannā paricodaneti.
GSP28mimsvtku:5861_2: pūrvaṃ buddhir bhavati paścād jñāto 'rtha iti ca paurvāparyābhidhānaṃ pūrvoktena
GSP28mimsvtku:5861_3: yugapadupalambhena virudhyate ity āha -- paurvāparyeti. utpadyamānaivāsāv ityādinā
GSP28mimsvtku:5861_4: bhāṣyeṇa yugapad jñānārthayor upalambho 'bhihitaḥ. tat katham idānīṃ paurvāparyam
GSP28mimsvtku:5862: yadi tūcyate -- pūrvam utpadyamānaiva buddhir jñāyate jñāpayati cārtham ity uktam,
GSP28mimsvtku:5863_0: iha ca buddhyutpattisamaye 'rtho jñāyate ity ucyate. utpannāyāṃ tv asau jñātaḥ sahaiva
GSP28mimsvtku:5863_1: jñānenātikrānta iti yāvat. kṣaṇikatvena hi dharmeṇāsau yuktaḥ katham adya yāvadavasthā(?pya /sya)
GSP28mimsvtku:5864: te. ayaṃ cārtho jñāta iti niṣṭhārthabhūtakālāśrayaṇena bhāṣyakāreṇoktaḥ. ato na kaścit pūrvāparavirodha iti,
GSP28mimsvtku:5865: tathāpy uktasyārthasya punarvacanam anarthakaṃ bhavet. evam api prakārāntareṇa sa evārthajñānayor{2,
GSP28mimsvtku:5866: 186}yugapadupalambho 'bhidhīyate. sa cokta eva. na cāsya prakārāntaravacanasya svarūpeṇa kaścid upayogaḥ tad etad āha -- kṣaṇikatveneti || 235 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:5867: evam ākṣipya samādadhāti -- atrāpīti. ayam arthaḥ -- yathotpadyamānaivāsāv ity atra na pūrvapakṣiṇā svasiddhāntasthityā pūrvapakṣitam,
GSP28mimsvtku:5868_0: evam ihāpi na bauddhaḥ svasiddhāntam uktavān yadutpannāyāṃ buddhāv arthasya jñātatām
GSP28mimsvtku:5868_1: āha. evaṃ hi paramatam evābhyupagataṃ bhaved iti. kenābhiprāyeṇa tarhīdam uktam ata
GSP28mimsvtku:5868_2: āha -- vākyād iti. ayam arthaḥ -- yadā pareṇa siddhāntinā idam uktaṃ na pūrvaṃ buddhir jñāyata iti,
GSP28mimsvtku:5869: tadāsya tadvākyaśrāviṇo bhrāntir jātā yad ayaṃ siddhāntī buddheḥ pūrvaṃ jñānaṃ pratiṣedhati,
GSP28mimsvtku:5870_0: tad asya manye buddhyutpattir api na prāganumatā. na hi bhavati svaprakāśaṃ sūtpannam
GSP28mimsvtku:5870_1: api na gṛhyate. tad evaṃ parasya siddhāntino vākyāj jātavibhramaḥ siddhāntimatam
GSP28mimsvtku:5870_2: evānyathā buddhvā nanūtpannāyāṃ buddhāv itīdṛśaṃ pṛcchati sma. śrutaṃ mayā prāg vo
GSP28mimsvtku:5870_3: mīmāṃsakānāṃ buddhyutpattiḥ sammatā. tat kim ity evaṃ yan na prāg buddham iti || 236 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:5871: pūrvapakṣavādyabhiprāyam eva vivṛṇoti -- sahety adarśanamantena. iyaṃ kilāsya bauddhasya mṛṣṭāśā sahaiva jñānasyotpattyupalambhau,

GSP28mimsvtku:6366_4: pramīyate. tatra tadviparīto nistoyataṭākapakṣo 'rthāpattisiddhena pratyakṣeṇa bādhyate.
GSP28mimsvtku:6366_5: abhāvena tu bhāvarūpaṃ pratyakṣaṃ nāvagamyata iti tadanavagatapratyakṣavirodho nehodāhriyate.
GSP28mimsvtku:6366_7: tāvat pratyakṣapūrvānumānabādhaḥ. dhūmānumitād eva bahner uṣṇatve 'numite tadviparītapakṣo
GSP28mimsvtku:6366_8: 'numitānumānena bādhyate. yatra tu devasya tveti nirvapati{3,
GSP28mimsvtku:6369_0: nitye tu karmaṇi pravṛtte vrīhīṇām apacāre tatsadṛśeṣu nīvāreṣūpamiteṣu vrīhibhir
GSP28mimsvtku:6369_1: yajeteti codanā nīvāraviṣayatvenānumīyate. vrīhyavayavā hi tadviṣayatayā jñātasambandhāstām
GSP28mimsvtku:6369_2: anumāpayanti. na hi tasyāḥ svarūpeṇa vrīhayo viṣayabhūtāḥ,
GSP28mimsvtku:6370_0: tadavayavās tu cūrṇībhūtā vrīhiśāstrārthaḥ. te ca nīvāreṣv api santīti vrīhyavayavasāmānyopamitanīvāragāminī
GSP28mimsvtku:6371_0: arthāpattipūrvakānumānabādhas tu śrāvaṇatvapakṣe 'bhihita eva. yatra dūrād vṛkṣābhāvaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:6371_2: pratyakṣaśabdabādhas tu tridhā darśita eva. anyo 'pi śrutismṛtibhyāṃ darśayitavyaḥ.
GSP28mimsvtku:6371_4: darśitaḥ. śakyaṃ hy aṣṭakādayaḥ śabdamūlāḥ śāstrasthāryāvartanivāsikartṛkatvād agnihotrādivad
GSP28mimsvtku:6371_5: ity anumātum. āgamikaśabdabādhas tu yatra śākhāntaragataśrutiviṣayavivāde smṛtinibandhanakārāṇāṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:6372_0: tatra hy āptāgamāvagatanityāgamavirodho viparītapakṣasya sambhavati. upamitaśabdavirodhas
GSP28mimsvtku:6372_1: tu manvādismṛtibhyo 'rthāpattyā vaidikaṃ kim api mūlam astīti kalpite smārtavākyasadṛśa
GSP28mimsvtku:6372_2: eva mūla upamite rthavādamūlatvapakṣa upamitaśabdena bādhyate. viśvajidaphalatvapakṣas
GSP28mimsvtku:6372_3: tu śrutārthāpattisiddhaśabdaviruddhaḥ. abhāvena tu śabdabhāvo 'vagantuṃ na śakyata
GSP28mimsvtku:6372_4: iti śabdeyat tāvadhāraṇe tasya vyāpāraḥ tatrābhāvāvadhāritavidhikārtsyne jyotiṣṭāme
GSP28mimsvtku:6372_5: prākṛtetikartavyatāprāptipakṣo bādhyate. yathā vakṣyati -- kṛtsnavidhānād apūrvas
GSP28mimsvtku:6372_6: soma iti. vrīhyabhāve tu nīvārāṇām agrāhyatāpakṣaḥ pratyakṣajopamānaviruddhaḥ. anumānapūrvakopamānabādhas
GSP28mimsvtku:6372_7: tu yadā hy ādityasya deśāntaraprāptyā gatim anumāya saṃvatsarādimadhyānteṣu tasyās
GSP28mimsvtku:6372_8: sādṛśyam upamīyate. yādṛśy ekatra saṃvatsarādau tanmadhye vānte vā sūryagatiḥ tādṛśī
GSP28mimsvtku:6372_9: vatsarānteṣv iti tatra gativaisādṛśyapakṣo 'numānapūrvakopamānena bādhyate. pūtīkā
GSP28mimsvtku:6372_10: na somasadṛśā iti tu pakṣaś śabdapūrvakopamānaviruddhaḥ. sāmapūtīkayor hi sādṛśyaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:6373_0: 52}cānumeyam. śabdenaiva tu somāṃśujātatvaṃ pūtīkānāṃ pratipādayatā kāryakāraṇayor
GSP28mimsvtku:6373_1: aucityena sārūpyaṃ pratipāditam iti śabdāvagatakāryakāraṇaprabhavatvāt pūtīkānāṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:6373_3: hi dharmās satrāhīneṣu na bhavantīti pakṣa upamānopamānena bādhyate. jyotiṣṭomopamānena
GSP28mimsvtku:6373_4: hi te dvādaśāhaṃ gacchanti dvādaśāhopamānena ca satrāhīnāv iti. yadā tv ātmendriyasādṛśyaviśiṣṭāni
GSP28mimsvtku:6374_0: parendriyāṇy upamīyante tatra tanniṣedho 'rthāpattyupamānena bādhyate. vedakāranāstitā
GSP28mimsvtku:6374_1: śaśaśṛṅgādyabhāvasadṛśī na bhavatīti pakṣo 'bhāvapūrvakopamānena bādhyate. dvayor
GSP28mimsvtku:6374_2: apy abhāvenābhāve 'vagate sādṛśyam upamīyate. arthāpattivirodhas tu ṣaḍvidho varṇita
GSP28mimsvtku:6374_3: eva. abhāvavirodhaṃ tv anantaram eva vakṣyāmaḥ || 68 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:6375_0: abhāvavirodham idānīm udāharati -- śaśaśṛṅgādīti. ayaṃ ca pratyakṣābhāvavirodhaḥ.
GSP28mimsvtku:6375_1: yadā tv amuṃ rāśiṃ sūryo gato na veti cintyamāne gaṇitakuśalena gaṇitānumānābhāvān
GSP28mimsvtku:6375_2: na gata ity avagate bhrānto gata iti vadati. tatrānumānābhāvavirodhaḥ. caityavandanādidharmatvapakṣas
GSP28mimsvtku:6375_3: tu śrutyādyāgamābhāvaviruddhaḥ. pūrvavanto darvīhomā iti tūpamānābhāvena virudhyate,
GSP28mimsvtku:6376_0: na hi teṣāṃ kenacit karmaṇā sādṛśyaṃ kathañcid avagamyata iti. palālakūṭakuñjarayos
GSP28mimsvtku:6376_1: tu sādṛśyāstitāpakṣa upamānābhāvena virudhyate. tathā śabde śrotradeśam anāgacchati
GSP28mimsvtku:6376_2: śrotre ca śabdadeśaṃ dhvanyāgamanamātreṇaiva śabdaśravaṇopapatter yo 'rthāpatyā śabdaś
GSP28mimsvtku:6376_3: śabdāntaram ārabhate tataḥ krameṇāntyaḥ śrotreṇa gṛhyate ity anyathānupapattyā pratijānāti
GSP28mimsvtku:6376_4: tatpratijñā arthāpattyabhāvena bādhyate. abhāvābhāvas tv evaṃ darśayitavyaḥ -- yadā
GSP28mimsvtku:6376_5: hi kartrabhāvena vedānāṃ doṣābhāvo vagato bhavati tadā doṣavatpakṣasyābhāvābhāvena bādha iti || 69 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:6377: evaṃ tāvad dharmasambandhabādhaḥ ṣoḍhā prapañcitaḥ. dharmadharmyubhayasvarūpasvaviśeṣabādhamataḥparaṃ vakṣyāma iti saṃkṣipya sukhagrahaṇārthaṃ śrotṛbuddhisamādhānārthaṃ{3,
GSP28mimsvtku:6378_0: 53}ca vṛttavartiṣyamāṇayos saṅkīrtanaṃ karoti -- evam iti sārdhena. śrutyarthākṣiptayor
GSP28mimsvtku:6378_1: iti. svarūpaṃ tāvat sarvatra śrutyartha eva. tadviśeṣo 'py arthākṣiptaḥ. dharmadharmiṇor
GSP28mimsvtku:6378_2: hi svarūpaṃ yena viśeṣeṇa vyāptaṃ tam ākṣipati. tac cānantaram eva vakṣyata iti.
GSP28mimsvtku:6379_0: tatra dharmasvarūpabādho varṇita eveti tam akṛtvaiva tadviśeṣaṇabādham udāharati
GSP28mimsvtku:6379_1: -- tṛṇādīti. yo hi tṛṇādivikāradarśanād agnimaddhimaṃ sādhayati tasyābhāvena tāvaddharmasvarūpabādho
GSP28mimsvtku:6379_2: bhavaty eva. tadviśeṣaṇam apy uṣṇatvam arthākṣiptaṃ pratyakṣāvagatena śaityena bādhyate.
GSP28mimsvtku:6379_3: na ca vācyam anuṣṇo 'pi vahniḥ prabhāsu dṛṣṭa iti katham arthākṣipto viśeṣa iti.
GSP28mimsvtku:6379_4: prabhāsv apy evaṃ vahnir uṣṇa eva,
GSP28mimsvtku:6382_0: svābhāvikī hi sā tasya. na ca hime 'py abhibhūtatvād agrahaṇam iti vācyam. tadviparītaśaityopalmbhāt.
GSP28mimsvtku:6382_1: hetūpanyāsas tu pakṣadoṣābhidhānāvasare tadbījamātrapradarśanārthaṃ so 'yam abhāvena
GSP28mimsvtku:6383_0: dharmiṇas tu dviprakāro 'pi bādho 'nukta eveti ubhayathā tadbādhodāharaṇam āha --
GSP28mimsvtku:6383_1: adharma iti sārdhena. hiṃsā kilādharma iti sāmānyato 'vagatam. tad yadā vihito 'dharmo
GSP28mimsvtku:6383_2: daikṣapaśuhiṃsādir yad duḥkhaṃ karotīty anūdya tadalpam iti sādhyate,
GSP28mimsvtku:6384_0: tadāpi vihitatvenādharmataiva bādhyate tadviśeṣo 'pi duḥkhanimittatvaṃ yadarthākṣiptaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:6384_1: tad api tenaiva bādhyate. na hi vihitaṃ nāma kim api duḥkhasya nidānaṃ bhavati. puruṣārthaikasādhanatvād vidheḥ. so 'yam{3,
GSP28mimsvtku:6385: 54}āgamena dharmisvarūpasvaviśeṣabādhaḥ. na cātra śrutyupātta eva svaviśeṣa iti codanīyam. arthākṣiptasyālpatayā vidhānārtham anuvādād iti || 73 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:6386_0: ubhayasyobhayavirodham udāharati -- ayathārtheti. yadā hi sarvajñānāni mithyeti sādhyate
GSP28mimsvtku:6386_1: tadā dharmadharmigrāhiṇor api jñānayor mithyātvāt tadviśeṣaṇagrāhiṇoś ca mithyātvād
GSP28mimsvtku:6386_2: bhavaty ubhayasyaivobhayabādha iti. ayaṃ ca dharmoktyobhayabādha iti śabdabādha eva
GSP28mimsvtku:6386_3: niveśanīya iti samadhigataṃ tāvad ubhayoḥ svarūpabādha iti || 74 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:6387_0: kau punas tadviśeṣāv arthākṣiptau bādhyete. ata āha -- kṣaṇiketi. bādhyete iti vipariṇamya
GSP28mimsvtku:6387_1: sambandho darśayitavya iti. tatra caikadeśadarśanād ity ucyate. tatra ca darśanagrahaṇam
GSP28mimsvtku:6387_2: atiricyate. ekadeśād ity eva vaktavyam. tad dhi liṅgaṃ na punardarśanam ato vyākhyeyam
GSP28mimsvtku:6387_3: ekadeśadarśanād ity ata āha -- darśanād iti. ayam arthaḥ. naikadeśas sattāmātreṇa
GSP28mimsvtku:6387_4: liṅgam. kin tu svapratipattau jñātaḥ parapratipādane ca jñāpitaḥ. tad idam ubhayam
GSP28mimsvtku:6388_0: ṇijbhāvābhāvayor api nirdeśasādhāraṇyāt. svapratipattau tāvad ekadeśe dṛṣṭe buddhir
GSP28mimsvtku:6388_1: anumānam ity arthaḥ. parārthaprayoge tu ṇijantadarśanapadam ekadeśaṃ darśayitvā yā
GSP28mimsvtku:6388_2: buddhir jāyate sānumānam ity uktaṃ bhavati. tad idaṃ tatroccaritadarśanapadam arthadvaye
GSP28mimsvtku:6388_3: vyākhyeyam. anena ca yatraikadeśe vādiprativādinor akasyobhayor vā saṃśayo 'dhīrviparyayo
GSP28mimsvtku:6388_4: vā bhavati so 'siddhābhidhāno hetvābhāso vyudasyate. na hy asau tādṛśaḥ parasmai
GSP28mimsvtku:6389_0: 55}svayaṃ vā dṛṣṭo bhavati. adhīrajñānam ity arthaḥ. tatra dvayaviparyastodāharaṇam
GSP28mimsvtku:6389_1: āha -- śaityād iti. vahniśabdayor dvayor api śaityacākṣuṣatve vādiprativādinor viparyād
GSP28mimsvtku:6390: anyatarāsiddhodāharaṇam āha -- kṛtakatveti. yadā vaiśeṣiko yājñikaṃ prati śabdo 'nityaḥ kṛtakatvāt guṇatvād veti hetuṃ prayuṅkte,
GSP28mimsvtku:6391_0: tadāsau svarūpeṇa tasyāsiddho bhavati. yadā tu svayam evaṃprakāraṃ hetuṃ paraṃ prati
GSP28mimsvtku:6391_1: vadati tadā tasyāsiddhiḥ. yathā nityaḥ śabdaḥ dravyatvād ākāśavad iti. na hi vaiśeṣikāś
GSP28mimsvtku:6391_2: śabdaṃ dravyam abhyupagacchanti guṇatvābhyupagamāt. evaṃprakāra iti. parāsiddhaprakāra ity arthaḥ || 77 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:6392_0: sandigdhāsiddham udāharati -- bāṣpādīti syādantena. yadā hi dhūmo bāṣpādibhāvena
GSP28mimsvtku:6392_1: sandihyate dvābhyām ekena vā kiṃsvid ayaṃ rajasāmudgamo bāṣpo vā dhūmo veti tadā
GSP28mimsvtku:6392_2: dvayor apy anyatarasa vā sandigdhāsiddho bhavati. evaṃ tāvat sandehaviparyayābhyām
GSP28mimsvtku:6392_3: asiddhatodāhṛtā. ajñānena tv aprasiddhārthapadaprayoge darśayitavyā. tridheti. vādiprativādyubhayais
GSP28mimsvtku:6392_4: trayaḥ prakārā iti. evaṃ tāvat svarūpato hetur asiddho bhavatīty uktam ity āha -- evam iti || 78 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:6393: āśrayāsiddhatāpy etair eva jñānādibhir vādiprativādyubhayāpekṣais tridhā bhidyata ity āha -- eta eveti || 79 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:6394: nanu svarūpāsiddhyā hetur duṣyet āśrayāsiddhyā tu kas tasya doṣaḥ ata āha -- jñāte 'pīti. ayam abhiprāyaḥ -- na svarūpeṇa hetur gamakaḥ,
GSP28mimsvtku:6396_0: 56}pakṣadharmatayā jñātaḥ. na cāprasiddhāśrayas taddharmatayā jñātuṃ śakyate. śaityacākṣuṣatvayor
GSP28mimsvtku:6396_1: api pakṣadharmatvāsiddhyaivāhetutvam. siddhaṃ hi svarūpeṇa jale śaityaṃ rūparūpirūpaikārthasamavāyiṣu
GSP28mimsvtku:6397: hi pakṣadharmatayā tu tayor asiddhatvam iti taddharmarūpābhiprāyeṇa svarūpāsiddhavacanam. ata āśrayāsiddhāv api pakṣadharmatvāsiddher ahetutvaṃ yuktam eveti || 79 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:6398: tām idānīm āśrayāsiddhim udāharati -- sarvatreti asiddhāntena. yadā hi bauddhaṃ prati sarvatra kāryopalambhād ātmanas sarvagatatvaṃ mīmāṃsakās sādhayanti,
GSP28mimsvtku:6399: tadānyatarāsiddhāśrayo hetur bhavati. bauddhasyātmano 'siddher iti. yas tu pramāṇagatim ajānāno laukikaḥ kaścid ātmani saṃśete,
GSP28mimsvtku:6400_0: tasminn eva hetāv ucyamāne sandigdhāśrayo hetur ity āha -- laukikāder iti. ātmani
GSP28mimsvtku:6400_1: saṃśaya ity arthaḥ. ādiśabdena satīrthikānām api yeṣām ātmani saṃśayaḥ ta upādriyante.
GSP28mimsvtku:6400_2: evaṃ saṃśayaviparyayābhyām āśrayāsiddhir uktā. ajñānenāpy āśrayāsiddhir aprasiddhapadaprayoge
GSP28mimsvtku:6400_3: darśayitavyā. yasya hi pakṣavacanaś śabdo na prasiddhas taṃ pratyevaṃjātīyake hetāv
GSP28mimsvtku:6402_0: evaṃ tarhy amūrtatvād ātmā niṣkriya ityevamāder api hetutvaṃ na syāt digambarāṇām
GSP28mimsvtku:6402_1: ātmano 'mūrtatvāsiddheḥ. mūrtaṃ hi te śarīrapariṇāmam ātmānaṃ manyante. akartṛkatvān
GSP28mimsvtku:6402_2: nityo veda iti ca bauddhānāṃ tadasiddher ahetuḥ. śabdo 'nityaḥ kṛtakatvād iti mīmāṃsakānām
GSP28mimsvtku:6402_3: asiddheḥ. tad eva hetur nāma na kaścit vyavatiṣṭhate. ata āha -- vāṅmātreti. ayam
GSP28mimsvtku:6402_4: arthaḥ -- nāsiddho mameti vāṅmātrād dhetur asiddho bhavati. tathā sati na kaścid
GSP28mimsvtku:6402_5: anumānavyavahāraḥ prakalpeta. dvābhyāṃ tu vādiprativādibhyām asattvenāvadhārito{3,
GSP28mimsvtku:6404: tasyaiva tathāvidhasyāsiddhatāvacanaṃ vādino dūṣaṇaṃ bhavati nāsiddha iti vākpravṛttimātrād iti || 81 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:6405: nanu kim idaṃ dvayor asiddho 'siddha iti,
GSP28mimsvtku:6406: na hi vivadamānayor ekatrārthe sampratipattir bhavati,
GSP28mimsvtku:6407: na hi janmasahasreṇāpi bauddho vedānām akartṛkatvaṃ manyate,
GSP28mimsvtku:6408: mīmāṃsako vāpi kaṇṭhagataprāṇo 'pi kṛtakatāṃ śabdasya. tad evamādāv ubhayasampratipater abhāvān na hetubhāvo 'vatiṣṭhate. ata āha -- itarad iti,
GSP28mimsvtku:6409_0: ayam abhiprāyaḥ -- na dvayor asaṃpratipattir ity etāvataiva sādhanadūṣaṇayor anavakḷptiḥ.
GSP28mimsvtku:6409_1: yadi vādinā prayukte sādhane prativādinā cāsiddhatva udbhāvite vādinā tatsādhanaṃ sādhyate,
GSP28mimsvtku:6410_0: tato bhavati sādhanam. yadi tu paramārthopapattyabhidhānena prativādinā nirākriyate
GSP28mimsvtku:6410_1: tatas tasya dūṣaṇaṃ sidhyati. tatpramāṇatas siddhir evātropayujyate nobhayābhyupagamaḥ.
GSP28mimsvtku:6410_2: dvābhyāṃ yo 'sattvato jñāta ity api pramāṇasiddhyabhiprāyeṇoktam,
GSP28mimsvtku:6411_0: nābhyupagamamātrāpekṣayā. yad dhi pramāṇena sādhyate bādhyate vā tatra prāyeṇobhayasampratipattir
GSP28mimsvtku:6411_1: dṛṣṭeti. asattvato jñātāpekṣayetaracchabdaḥ. yad vādinā sattvena jñātaṃ bhavati prativādinā ca vaiparītyena,
GSP28mimsvtku:6412: tadvādinā sādhyamānaṃ sādhanaṃ bhavati. etac ca jalpanyāye sthitvoktam. vāde tu dvayor api sampratipattir bhavaty eveti. na caivam anyatarāsiddhir adūṣaṇam,
GSP28mimsvtku:6413: yāvat tu yādī na sādhanaṃ sādhayati,
GSP28mimsvtku:6415: sādhite tu tasmin dūṣaṇaṃ parihṛtaṃ bhavatīti || 82 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:6417: jñātasambandhapadasyedānīṃ vyāvartya darśayati sandeheti vacanāntena. sandehaviparītahetvor hi na saṃbandho jñāto bhavati,
GSP28mimsvtku:6418: na hi sādhāraṇas saṃśayahetuḥ prameyatvaṃ nityatvena jñātasambandham iti śakyate vaktum,
GSP28mimsvtku:6419: dhaṭādiṣv anityatayāpi jñātasambandhatvāt nāpi kṛtakatvaṃ nityatayā,
GSP28mimsvtku:6420_0: teṣv evānityatayā sambandhasaṃvitteḥ. atas tajjātīyam ubhayaṃ na jñātasaṃbandham
GSP28mimsvtku:6420_1: iti jñātasaṃbandhapadena vyudasyati. atra cāsannikṛṣṭapadāt prabhuti prātilomyena
GSP28mimsvtku:6422: 58} tat kasya hetoḥ. pratītikramānusāreṇa. prabhātā hi prathamaṃ pakṣaṃ pratyeti,
GSP28mimsvtku:6425: ato 'satpakṣanirākaraṇārthaṃ prayuktam asannikṛṣṭapadam eva tāvad upavarṇitam. tato hetupadam ekadeśadarśanād iti,

GSP28mimsvtku:6435_3: bhāvāt. sarvatra cātra dvayavṛttitvam eva hetos saṃśaye kāraṇam avṛttyaṃśas tu sann

GSP28mimsvtku:6461_3: avyavasthayā hy ubhayasmin manasi viparivartamāne saṃśayo bhavati. na cāsādhāraṇena
GSP28mimsvtku:6462_0: tasya kenacid anvayābhāvāt. api ca parimiteṣv eva bhāveṣu saṃśayo dṛṣṭaḥ. nivṛttimukhena

GSP28mimsvtku:6466_1: 'sādhāraṇena janyata iti. na tv etad ghaṭate. na hy anadhyavasāyo nāma kaścid jñānasya prakāraḥ,

GSP28mimsvtku:6665_0: na caitat sambhavati. sādhyadharmādhikaraṇāder apy abhāvaprasaṅgād apakṣadharmatvāpatteḥ.
GSP28mimsvtku:6665_1: pakṣābhāvaprasaṅgāc ca. atas sādhyābhāva eva vyāvṛttiṃ niyantuṃ sarvadaiva vaidharmyavacanam
GSP28mimsvtku:6665_2: arthavat. sati hi tasminn agnyabhāve dhūmo na bhavatītyāveditaṃ,
GSP28mimsvtku:6667_0: etad api dūṣayati -- tat tu mandaphalam iti. tad idaṃ vaidharmyavacanam evaṃ kriyamāṇaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:6667_1: mandaphalam ity arthaḥ. kathaṃ mandaphalam ata āha -- yasmād iti. kiṃ nirūpitam ata
GSP28mimsvtku:6667_2: āha -- vyāpakābhāvamātraṃ hīti. agnimān parvata iti pakṣavacane nirūpitam idam,
GSP28mimsvtku:6668: yathā niyamas tadvipakṣāc ca kalpyate nāvirodhina iti. atas sādharmyadṛṣṭānte 'pi vyāpyād dhūmāder vyāpakābhāvanivṛtti mātram eva darśayitavyam,
GSP28mimsvtku:6670: etad eva dṛṣṭāntavacanenopapādayann upasaṃharati -- tasmād iti. tad iha --
GSP28mimsvtku:6676: atra bhāṣyam -- tat tu dvividhaṃ pratyakṣato dṛṣṭasambandhaṃ sāmānyato dṛṣṭasambandhaṃ ca. tatra pratyakṣato dṛṣṭasambandhaṃ yathā -- dhūmākṛtidarśanād{3,
GSP28mimsvtku:6678_0: sāmānyato dṛṣṭasambandhaṃ ca yathā -- devadattasya gatipūrvikāṃ deśāntaraprāptim
GSP28mimsvtku:6678_1: upalabhyāditye 'pi gatismaraṇam iti. anena prameyadvaividhyād anumānadvaividhyam
GSP28mimsvtku:6678_2: uktam iti. atra kecin nītijñammanyā avadhṛtasvalakṣaṇam eva kvacid anumānena sāmānyato
GSP28mimsvtku:6678_3: gṛhyata iti manyante. tadbhramāpanayāya bhāṣyakāreṇedam uktam -- tat tu dvividham,
GSP28mimsvtku:6679: adṛṣṭasvalakṣaṇaviṣayam apy anumānam asti kriyādiṣv iti. kathaṃ punar adṛṣṭasvalakṣaṇena sambandhadarśanam,
GSP28mimsvtku:6680: utpattimataḥ phalasya darśanāt. yady apy anavadhṛtasvalakṣaṇena vastunā viśeṣatas sambandho 'navagataḥ,
GSP28mimsvtku:6681: sāmānyatas tu dṛśyate. sarvaṃ hi kādācitkaṃ phalaṃ kutaścid āgantukād utpattimato jāyamānaṃ dṛṣṭam,
GSP28mimsvtku:6682_0: tantusaṃyogebhya iva paṭaḥ. ato devadattasya bhūtapūrvapūrvottaradeśavibhāgasaṃyogau
GSP28mimsvtku:6682_1: kadācid upalabhyāgantukaḥ ko 'pi hetur anumīyate. tad idaṃ sāmānyato dṛṣṭasambandham
GSP28mimsvtku:6682_3: svalakṣaṇāvadhāraṇāt prāk pratyakṣato dṛṣṭasambandham anumānam āhuḥ. na ca dravyam
GSP28mimsvtku:6682_4: eva saṃyogavibhāgayoḥ kāraṇam iti vaktavyam. saty api tasminn abhāvāt. na ca dravyāntarāgama
GSP28mimsvtku:6683: tasya pūrvadravyapratyabhijñayā bādhitatvāt. na ca sadṛśāparāparotpattivipralabdhā bhedaṃ na budhyanta iti sāmpratam,
GSP28mimsvtku:6684_0: deśādibhede 'pi tadbuddher aviparyayāt. uktaṃ ca vivaraṇakāreṇa -- kṣaṇabhaṅgas tu
GSP28mimsvtku:6684_1: pratyabhijñānān nirākriyata eva. ato dṛṣṭakāraṇāsambhavād adṛṣṭaṃ kim api saṃyogavibhāgayoḥ
GSP28mimsvtku:6684_2: kāraṇam anumīyate. tac ca karmety ākhyāyate. ata eva pradeśāntareṣv api karmāpratyakṣam
GSP28mimsvtku:6684_3: eveti. bhāṣyakāro darśayati -- yathā vakṣyati na hi te pratyakṣe iti. apūrvasadbhāvapratipādanāvasare
GSP28mimsvtku:6684_4: ca na karmaṇo rūpam upalabhāmaha iti. yadāśrayaṃ deśāntaraṃ prāpayati tatkarmety
GSP28mimsvtku:6684_5: ucyata iti ca. vyaktam eva deśāntaraprāptiphalonnīyamānatvam eva karmaṇo darśayatīti
GSP28mimsvtku:6684_6: siddhaṃ kriyādīnāṃ sāmānyato dṛṣṭānumānaikaviṣayatvam. evaṃ ca prameyadvaividhyād
GSP28mimsvtku:6685_0: anumānadvaividhyopapattir iti ye vadanti tān pratyāha -- dvaividhyaṃ nopapannam iti.
GSP28mimsvtku:6685_1: idam uktaprakāraṃ dvaividhyam anupapannam iti bhāvaḥ. katham anupapannam ata āha
GSP28mimsvtku:6685_2: -- yathaiveti pādatrayeṇa. yathā khalv agnidhūmākṛtyoḥ pratyakṣayoḥ pratyakṣadṛṣṭas sambandho,
GSP28mimsvtku:6688_0: 83}pratyakṣam eva hi vayaṃ deśāntaraṃ prāpnuvantaṃ devadattvaṃ gacchatīti manyāmahe.
GSP28mimsvtku:6688_1: neyaṃ jātyādivikalpanābhyaḥ karmakalpanā viśiṣyate. tadvad evendriyānvayavyatirekānuvidhāyitvād
GSP28mimsvtku:6688_2: aparokṣanirbhāsāc ca. nanu devadatte deśasaṃyogavibhāgātiriktam aparaṃ karmaṇaḥ kim
GSP28mimsvtku:6688_3: api rūpam aparokṣam īkṣāmahe. phaladarśanenaiva tadanumīyate. jāter vā vyaktito vya(tiriktā)
GSP28mimsvtku:6690: yad asau pratyakṣaviṣayatayāvasīyate. rūpam eva sā vyakteḥ,
GSP28mimsvtku:6692_0: karma vā kim arūpam. idam api hi tato na bhidyata eva. āgantukaṃ tu kevalam. ato
GSP28mimsvtku:6692_1: jātikalpanāvat karmakalpanām api pratyakṣapakṣa eva nikṣipantaḥ pañcadhā savikalpakaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:6693: na hi dṛṣṭipathaṃ prāptaṃ devadattaṃ nirūpayan |
GSP28mimsvtku:6694: paṭhan kāvyaṃ svasaṃjñoktaṃ parokṣam iva budhyate ||
GSP28mimsvtku:6695_0: iti. phalānumeye tu karmaṇyādityavad devadattavat pratītiprasaṅgaḥ. na caiṣa devadattam
GSP28mimsvtku:6695_1: iva calantaṃ spandamānam ādityam api paśyatīti dṛśyate. sthiraṃ hi sarvadā tanmaṇḍalam
GSP28mimsvtku:6695_2: avalokyate. saṃyogavibhāgau tu tasyāpi pratīyete eveti tulya(?va /tvā)
GSP28mimsvtku:6696: t tābhyām ubhayatrāpy ānumānikaḥ pratyayo bhavet. api ca vibhāgopakrame saṃyogāvasāne ca karmaṇi tata unnīyamāne gacchatīti vartamānanirbhāsaḥ pratyayo na bhavet,
GSP28mimsvtku:6698_0: tadā kathaṃ vartamānākārabuddhigocaro bhavati. jalapravāhaniścaleṣu matsyeṣu nirantarotpadyamānajalāvayavasaṃyogavibhāgāvagamād
GSP28mimsvtku:6698_1: ānumānikī gatisaṃvid upajāyeta. sthāṇau ca śyenaviyukte śyena iva karmānumīyeta.
GSP28mimsvtku:6698_2: tataś ca so 'pi gacchatīti buddhiviṣayatām āpadyeta. yadi mataṃ na vibhāgamātrāt karmānumānam,
GSP28mimsvtku:6699_0: api tarhi vibhāgapūrvakāt saṃyogād iti. evaṃ tarhi yadaikaḥ śyenaviyuktaḥ sthāṇur
GSP28mimsvtku:6699_1: anyena saṃyujyate tatra prasaṅgaḥ. calitvāvasthite ca devadatte. yadi tūcyate yo
GSP28mimsvtku:6699_2: 'yam utpatataḥ śyenasya deśāntarasaṃyogaḥ tasya sthāṇusamavetena karmaṇā niṣpattyasambhavān
GSP28mimsvtku:6699_3: na tatra karmānumānam iti. kalpyatāṃ tarhi śyene 'pi karma,
GSP28mimsvtku:6700_0: sthāṇau tu prasaṅgān ativṛttir eva. niyataṃ hi pratibaddhadṛśaḥ smṛtapratibandhasya
GSP28mimsvtku:6700_1: pratibandhakavijñānam. asti ca sthāṇau kāraṇapratibaddhaphaladarśanam iti nānumānodayaś śakyate{3,
GSP28mimsvtku:6701_0: 84}niroddhum. śyenasamavāyinaiva karmaṇā sthāṇāv api saṃyogavibhāgopapattau na tadgatakarmānumānam
GSP28mimsvtku:6701_1: iti cet tan na. na hi prayojanānusāriṇy anumānavyavasthā. vyāptaṃ hi liṅgaṃ yatra
GSP28mimsvtku:6701_2: yatra dṛśyate tatra tatra vyāpakam upasthāpayati. arthāpattir hy anyathopapattyā
GSP28mimsvtku:6701_3: parihriyate nānumānam. yadi tv avicchinnotpattayas saṃyogavibhāgāḥ kriyānumāne kāraṇam,
GSP28mimsvtku:6702: evaṃ tarhi na kācid gatir anumīyeta,
GSP28mimsvtku:6703_0: bhaviṣyatsaṃyogavibhāgānāṃ pramāṇāgocaratvāt. prathamaṃ ca katipayānām evāvagateḥ.
GSP28mimsvtku:6703_1: atha svadeśasaṃyogavibhāgahetukaṃ kriyānumānam. na ca sthāṇoḥ śyeno deśa ity ucyate.
GSP28mimsvtku:6704: teṣāṃ hi jalaṃ svadeśa eva. parokṣavyomavādināṃ ca vihaṅgame gacchatīti kriyāpratyayānupapattiḥ,
GSP28mimsvtku:6705: vyomasaṃyogavibhāgayor apratyakṣatvāt tābhyāṃ tadanumānānupapatteḥ. na ca viyadvitatālokāvayavasaṃyogavibhāgāvagamanibandhano vihaṅgame calatīti pratyayaḥ,
GSP28mimsvtku:6706: santamase 'pi bhāvāt. na ca tamo nāma kiñcid vastv asti bhavatsiddhānte,
GSP28mimsvtku:6707_0: bhāso 'bhāvamātratvāt tasya. atas tatsaṃyogavibhāgahetuko 'pi na kriyāvasāyaś śakyate
GSP28mimsvtku:6707_1: samādhātum iti na pratyakṣe karmaṇi dvaividhyopapattiḥ. yā tu na hi te pratyakṣe
GSP28mimsvtku:6708_0: tāṃ tatraivānyathā vyākhyāsyāmaḥ. rūpaśabdāvibhāgam iti ca vadatā sūtrakāreṇa pratyakṣam
GSP28mimsvtku:6708_1: eva karmety āsthitam. apūrvādhikaraṇe ca na karmaṇo rūpam upalabhāmaha iti vacanaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:6708_3: itarathā hy upalabdhimātrapratiṣedhe śaśaśṛṅgādivannityābhāva eva karmaṇo bhavet.
GSP28mimsvtku:6708_4: na hi tatra pratyakṣopalabdhimātram eva pratiṣiddham. yadāśrayaṃ deśāntaraṃ prāpayatīti
GSP28mimsvtku:6708_5: ca na phalānumeyatvābhiprāyam. kiṃ tarhi. āśrayasya deśāntaraprāpakatvarūpeṇa na
GSP28mimsvtku:6708_6: svarūpataḥ karmāstīty apūrvātmanā karmaṇo 'vasthānaṃ darśayati. ihāpi devadattasya
GSP28mimsvtku:6708_7: gatipūrvikāṃ deśāntaraprāptim upalabhyeti vadan devadatte pratyakṣatām eva gater
GSP28mimsvtku:6708_8: darśayati. anyathā tu devadattādityayor ubhayor api karmaṇo 'numeyatvāt kena viśeṣeṇāditye
GSP28mimsvtku:6708_9: gatyanumānaṃ sāmānyato dṛṣṭatayodāhriyate. devadatte 'pi hi sāmānyato dṛṣṭād eva
GSP28mimsvtku:6708_10: gatisiddhiḥ. ato naivaṃvidhaṃ granthato yuktito vā ghaṭata iti sūktam anupapannam
GSP28mimsvtku:6708_11: iti. pratiyoginor hi parasparam asaṅkare dvaividhyaṃ bhavati. iha tu yat{3,
GSP28mimsvtku:6709: 85}pratyakṣadṛṣṭasambandhasya pratiyogitayopāttaṃ sāmānyato dṛṣṭasambandhaṃ tatrāpi gatiprāptyākṛtyoḥ pratyakṣadṛṣṭa eva sambandha iti na pratiyoginor asaṅkara iti || 138 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:6710_0: yadi tu dṛṣṭānte pratyakṣatāyām api pakṣīkṛtād ity agater apratyakṣatvāt na pratyakṣadṛṣṭas
GSP28mimsvtku:6710_1: sambandha ity ucyate. tad etad āśaṅkate tāvat -- āditye 'nupalabdhiś ced iti. idānīṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:6710_2: dūṣayati -- neti. kāraṇam āha -- deśe 'py adhunātana iti. deśe 'py adhunātane --

GSP28mimsvtku:6711_1: iṣyate sā tarhi devadatte 'pi gateḥ pratyakṣatvād astīty āha -- kvacid iti || 139 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:6712_0: evaṃ tāvat pratyakṣato dṛṣṭatā sāmānyato dṛṣṭatayā saṅkīryate ity uktam. idānīṃ sāmānyato
GSP28mimsvtku:6712_1: dṛṣṭatāpi pratyakṣato dṛṣṭābhimatāgnyākṛtyanumāne saṅkīryata ity āha -- yadīti pādatrayeṇa.
GSP28mimsvtku:6712_2: yadi hi devadattādidharmyantarāpekṣaivāditye gatyanumānasya sāmānyato dṛṣṭateṣyate,
GSP28mimsvtku:6713: sā tarhi mahānasādidharmyantarāpekṣayāgnidhūmayor api gamyagamakatvenāvasthitayoḥ prāpnoty eva. sāmānyato hy avivakṣitadeśādibhedam idam avagataṃ dhūmavān agnimān iti,
GSP28mimsvtku:6714_0: yathā deśāntaraprāptyadhikaraṇaṃ gatyadhikaraṇam iti. ataḥ pratiyogitvarahitam evedam
GSP28mimsvtku:6714_1: ubhayam iti dvaividhyānupapattir ity ākṣepaḥ. evam ākṣioya samādadhāti -- tasmād
GSP28mimsvtku:6714_2: evaṃ pracakṣata iti. yathoktadvaividhyāsambhavād evaṃ vakṣyamāṇaprakāreṇa dvaividhyaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:6715: tatra pratyakṣasambandhaṃ tāvad udāharati -- pratyakṣeti yudhyate 'ntena. yadā hi yayor evāgnidhūmaviśeṣayoḥ,
GSP28mimsvtku:6716: gomayendhano yam agniḥ -- gomayam indhanam asyeti{3,
GSP28mimsvtku:6718_0: tajjanyo 'yaṃ dhūmaviśeṣa iti ca prāk pratyakṣeṇa matiṃ kṛtvā punaś ca kiyatā vilambanenānyatra
GSP28mimsvtku:6718_1: kvacid gatvā gatas san taddeśasthena tenaiva dhūmaviśeṣeṇa tam evāgniviśeṣaṃ budhyate,
GSP28mimsvtku:6719_0: tadā tatpratyakṣadṛṣṭasambandham anumānaṃ bhavatīty arthaḥ. anena ca viśeṣadṛṣṭam
GSP28mimsvtku:6719_1: eva pratyakṣadṛṣṭaśabdenocyata iti vyākhyātam. pratyakṣaśabdena hi viśeṣo lakṣyate.
GSP28mimsvtku:6719_2: pratyakṣeṇa hy ayam evaṃvidho 'vāntaraviśeṣo gomayendhanatajjanyatvādirūpaś śakyate
GSP28mimsvtku:6719_3: 'vagantum. na pramāṇāntareṇa. taddvāreṇa tv anumānasyāpi tādṛśo viśeṣo viṣayo bhavatīti
GSP28mimsvtku:6719_4: yuktaiva pratyakṣaśabdena viśeṣalakṣaṇā. viśeṣadṛṣṭaṃ ca sāmānyato dṛṣṭasya bhavati
GSP28mimsvtku:6719_5: pratiyogīti dvaividhyopapattir iti bhāvaḥ. nanu viśeṣadṛṣṭaṃ nāma (na)
GSP28mimsvtku:6721: gṛhītaviṣayatvāt. taddeśasthitenaiva hi dhūmena tasminn eva deśe sa eva gomayendhanajanyāgnir anumīyate. ato deśabhedābhāvād aprāmāṇyam eva,
GSP28mimsvtku:6722_0: ata āha -- tasyeti pādatrayeṇa. tasyaivaṃvidhasya pratyakṣadṛṣṭasya sandihyamānasadbhāvavastubodhāt
GSP28mimsvtku:6722_1: pramāṇatā bhavati. yady api deśabhedo nāsti. kālabhedāt tu saṃśayānasya saṃśayocchedadvāreṇa
GSP28mimsvtku:6722_2: prāmāṇyam avihatam iti. etac ca vindhyavāsināpi viśeṣadṛṣṭatvenodāhṛtam ity āha --
GSP28mimsvtku:6723_0: yadi viśeṣadṛṣṭodāharaṇam idaṃ kathaṃ tarhi bhāṣye ākṛtigrahaṇam. evaṃ hi viśeṣa
GSP28mimsvtku:6723_1: eva darśayitavyo bhavet. ata āha -- ākṛtyor eveti. ayam arthaḥ -- kenacid gomayendhanatvādināyāntaraviśeṣeṇopadarśitayor{3,
GSP28mimsvtku:6724_0: 87}ākṛtyor evātra hetusādhyatvam. evaṃ hy atra pratyayaḥ. sa evāyam adya yāvadanuvartamāno
GSP28mimsvtku:6724_1: gomayendhanavikārasya dhūmasyākāro dṛśyate. ata eva tadindhanayonir agnir anuvartata
GSP28mimsvtku:6725_0: yady evam avivakṣitāvāntaraviśeṣam agnidhūmāntaram eva sāmānyato dṛṣṭodāharaṇatayā
GSP28mimsvtku:6725_1: vācyam. kim ādityodāharaṇena. ata āha -- agnidhūmāntaratve ceti. yathā hy agnidhūmākṛtyos
GSP28mimsvtku:6726: naivaṃ gatiprāptyākṛtyoḥ. ataḥ prāptyākṛtimātrād gatyākṛtimātrānumānam āditya ekāntatas sāmānyato dṛṣṭasambandham iti yuktam evādityodāharaṇam iti || 145 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:6727_0: kiṃ punas sāmānyatas sambandhagrahaṇe pramāṇam. na hy agṛhītayos sambandhinos sambandhagrahaṇam
GSP28mimsvtku:6727_1: asti. na ca sāmānyayoḥ pratyakṣagrahaṇaṃ sambhavati. tasya svalakṣaṇaikaviṣayatvāt.
GSP28mimsvtku:6727_2: nānumānam anavasthāpātāt. ata āha -- pratyakṣaviṣayatvam iti. bhaved anavasthā,
GSP28mimsvtku:6728_0: yady anumānena sāmānyagrahaṇam iṣyate. tasya tu savikalpakasiddhau pratyakṣaviṣayatvam
GSP28mimsvtku:6728_1: upapādyānta upasaṃhṛtaṃ pratyakṣatvam atas siddhaṃ sāmānyasyeti. nanu vastv eva na
GSP28mimsvtku:6728_2: sāmānyaṃ kiñcid asti nāma. tasya bhinnābhinnasyānirūpaṇād ata āha -- vastutvaṃ ceti.
GSP28mimsvtku:6728_3: vastutvam apy ākṛtigranthe vistareṇa pratipādayiṣyate. pratyakṣaviṣayatāpratipādanena
GSP28mimsvtku:6728_4: ca pratyakṣe 'pi prasādhitaprāyam eva. atra ca asti sāmānyavastuṣv ity anvayopapādanāya
GSP28mimsvtku:6728_5: sāmānyasya vastutvam upanyastam eva. ayaṃ tu hetukathanārthaḥ punarupanyāsa iti.
GSP28mimsvtku:6728_6: yas tu haituko na hetum antareṇa pramāṇāntarasiddhāv ādriyate. taṃ prati hetunaivobhayam
GSP28mimsvtku:6730_0: 88} tatra vastutvaprasādhanārthaṃ tāvad hetum āha -- dhūmād agnyanumānasyeti. bauddhā
GSP28mimsvtku:6730_1: hy avastusāmānyālambanam anumānam ācakṣate. sāmānyasya vikalpākāramātrābhyupagamāt.
GSP28mimsvtku:6731_0: sambandhabalena svalakṣaṇarūpam upasthāpayatīti pramāṇam ity āhuḥ. tān eva pratīdam
GSP28mimsvtku:6731_1: ucyate -- vastv ālambanam anumānam abhāvānyapramāṇatvāt yathā svārthe śrotrādibuddhiḥ.
GSP28mimsvtku:6731_2: yā hi svaviṣaye śrotrādibhir indriyair buddhir janyate,
GSP28mimsvtku:6732_0: sā vastv ālambanaiva. yena ca yadindriyaṃ sannikṛṣyate sa tasya svārthaḥ prāpyakāritvād
GSP28mimsvtku:6732_1: indriyāṇām. tad iha mṛgatṛṣṇādijñānanirākaraṇārthaṃ svārthaviśeṣaṇam. aviśeṣeṇopādāne
GSP28mimsvtku:6732_2: tu nābhāvānyapramāṇatvasya vastvālambanatayā vyāptiḥ kathitā bhavet. bhrāntīnām ubhayavikalatvāt.
GSP28mimsvtku:6732_3: na hi tāḥ pramāṇam. na ca vastv ālambanāḥ. anyasamprayuktendriyasya hi tā anyaviṣayā
GSP28mimsvtku:6733_0: na punaratyantāsadartham. evaṃ vastvālambanatve 'numānasya sādhite arthāt sāmānyaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:6733_1: vastv ity uktaṃ bhavati. idaṃ cāvastvālambanatvam anumānasyārthapadaṃ prayuñjānena
GSP28mimsvtku:6733_2: bhāṣyakāreṇa nirākṛtam. anarthaviṣayam anumānam iti bauddhā manyante. yadvad iti(?)
GSP28mimsvtku:6734: svapratibhāse 'narthe 'rthādhyavasāyena pravartamānā bhrāntir apy arthasambandhena pravṛttes tadavyabhicārāt pramāṇam anumānam iti,
GSP28mimsvtku:6735: teṣām idam uttaram arthas sāmānyam anumānasya viṣayo bāhya eva. na vikalpākāramātram ity ākṛtigranthe vistareṇa pratipādayiṣyata iti || 147 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:6736_0: evamarthād vastutvaṃ prasādhyāhratya prasādhayati -- sāmānyasya ca vastutvam iti.
GSP28mimsvtku:6736_1: sāmānyaṃ vastu abhāvānyaprameyatvād asādhāraṇavastuvad iti vakṣyamāṇena sambandha
GSP28mimsvtku:6736_2: iti. pratyakṣaviṣayatām idānīṃ prayogeṇa darśayati -- pratyakṣeti pādatrayeṇa. yadabhāvānyaprameyaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:6736_3: tat pratyakṣeṇa gṛhyata eva. yathā saugatānām evāsādhāraṇaṃ vastv iti || 148 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:6738: 89} bauddhānām eva tu sāmānyam anumānaikaviṣayaṃ manvānānām anavasthā prasajyata ity āha -- sāmānyam iti pañcabhiḥ. nigadavyākhyāto granthaḥ || 149 -- 153 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:6739: yadi tūcyate liṅgabhūtasāmānyagrahaṇārtham anumānāpekṣāyām anavasthā bhavati,
GSP28mimsvtku:6742_0: arthakriyāsamarthavastupratilambhāt. na ca pramāṇam anarthaviṣayatvāt. ato 'nirvacanīyavikalpasiddhatvāt
GSP28mimsvtku:6742_1: liṅgasya nānavasthā bhavatīty āśaṅkyāha -- atheti. ayam abhiprāyaḥ -- na tāvat pramāṇam
GSP28mimsvtku:6742_2: apramāṇaṃ ca jñānaṃ sambhavati. viruddhasvabhāvayor ekatra pratiṣedhe 'nyatarāpatter
GSP28mimsvtku:6742_3: aparihāryatvāt. apramāṇasya ca prameyavyavasthāpanāśakter avaśyaṃ pramāṇam eva tajjñānam
GSP28mimsvtku:6743: 90}pramāṇāntaraṃ ca sad yathā talliṅgasaṃvedane pramāṇam iṣyate,
GSP28mimsvtku:6744: evaṃ liṅginy api prāpnoti. evaṃ ca vakṣyamāṇaprasaṅgo bhavet. pramāṇād apramāṇād veti vadannanirdhāritobhayarūpatāṃ vikalpasya darśayatīti || 154 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:6747_0: ata āha -- evam apīti. ayam abhiprāyaḥ -- anavasthām api prasañjayatām asmākam anumānocchedāpādanam
GSP28mimsvtku:6747_1: abhimatam. pramāṇāntarābhyupagame 'pi cānumānocchedo bhavaty eva. tad eva hi pramāṇaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:6749_0: tato 'pramāṇāvagatāl liṅgāl liṅgijñānam api mithyā bhavet. bāṣpād iva dhūmasaṃviditād
GSP28mimsvtku:6749_1: agnijñānam. evaṃ ca nānumānam iti. sa evānumānasya nityocchedaṃ ity abhiprāyeṇāha
GSP28mimsvtku:6750: atra codayati -- nanv iti. yathā hy apramāṇam eva sambandhasmaraṇaṃ pramāṇakāraṇam iṣyate tathā liṅgajñānam api bhaviṣyatīty arthaḥ || 157 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:6751: pariharati -- tatreti. smṛtir hi pūrvajñānād bhavantī tadupasthāpanadvāreṇānumāyām upayujyate. tac ca pramāṇam eveti tadanusārī nirṇayo yukta iti || 158 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:6753: 91} na caiṣa prakāro liṅgagatau sambhavatīty āha -- na tv iti. na hy atra prāg api liṅgāvagame pramāṇaṃ kiñcid upapadyate,
GSP28mimsvtku:6754: yat pramāṇajñānenopasthāpyata iti. na ca liṅgajñānam api smṛtir eveti vācyam. pūrvapramāṇābhāvād evety āha -- tadabhāvād iti || 159 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:6755_1: ato 'trāpi nirvikalpakapramāṇāntarato nirṇayo yukta eva. ata āha -- smārtam iti.
GSP28mimsvtku:6756_0: evam etad api liṅgajñānaṃ nirvikalpakagṛhītaprāpakatayā tadabhedena smārtam iti yo
GSP28mimsvtku:6756_1: vadati tasya vandhyāsute 'pi smaraṇaśaktir anivāritā. gṛhītaviṣayā hi smṛtir iti
GSP28mimsvtku:6756_2: sthitiḥ. na ca liṅgasāmānyajñānaṃ nirvikalpakagṛhītasvalakṣaṇālambanam iti kathaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:6756_3: smṛtiḥ. yad atra prakāśate tan na gṛhītaṃ,
GSP28mimsvtku:6757: yac ca gṛhītaṃ tan na prakāśata iti na smṛtitvam. agṛhītagocarāyāṃ tu smṛtau vandhyāsute 'pi smaraṇaprasaṅga iti || 160 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:6759: yadi sāmānyātmakam eva liṅgaṃ tadgrahaṇārtham iṣyate,
GSP28mimsvtku:6760: tasyānumānavedyatvāt. asādhāraṇa evārthātmā sāmānyajñāne liṅgaṃ bhaviṣyati,
GSP28mimsvtku:6761_0: sa ca pratyakṣa eveti nānavasthā. ata āha -- na ceti. kiṃ na kāraṇam ata āha -- yasmād
GSP28mimsvtku:6761_1: iti. dṛṣṭāvinābhāvaṃ liṅgaṃ bhavati. na cāsya tena sāmānyenāvinābhāvaḥ kathañcid
GSP28mimsvtku:6761_2: deśataḥ kālato vā dṛṣṭaḥ. asādhāraṇasya bhāvāntareṣv anusyūtyasambhavād ekatra dṛṣṭasya
GSP28mimsvtku:6763: 92} sambandhadarśanābhyupagame vā kṛtakatvādivat sāmānyarūpatāpattir ity āha -- syād veti. atra kāraṇam āha -- na hīti || 162 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:6764_0: itaś cāsādhāraṇo 'rthātmā na liṅgam ity āha -- na ceti. dhūmādir hi dhūmo 'yam ityādivikalpāspadīkṛto
GSP28mimsvtku:6764_1: 'gnyāder liṅgam iti dṛṣṭam. asādhāraṇas tu kenacid rūpeṇāpy avyapadeśyaḥ kathaṃ liṅga
GSP28mimsvtku:6764_2: bhaved iti. liṅgatvaṃ nopapadyata iti vakṣyamāṇena sambandha iti. nanu tiraścām asaty
GSP28mimsvtku:6764_3: eva śabdollekhe 'sādhāraṇarūpadarśinām evānumānaṃ dṛṣṭamato nāvyapadeśyatvād aliṅgatvam
GSP28mimsvtku:6764_4: ata āha -- vikalpeti pādatrayeṇa. ayam abhiprāyaḥ -- mā nāma tiraścāṃ śabdollekho bhavet,
GSP28mimsvtku:6765_0: arthavikalpas tu teṣām api pūrvāparānusandhānātmako 'sty eva. ato yuktam eva teṣām
GSP28mimsvtku:6765_1: anumāne 'vyapadeśyasyāpi liṅgatvam. asādhāraṇas tu pūrvāparānusandhānād vinārthavikalparahito
GSP28mimsvtku:6765_2: 'pīti kathaṃ liṅgam. na hi so 'yam ity anārūḍho buddhau dhūmo 'gner liṅgaṃ bhavati.
GSP28mimsvtku:6767: asmanmate 'pi ye 'sādhāraṇātmāno dhūmādayo viśeṣā vikalpyante te 'py anvayābhāvād aliṅgaṃ,
GSP28mimsvtku:6768: kim aṅga punarnirvikalpakaikagocaro 'sādhāraṇo 'rthātmā ity āha -- kalpyanta iti. anvayābhāvād evāsādhāraṇajñānam api liṅgisāmānyajñāne na liṅgam ity āha -- etasmād eveti || 164 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:6770: tato liṅgasāmānyagrahaṇa ivānavasthāprasaṅgāt tasyāpy anavadhāraṇam ity āha -{3,
GSP28mimsvtku:6771_0: 93}sāmānyeti. yadi tu kasmiṃścid evāsādhāraṇe sāmānyena jñātasambandhe nyadarśināpi
GSP28mimsvtku:6771_1: sāmānyam anumīyate. evaṃ tarhi sarva eva sarvasya pratyāyako bhavet. aviśeṣād ity
GSP28mimsvtku:6772_0: evaṃ tāvan na liṅgāvadhāraṇe pramāṇam astīty uktam. idānīm anvayagrahaṇakāle liṅgijñāne
GSP28mimsvtku:6772_1: 'pi na kiñcit pramāṇam astīty āha -- sambandhānubhava iti. nāgṛhīte liṅgini tatsambaddhaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:6772_2: liṅgaṃ śakyate 'vagantum. na cānumānapravṛtteḥ prāk tasmin sāmānyātmani bhavanaḥ
GSP28mimsvtku:6772_3: kiñcit pramāṇam asty asmākam iva pratyakṣam,
GSP28mimsvtku:6773: ato liṅginy apy avagamyamāne 'navasthāprasaṅga ity abhiprāyaḥ || 166 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:6775_0: kim ihātinirbandhena. kācid eva hi vāsanodbhūtā kiñcil liṅgākāraṃ vikalpam āvirbhāvayantī
GSP28mimsvtku:6775_1: kiñcid evānumānasaṃvyavahāraṃ pravartayati. yathāhuḥ -- sa evāyam anumānānumeyavyavahāro
GSP28mimsvtku:6777_0: ata āha -- na cāpīti. na vāsanāmātranirmitaṃ liṅgajñānam. vāsanā hi pūrvānubhavāhitas
GSP28mimsvtku:6777_1: saṃskāraḥ. nāsau liṅgasāmānyasya śaśaviṣāṇādivadatyantāsatas sambhavatīti kathaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:6777_2: vāsanāmātrālliṅgajñānasya sambhava iti. tannibandhane ca liṅgajñāna iṣyamāṇe tadvad
GSP28mimsvtku:6777_3: eva liṅgijñānopapatter anarthakaṃ trirūpāl liṅgato 'rthadṛganumānam ity anumānaprāmāṇyāśrayaṇam
GSP28mimsvtku:6779: 94} nanv iyam anavasthā meghābhāvena vṛṣṭyabhāvānumāne bhavato 'pi samānaiva,
GSP28mimsvtku:6780: abhāvasyānupalabdhiliṅgatvāt. sajātīyaliṅgāntarāpekṣāyām anavasthāpadyate. ata āha -- yatreti. yatra hi vṛṣṭyabhāve meghābhāvo liṅgaṃ nāsāv anumeyaḥ,
GSP28mimsvtku:6781: abhāvākhyapramāṇāntaragamyatvāt. ato nātra tulyajātīyāpekṣānibandhano 'navasthādoṣo jāyata iti || 168 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:6782: pratyakṣasāmānyavādināṃ tu na naḥ kācid anavasthety āha -- pratyakṣāvagatād iti. ataḥ pratyakṣād ity arthaḥ || 169 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:6784: ata āha -- yatrāpīti. pratyakṣā hi deśāntaraprāptir maulikaṃ mūle bhavaṃ liṅgaṃ,
GSP28mimsvtku:6785: tena gatim anumāyāditye gatisādhane 'numīyamāne nānavasthety abhiprāyaḥ || 170 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:6787: kṛtakatvaṃ ca tatra darśanād ity evaṃ karmānantarabhāvitayā kṛtakatve sādhyamāne karmaṇo 'pi hetvantarād anumāne 'navasthā bhaved ata āha -- liṅgatvam iti.
GSP28mimsvtku:6789: iti kārakavyāpārānantarabhāvitvaṃ liṅgam uktam. tatra ca kārakaviśiṣṭā kriyā tadviśiṣṭaṃ vā kārakam anantarabhāvitāṃ viśiṃṣalliṅgam āpatati. ubhayaṃ{3,
GSP28mimsvtku:6790_0: 95}ca tatpratyakṣam. kriyāyās tāvat pratyakṣatvam anantaram eva sādhitam. kārakam
GSP28mimsvtku:6790_1: api tadvat pratyakṣam eva. śaktis tu parokṣā. sā ca na tāvad iha liṅgam. na cānumeyā.
GSP28mimsvtku:6790_2: ataḥ kriyākārakayor ubhayor api pratyakṣatvān na dūragamanam. anumeyakarmavādinām
GSP28mimsvtku:6792_0: evaṃ tāvadanumānasyāsati sāmānyasya vastutve pratyakṣatve ca dausthityam uktam idānīṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:6792_1: sarvam eva pramāṇajātaṃ sāmānyasya dausthitye dusthitam āpadyeta teṣām api sāmānyāśrayatvāt.
GSP28mimsvtku:6792_2: na ca tadapramāṇaṃ vakṣyamāṇanyāyād ity abhiprāyeṇāha -- evam iti || 172 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:6793: ato 'vaśyaṃ pramāṇāntarāṇāṃ pratyakṣapūrvakatvam eṣṭavyaṃ sāmānyasya ca pratyakṣatvam,
GSP28mimsvtku:6794: itarathā tv anavasthā prāpnotīty upasaṃharati -- tasmād iti || 173 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:6795: evaṃ tāvat sāmānyasya pratyakṣatvaṃ vastunā copapāditā idānīṃ viśeṣā eva pratyakṣeṇa gṛhyanta iti ye vadanti,
GSP28mimsvtku:6796: tān pratyāha -- pratyakṣeti. viśeṣo hi yadi tāvadavayavī dravyam abhimataḥ,
GSP28mimsvtku:6797: sa cāvayavavastvantarāpekṣas sāmānyāṃśo 'smābhiḥ kīrtyata iti kathaṃ pratyakṣa iti || 174 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:6798: yadi tv avayavirūpādaya eva viśeṣā iṣyante,
GSP28mimsvtku:6799: tad apy ayuktam. te 'pi hi svaviśeṣanīlādyapekṣayā sāmānyam evety āha -- rūpādayo hīti.{3,
GSP28mimsvtku:6800: 96}yadi tu nīlādaya eva viśeṣā iti matam. tan na. teṣām apy avāntaranīlādyapekṣayā sāmānyarūpatvād ity āha -- svaviśeṣān iti || 175 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:6802_0: tan na. tasyāpi pakṣādisvāvayavāśritanīlaviśeṣāpekṣayā sāmānyarūpatvāt. pakṣanīlimāpi
GSP28mimsvtku:6802_1: tadavayavanīlāpekṣayā sāmānyam eva. evaṃ ca aparamāṇubhyaḥ prasaṅgo darśayitavya
GSP28mimsvtku:6802_2: ity āha -- te cāpīti. nirbhāgā hi paramāṇava iti tadrūpam asādhāraṇam eveti. tebhyas
GSP28mimsvtku:6802_3: tu prāk dvyaṇukarūpam api dvayos sādhāraṇam ity āha -- dvyaṇukasyāpīti || 176 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:6804: sa eva naḥ pratyakṣo bhaviṣyaty ata āha -- na cāntyeneti. vyavahārārthaṃ hi pramāṇam anusriyate,
GSP28mimsvtku:6805: na vyasanitayā. na cāntyena viśeṣeṇa vyavahāraḥ kasyacid astīti kiṃ tatpratyakṣatayeti. nanūpekṣāphalam api pramāṇaṃ bhavaty eva,
GSP28mimsvtku:6806: ata āha -- na ceti. na naḥ paramāṇūnāṃ rūpaṃ sthūle vartamānānāṃ tantūnām iva paṭe pratyakṣaṃ vibhaktānāṃ veti na kathañcid viśeṣaviṣayatā pratyakṣasyeti || 177 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:6807_0: nanu paramāṇava eva bhinnās sañcitā gṛhyante na kāryadravyam ekam. ataḥ kathaṃ tatsāvayaveṣu
GSP28mimsvtku:6807_1: sāmānyam ity ucyate. sañcitā eva cānanyavṛttitayā viśeṣāsādhāraṇādipadavācyā iti
GSP28mimsvtku:6807_2: te pratyakṣā bhaviṣyanti. mā nāmaikaikataḥ paramāṇur akṣagocaro bhaved ata āha --
GSP28mimsvtku:6807_3: bhedeneti. eko hi sarvadā sarveṣāṃ ca bhāvaḥ prakāśate na paramāṇubhedāḥ. na ca bhedenāgṛhyamāṇo
GSP28mimsvtku:6807_4: 'bhedo gṛhyata iti sāmpratam. saṃvidvirodhād iti bhāvaḥ. nanv ayam eva bhedāvagraho{3,
GSP28mimsvtku:6809: kiṃ bhedagrahaṇenāta āha -- na ca bhinneti. nābhinnākārabuddhibodhyo bhedaḥ,
GSP28mimsvtku:6811_0: nanv asaty apy ekasmin samudāyālambano 'yam abhinnāvabhāso bhaviṣyatīty ata āha --
GSP28mimsvtku:6811_1: samudāya iti. ye hi sāmānyam eva sarvajagatsaṃviditam apalapanti kutas teṣāṃ samudāyo nāmārthāntaraṃ,
GSP28mimsvtku:6812: yadālambano 'bhinnapratibhāso bhaviṣyati. api ca sarvadā sarve caikaṃ dravyam avabudhyante kathaṃ tad anyathā bhaviṣyatīty āha -- na ca sarvadeti || 179 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:6813_0: kiñcāyaṃ samudāyo 'pi naikajātyā vinopapadyeta. na hi nānājātīyeṣu vṛkṣaghaṭaloṣṭeṣu
GSP28mimsvtku:6813_1: kasyacit samudāyabuddhir asti. atas samudāye 'pīṣyamāṇe 'ṇutvasāmānyam abhyupagantavyam
GSP28mimsvtku:6813_2: āpadyeta bhavatām ity āha -- na ceti. hetau caḥ || 180 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:6814: nanu nānekāvayavavṛttyanusandhānena vinā tatsāmānyarūpaṃ dravyam abhyupagantuṃ śakyam. na caindriyakaṃ jñānam etā(?v i/va)
GSP28mimsvtku:6815_0: ti samartham avikalpakatvāt tasya. ata āha -- sāmānyam itīti. yady apy anekānugamakḷptes
GSP28mimsvtku:6815_1: tannānāvayavavyāsaṅgi dravyaṃ sāmānyam ity evaṃ vikalpya na gṛhyate. tathāpi tadekarūpaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:6815_2: tāvannirvikalpakenāpi gṛhyata eveti nāpahnotuṃ śakyata iti vyāsajyavṛttyavayavisāmānyanyāyena
GSP28mimsvtku:6815_3: prativyaktivartino 'pi gotvādisāmānyasyaindriyakatvaṃ darśayitavyam. tad api sāmānyam
GSP28mimsvtku:6815_4: ity anena rūpeṇāgrāhyaṃ vastutas sāmānyam eva gṛhyate. śabdādismaraṇottarakālaṃ tv
